story:
Huntsman: The Orphanage is an indie horror-survival development project that has been Greenlit by tens of thousands of fans for Steam distribution, with over 190,000 hits plus previews on Kotaku, Penny Arcade and many other leading game sites.

This game is a no-violence, no-blood, no-weapons experiment in providing immersive gaming alternatives that do not rely on ultra-violence for effect. 

We have a talented team of contributors with game and movie credits ranging from Silent Hill and LA Noire to Sanctum and House of Wax - and one or two of them need to eat occasionally in order to produce their best work!

To help our artists and animators maintain their basic body functions while they breathe life into our game's creepy, malevolent time-and-space-warping antagonist The Huntsman, we need YOU to chip in for pretzels while they model, rig and animate his 7-foot-tall four-legged ungodly self!

MEET THE TEAM (so far!) 
DENE WARING - Director/Producer 
PAMELA WARING - Story Advisor, Character Scripting 
MACKENZIE WARING - Story Advisor, 3D Props 
TOBIAS WARING - Story Advisor, Music 

3D, PROGRAMMING & ART: 
EVAN HSU - Ex 'Silent Hill' 
OLIVER COOK - Ex 'L.A. Noire' 
DALE MACKIE - Creature Design - Ex 'I, Frankenstein' 
TOM BANWELL – Creature Mask Design – ‘Ichabod, the Plague Doctor’ 
GRAEME CALLANDER – Concept Artist – Ex ‘Sanctum’, ‘Red Dwarf’, ‘House of Wax’, ‘Ghost Ship’ 
JON TILLER - Unity Dev 
WALTER PULLEN - Maze Designer Extraordinaire! 
SEB CORSON – Creepy-Toys-R-Us! 
HENRIK ASKANIUS - Architecture 
ANTHONY ADDATI - Props 

ACTORS: 
TOBIAS – ‘Charley’ 
CHLOE - 'Rose' 
POLLY - 'Dorothy'
CODY DINGFIELD - Voice 'Narrator' 
HATTERGAL - Voice 'Dorothy' 
PURITYSIN - Voice 'Hattie' 


PROJECT MENTORS 
MORGAN JAFFIT – ‘Heroes Call’, http://defiantdev.com/ 
ANTONY REED - GDAA 

Here's a little background about just what kind a baddie you'd be helping us to build:

AS DARKNESS CONCEALS, SO LIGHT REVEALS – AND YOU MAY NOT LIKE WHAT YOU SEE... 
The human fear of the dark is innate within us all; we may conquer it to a certain degree, but never fully suppress the chill of unease it harbours. For millennia our ancestors have gathered around the flickering light of the fire, seeking succour from its warmth and the wisdom of insight offered by the multitude of visions of wild game, predators, allies, enemies and creatures with no name at all writhing within the shapes cast by the dancing flames; light has always been a portal to other dimensions, beyond these earthly realms. 
But place your faith in the light at your own peril, for just as darkness conceals, so light reveals - and in the portal between those two worlds, lives... The Huntsman. 

The Huntsman thrives in the darkness, effortlessly weaving and unravelling space and time through all the centuries, seeking the lost and the lonely, the orphaned and the bereft. Some say he came to be in our particular thread of reality in the 14th century, attracted by the misery wrought by the Black Plague of Europe and clad in the black-leather guise of a Plague Doctor... come face to face with him in the here and now at your own risk – he hunts within the half-light, the world his unsuspecting prey blindly see as safe, only to secret his victims within the realm he most adores – the blackness. 

Check out the full game details on Steam Greenlight:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=92956803

story:
About me

Hello! My name is Andrew Leach, I live in Hamilton, New Zealand (that tiny country near the underneath everyone ) and I am currently in the progress of developing my first indie game in C# called Dimensia.
I just completed my last year and high school, and am about to set off to a new city to begin my study of engineering at University.
Dimensia has been a side hobby for the past year while finishing High School.

I am a co-founder of the group Kolben Games, a small independent game company which consists of young indie developers with a passion to create games. Even with being in a company, each project is worked on individually, meaning Dimensia is my own project, and the only one actively working on it.

This campaign is designed to help fund some cash which will make a huge impact of my move to University and to help fund a continued development on my game while partaking in full-time study.
This is important to me, as it will allow me to put money towards a laptop to continue development, along with extra funds to put towards the development of the game.

I started programming about 2 years ago, and around 6 months in I started development on my first game, Dimensia, and ever since have been working on it as a hobby along side my education. I have a desire and passion to code, especially awesome particle engines using just a pixel texture! This project started just to learn and self-teach myself C#, until I realised I could turn it somewhat into an 'okay' game.

The idea of the game actually came from one of my High-school friends who created a very basic prototype for a school exam, from there he wanted me to develop it into a proper game. The development has always had me as a solo-coder, and part-time artist with various friends helping me at each step for graphics. High school support is the best!

I have a passion to complete this game as I work through university, to both complete my first ever game, and continue to do what I enjoy, code.

The Game

Dimensia is a 2D platformer game with is focused around the adventure on a single individual and his companion henry. The game explores an individual and his robotic suit, testing his ability through multiple dimensions in a select environment. As you progress through the challenges, you will be presented in new environments which will further test you and your suits abilities, allowing for more complex obstacles and more advanced gameplay.

The storyline follows the individual , facing challenges presented by an unknown source in order to 'test' the suits abilities. As you progress through the game, you find out more about who you are, and where you are in the face of reality.

The game currently is in early beta, the core game is there although needs to be added on .

Honestly, the game itself is quite strange, may seem not 'professionally' done, and is still fill with incomplete features and a lot of bugs. But hey, it is a indie game, and the game has been programmed with love! And hopefully will be done, in time :)

The game consists of many features, a level editor, multiplayer and a main campaign to play through. To keep it fun and fresh, it is filled with easter-eggs and secret unlocks.

For the future of this game, I'm not really too sure yet. Might give Greenlight ago, maybe try distrubute it on some small indie games websites. But if people were pleased and had actual fun out of the end product, well that would be awesome!

Where any funds will go..

Although a laptop would cost around $1000, I did set the bar higher due to extra funds to put towards hours on development when I'm at University. I am not expecting the target to be reached, but every cent will make a huge impact and will be much appreciated.

The funds will go towards a laptop to continue development on Dimensia and future projects while I'm away at University, and any extra funds would eliminate any extra University and living costs. Since I am going to be studying full-time, working will be a problem and may be inconvenient at times. So any extra funds will reduce the need for this, and make me a much happier student! :)

I have put in the generic perks , the thank you, the credit given, yet Dimensia has a few unique perks which it has to offer. Since the game comes with a 'complete' and easy-to-use *cough* level editor, the user will be able to create his or hers own unique level which will be put into the game at their request.

The game is based around the main character, with his unique friend 'Henry'. Henry follows the character around the game, and is always seen. One lucky contribute will have the privilege to give him a unique (appropriate) name.

This is my first project literally ever, and orginially started as just a way to test out some aspects while learning C#. However it turned into quite a hobby and have found a large interest into indie development and the community. Any funds will be much appreciated.
I can guarantee active development, although some days may be slower than others due to University activity.

Yet always feel free to email me at andrewleachy@gmail.com for any requests or anything really! Even if you need coding help hit me up with an email.

story:
A time-based battle game from the inspiration of Rise of Nations , Civilizations and Age of Empires.We want to turn this inspiration into a 3D 3rd person open world game.Together with the players or A.I you'll come across with to build an empire , slaughter your opponents and reclaim the war!

With no knowledge of any technology or science you'll start learning the basic natural knowledge, like how fire works and what it means.

"Well... Depends on how smart you are" In a logical sentence time continues and in that time you can experience new stories/adventures/skills in the game.

If you don't act faster then your opponents in research they can have a higher technology and science knowledge. Teamwork is very important.

Besides all that history, time, technology and science is the key in the game to beat your opponents or to survive.From communication(talking) to nuclear weapons and from walking to flying.

Our first build of the game.An abandoned tower.

An oil well.

There is no class specification in the game. "Be what you wanna be". 

With no traditional story like questing the player has to create it's own story.As the game unfolds, your story will be written, page by page.. Every story in the game is valuable for other players that can find valuable treasures or any other valuable objects in the game.
How far can you explore and discover area's in the world.We are trying to create the player's story as logical and realistic as possible with creatures of course.
Even A.I can have a story, they can love you or They wish you we're dead.

The key of the game is to reclaim every island and slaugther everyone , take them to join your empire or send them to prison .Lets walk through the features.

There are many features in the game but we are taking you through the most important features of the game.

Technology.

Creating a wheel to manufacturing a vehicle.Invent new materials to make the structure of a building more stronger and stable by the help of science.Build a factory to create objects more faster.Develop stronger machines or better armor.
Yes. a stick is your first weapon or shovel. 

Science.

From a monastery that invented paper to a university that discovered atoms.This is the most important feature of the game.Research formula's to invent new materials or to have better fuel for the machines.

The more players/A.I are helping doing research the faster your empire can invent or discover it.

Battle for your empire and reclaim your name of the war with every weapon your empire created/invented.

Each player takes a part of the ground in world to have an empire unless it has been claimed by another empire. Your objective is to defeat all of your nations enemies and reclaim that island with your name on it.

Once you are finished reclaiming that island..reclaimed the world.

Spying other nations to steal their belongings, destroy their trading posts/traffic  and capture their towns, destroy it or bombard them with a nuclear "Hello".

Bring cannons or tanks ,go airborn or go at sea .There are many ways to have a battle with your opponents.Bring everything your empire got!


One of the 7 island in the world. Concept art.

Each players starts at a random safe place in the world and join an nation or own empire that will ultimately rule all other empires/nations.

Weapons concept art.
There will be magic in the game, but its still in early stages of development. However, we'll promise it will have a big impact on the game.

The better you experience is with technology the better your weapons will be.Every weapon is customizable.Yes you can create your own Weapons!


Resources.

Everything needs resources a structure,weapon and even you.Without resources you can't do anything, you'll have to find it.

There are so many materials to have the options to create awesome things or to keep you survive the night.

An oil well is very useful to produce electricity, keep a tank's engine powered up or create other materials like plastic.



Don't abuse nature! If a player gathers too much resources then it usually produces by nature it will never grow back again."Don't Play Hard, Play Smart"


Engineering.

Also another awesome part of the game is to build everything to defend or attack.

From building a wooden cabin to protect you from the weather to building a skyscraper that manages the economy of your empire.

Yes, you really need to use a crane to lift heavy objects.

Each build needs a blueprint and an architect, share it with your empire and be able to build it faster with your people.Also with the right materials to create a structure stable enough. If it hasn't got the right material it will collapse.



Time.
Time continues no matter what happen you can't stop it.Even if there is a great battle going. Nothing will change the time not even magic.The smarter you are, the better history will be made ,everything is possible to create.Have a Tank at the year 1409.
Skills

Yes there are skills/professions involved in the game but not traditionally like levels with experience points.lets explain what we mean.

If you hit an nail with a hammer on a wooden plank you can hit your thumbs too. The more you are doing it the better you will be in it.It's just practicing.

While practicing certain professions your character can sustain injuries or even death.

  • Is this an MMO?
         No, Reclaimed War doesn't has the features to hold too many players in the                world.But if many supporters want Reclaimed War as a MMO we set it as a                    strech goal. 
  • What will happen if the Campaign didn't reached it's goal?
         It is indeed very hard to get a proper finance keeping the game alive.But what              will happen when the campaign reached it's goal? Simple answer is to                            continue, it's gonna take very long to complete the game. we are very confident          that we will succeed by our fellow supporters!
  • On what platform/operating system will it be released?
         Currently we are only planning to develop for Windows.Later in the future we              will support other operating systems.
  • Can you estimate the system requirements?
         We actually can't release the requirements yet, The game is still in                                    development.
  • Will there be an Alpha version released?
         Yes .The alpha version will be only for the people who supported this campaign.
  • Will the game be Free to Play or Subscription?
         No subscription , no Pay 2 Win. The only thing that there is, is that you buy it                once and enjoy. Making it fair for everyone.
  • Where is the money going to be spend on?


  • I really want to support this campaign but i have no money, how can i support this campaign in another way?
         We really appreciate your motivation for supporting the campaign and yes you          can support us in another way by just helping us get the attention! We also                  have a  quest for you and a REWARD!

         Facebook.
         50 likes on the post you have shared.
         A Thank you poster and marked as a Great Scout in the game.!

         500 likes on the post you have shared.
          Thank you poster and a custom T-Shirt ! Marked as a Expert Scout!

         1000 likes on the post you have shared.
         Thank you poster , custom T-Shirt and the game! Marked as a Master Scout!

         1000 likes + 10% pledged on the post you have shared.
        The Great Knight Perk

        Same goes to Google+

  • How can i keep tracking on the development process of the game?
         Visit our Website http://www.mythictek.com .
          For instant news http://www.blog.mythictek.com .
          For Instant dev news                                                                                                                             http://www.blog.mythictek.com/News/category/devnews/ .

  • What is this?


          That my fellow player is your reward from the Great knight and a higher rank it           will be yours you can have anything (game related) on it. Like your enemies                 head ,your whole character or your most valuable achievement.
          A Noble Statue a 12 Inch and 600 gram statue.
  •   When will the rewards be send?
          The perks will be send after the campaign ends.Except the game.

         We are always open for other questions send us a mail or visit our social media.
          info@mythictek.com 


        Thank You!

        MythicTek

With no knowledge of any technology or science you'll start learning the basic natural knowledge, like how fire works and what it means.
"Well... Depends on how smart you are" In a logical sentence time continues and in that time you can experience new stories/adventures/skills in the game.
If you don't act faster then your opponents in research they can have a higher technology and science knowledge. Teamwork is very important.
Besides all that history, time, technology and science is the key in the game to beat your opponents or to survive.From communication(talking) to nuclear weapons and from walking to flying.


Our first build of the game.An abandoned tower.

An oil well.There is no class specification in the game. "Be what you wanna be".   

With no traditional story like questing the player has to create it's own story.As the game unfolds, your story will be written, page by page.. Every story in the game is valuable for other players that can find valuable treasures or any other valuable objects in the game.
How far can you explore and discover area's in the world.We are trying to create the player's story as logical and realistic as possible with creatures of course.Even A.I can have a story, they can love you or They wish you we're dead.  

The key of the game is to reclaim every island and slaugther everyone , take them to join your empire or send them to prison .Lets walk through the features.
There are many features in the game but we are taking you through the most important features of the game.

Technology.

Creating a wheel to manufacturing a vehicle.Invent new materials to make the structure of a building more stronger and stable by the help of science.Build a factory to create objects more faster.Develop stronger machines or better armor.

Yes. a stick is your first weapon or shovel. 

Science.

From a monastery that invented paper to a university that discovered atoms.This is the most important feature of the game.Research formula's to invent new materials or to have better fuel for the machines.

The more players/A.I are helping doing research the faster your empire can invent or discover it.
    


Battle for your empire and reclaim your name of the war with every weapon your empire created/invented.
Each player takes a part of the ground in world to have an empire unless it has been claimed by another empire. Your objective is to defeat all of your nations enemies and reclaim that island with your name on it.
Once you are finished reclaiming that island..reclaimed the world.
Spying other nations to steal their belongings, destroy their trading posts/traffic  and capture their towns, destroy it or bombard them with a nuclear "Hello".
Bring cannons or tanks ,go airborn or go at sea .There are many ways to have a battle with your opponents.Bring everything your empire got!



One of the 7 island in the world. Concept art.

Each players starts at a random safe place in the world and join an nation or own empire that will ultimately rule all other empires/nations.




Weapons concept art.
There will be magic in the game, but its still in early stages of development. However, we'll promise it will have a big impact on the game.

The better you experience is with technology the better your weapons will be.Every weapon is customizable.Yes you can create your own Weapons!
    


Resources.
Everything needs resources a structure,weapon and even you.Without resources you can't do anything, you'll have to find it.
There are so many materials to have the options to create awesome things or to keep you survive the night.
An oil well is very useful to produce electricity, keep a tank's engine powered up or create other materials like plastic.

 Don't abuse nature! If a player gathers too much resources then it usually produces by nature it will never grow back again."Don't Play Hard, Play Smart"

Engineering.Also another awesome part of the game is to build everything to defend or attack.From building a wooden cabin to protect you from the weather to building a skyscraper that manages the economy of your empire.

Yes, you really need to use a crane to lift heavy objects.
Each build needs a blueprint and an architect, share it with your empire and be able to build it faster with your people.Also with the right materials to create a structure stable enough. If it hasn't got the right material it will collapse.

Time.Time continues no matter what happen you can't stop it.Even if there is a great battle going. Nothing will change the time not even magic.The smarter you are, the better history will be made ,everything is possible to create.Have a Tank at the year 1409.
Skills
Yes there are skills/professions involved in the game but not traditionally like levels with experience points.lets explain what we mean.
If you hit an nail with a hammer on a wooden plank you can hit your thumbs too. The more you are doing it the better you will be in it.It's just practicing.
While practicing certain professions your character can sustain injuries or even death.




Is this an MMO?

         No, Reclaimed War doesn't has the features to hold too many players in the                world.But if many supporters want Reclaimed War as a MMO we set it as a                    strech goal. 

What will happen if the Campaign didn't reached it's goal?

         It is indeed very hard to get a proper finance keeping the game alive.But what              will happen when the campaign reached it's goal? Simple answer is to                            continue, it's gonna take very long to complete the game. we are very confident          that we will succeed by our fellow supporters!

On what platform/operating system will it be released?

         Currently we are only planning to develop for Windows.Later in the future we              will support other operating systems.

Can you estimate the system requirements?
         We actually can't release the requirements yet, The game is still in                                    development.

Will there be an Alpha version released?

         Yes .The alpha version will be only for the people who supported this campaign.


Will the game be Free to Play or Subscription?

         No subscription , no Pay 2 Win. The only thing that there is, is that you buy it                once and enjoy. Making it fair for everyone.

Where is the money going to be spend on?




I really want to support this campaign but i have no money, how can i support this campaign in another way?
         We really appreciate your motivation for supporting the campaign and yes you          can support us in another way by just helping us get the attention! We also                  have a  quest for you and a REWARD!


         Facebook.
         50 likes on the post you have shared.
         A Thank you poster and marked as a Great Scout in the game.!

         500 likes on the post you have shared.

          Thank you poster and a custom T-Shirt ! Marked as a Expert Scout!

         1000 likes on the post you have shared.

         Thank you poster , custom T-Shirt and the game! Marked as a Master Scout!

         1000 likes + 10% pledged on the post you have shared.
        The Great Knight Perk

        Same goes to Google+


How can i keep tracking on the development process of the game?

         Visit our Website http://www.mythictek.com .
          For instant news http://www.blog.mythictek.com .
          For Instant dev news                                                                                                                             http://www.blog.mythictek.com/News/category/devnews/ .


What is this?





          That my fellow player is your reward from the Great knight and a higher rank it           will be yours you can have anything (game related) on it. Like your enemies                 head ,your whole character or your most valuable achievement.
          A Noble Statue a 12 Inch and 600 gram statue.  When will the rewards be send?          The perks will be send after the campaign ends.Except the game.         We are always open for other questions send us a mail or visit our social media.          info@mythictek.com 





        Thank You!
        MythicTek

story:
Thank you for your contribution to our campaign.

Next steps for the HMC game:

In April 2014, Healthy Minds Canada launched a crowdfunding campaign with a goal of raising money and awareness about our first in a planned series of fun mobile games designed to improve empathy and teach coping skills around mental health issues in youth ages 9-16.

Our campaign closed at 11:59pm on May 1st.  Thanks to your generosity, HMC raised just $5,757 (two people donated $450 via cheques), which covered the costs of developing the prototype.  It’s not a secret that this is not quite the amount that we had hoped to raise.  However, we were thrilled with the amount of support we got from you in the form of blog and article posts about our game, page views, tweets and re-tweets, and Facebook posts, shares and likes.

Have a look at our numbers:

1,681 Unique Indiegogo Page Hits (5,594 total)
4,400 people e-mailed
470 Tweets & 420 Facebook Shares resulted in 483 Social Media Referrals
65 people donated a total of $5,757
(2 people donated $450 via cheques)

While HMC was busy promoting this campaign, our developers, Mojility, were busy building a “game within a game” called “The Distractinator.”  It’s designed to promote focusing on a single given task, which may help people with a variety of mental health issues (ADHD, Anxiety, Depression) who often find external stimuli easily distract them.  In this app, the user is must focus on a particular stimulus (a shape) while disregarding other external stimuli (other shapes). It will be available on the iTunes store and Google Play for free; HMC will provide a link to it once it is available. While we work on finding funding for our Anti-Bullying game, we’d like to offer you this game as a thank you for supporting our campaign.

HMC is still committed to provide a safe, online tool that facilitates a process of thinking about situations and experiences that can help the user explore, learn, build resilience, and become a responsible, compassionate citizen in their off-line lives and over the next few months, we will be reaching out to potential partners and sponsors for our first game.

Why Healthy Minds Canada is entering the Mobile Game space:

Many of you know that HMC hosts pan-Canada Youth Summits and, over the past five years, results have clearly shown that young people are very eager to talk about and learn about mental health issues.  At these summits, youth learn from other youth that it’s OK to talk about mental health issues and that asking for help is not a sign of weakness.  But we have also learned that it can be difficult to apply such teachings into their own lives.

So we decided to create something that can combine a teen’s passive coping skills – such as tuning out and playing video games – with active coping skills which include learning strategies that help actively process the physical and emotional stress that is part of life.

HMC understands that young people have smart phones, use them constantly, and love games!  And games can provide a safe environment where it is OK to make mistakes and explore options while seeking solutions to a variety of challenges teens and young adults face in their daily lives.

Our games will be designed to help teach users what it feels like to have a mental illness – thereby improving empathy, ways of coping if they do have one, and tips and suggestions for healthier living.

In short, Healthy Minds Canada is still committed to finding and providing innovative ways to help young people learn about, and live with, mental illness.

Healthy Minds Canada: Building Empathy With Mobile Games

  • 47% of Canadian parents report having a child victim of bullying
  • 89% of Canadian Teachers say bullying & cyberbullying are serious problems in schools
  • At least 1 in 3 adolescent students in Canada have reported being bullied recently

Lower empathy levels have been linked to increased frequencies of bullying behaviours in youth.

We are asking YOU to help us raise funds to develop our first game of a series of mental health mobile apps. This first game/app will be designed to increase empathy in the user through a variety of scenario-based challenges and mini-games, and will deal with the subject of bullying.

Why does empathy matter in bullying prevention and coping?

A variety of research has shown that building empathetic skills and levels in youth can affect positive changes in behaviours, specifically in relation to a reduction in the frequency of engaging in bullying behaviours.

The app, which is aimed at 9-16 year-olds, will reward players with points that can later be deemed as currency at a variety of online stores for goods and services enjoyed in everyday life. Additionally, Pollara (a polling research company) will periodically survey the user as the game progresses, using the results to analyze and gauge the changes in empathetic responses. As additional incentive, points will also be rewarded to complete these surveys.

HMC will be offering this app as a FREE download. 

But it won’t be developed without your help!  So please, donate today!

*All Canadian donors will receive a charitable tax receipt for their contribution(s) following this campaign. 

Press Coverage

Healthy Minds Canada Is Putting the Spotlight on Youth Bullying With New Game (Betakit.com)

Keeping Minds Healthy: Bullying Prevention Games & More (BullyingEpidemic.com)

“As the husband of a high school guidance councillor, I’ve had the chance to see the very real impact that bullying has not just on victims but also on their family and friends. We have a responsibility as adults and role models to do everything within our power to protect our kids. As parents, we know that we owe our kids a brighter and safer future than the one we inherited. I’m honoured to add my name to the list of those supporting this initiative by Healthy Minds Canada. We can never do enough to end bullying because we are always reminded that one victim is one victim too many.”

"Empowering young people to become effective agents of change in their communities is essential if we want to improve behaviours of future generations. Healthy Minds Canada is working to do just that through the development of a new mobile game that is designed to raise empathy and teach coping and preventative skills."

"Really interesting. The app looks fascinating. Good luck!"

 - Roman Krznaric, founder of the world’s first Empathy Library and author of Empathy: A Handbook for Revolution.  His blog, dedicated to empathy and the art of living, has been featured in the media around the world.


Our Goal:

HMC is seeking YOUR support to help reach our goal of $45,000.

Any money raised over and above the goal amount will be put towards future levels/challenges. 

In addition to donating financially – or if you cannot afford to donate – another awesome way you can help us is to spread the news about this campaign! Please share the links displayed at the bottom of this page with your network. Let them know about our campaign and our game.

What Your Money Will be Used For:

The money will be used to pay for the development of what will be the first in Healthy Minds Canada’s new mobile game ecosystem.

The single biggest cost will be for the development of the game itself, but funding will also be used for a portion of the marketing (like the video you see on this page), and all the other costs that a video game start up will incur. HMC has already invested $6,000 into the development of the game’s prototype.

If Healthy Minds Canada exceeds our $45,000 target by $1,000-$3,000, the extra money will go to enhancing the artwork of the game and making revisions post-testing and prior to final market. We may also do some additional marketing to reach a wider audience.

Please note that if HMC does not meet the $45,000 goal, 100% of contributed funds will still be used for the project, however development of the game will be delayed.


If Healthy Minds Canada exceeds our goal by $3,000-$40,000 we will put this funding towards our next level or game, which will focus on Depression or Anxiety.

If HMC exceeds our goal by over $40,000 we will be able to being development of the second game in our gaming ecosystem.

Contact us about the HMC game:

Technical Questions: Stacey Vetzal – stacey[at]healthymindscanada.ca

Other inquiries: Katie W. Robinette – krobinette[at]healthymindscanada.ca

Share This Page:

Bullying & Empathy Quick Facts

  • 47% of Canadian parents report having a child victim of bullying
  • The rate of discrimination experienced among students who identify as LGBTQ is three times higher than heterosexual youth
  • At least 1 in 3 adolescent students in Canada have reported being bullied recently
  • Girls are more likely to be bullied on the Internet than boys
  • 89% of Canadian Teachers say bullying & cyberbullying are serious problems in schools
  • low empathy levels have been linked to increased frequencies of bullying behaviours

About Healthy Minds Canada

Healthy Minds Canada (HMC) is a national charity that raises funds to support research and education and raise awareness about mental illness and addictions. Since 1980, HMC has funded 400 research projects at 42 universities and teaching hospitals across Canada.

story:
Our Story

While facing humanity on earth one of the fiercest battles planetary, a group of scientists building a drone capable of exploring space in search of unknown worlds where they can live.
However, space is not empty and, in the course of exploration, the drone will be called upon to use their weapons to defend themselves from predators at best alien and unknown forms of life.
Nothing will be simple and no previous knowledge can be useful.
It will require great cunning, courage and adaptability.
Only one astronaut will conduct this great drone hoping to find a new place to live in peace.


Development

We're already in development of the first 4 missions with 4 different difficulty levels and a hangar with 20 different drone ships.
The game will be available on IPhone/iPad/Mac/Android/Windows platforms and finally on Web.
This game is funded by its players, and, in the Web Edition it will be available from any computer for free.
The more you add to the pot, the bigger the game gets, the faster it develops, and the richer the content becomes. 
We will continue to work on it as hard as we can until possible with our money.
Once it’s gone to market, and we can cover our costs, we will continue to develop new missions.
Once it hits market it’ll generate a revenue stream of its own, but until then, it’s on you. 
This game belongs to its community.


Our Goals

If we raise: 

10 thousand: We get half way to completion of the game for all mobile platform and Mac. 

25 Thousand:We can deliver the full game on mobile platforms and Mac. 

45 Thousand: We can deliver the game also on Windows, setup an online community and start developing the Web Edition. 

70 Thousand: At this point we can complete the web edition so each player can play both from computer and mobile. The community will have achievement boards, leaderboards and an add-on market. We plan to implement at least 10 missions just to start the community.

100 Thousand: The community will have realtime player versus player and global spaces for community battles.
The game will be configured to be played as social massive multiplayer online game for free.

story:
TRACER is Swiftpoint's latest premium gaming mouse, designed to help you play better and win more! With feedback from our previous 2017 CES gaming innovation of the year mouse, The Z, we were motivated to deliver on three key user requests when creating TRACER;

  1. Awesome Driver Software: powerful, customizable, yet intuitive & easy-to-use
     
  2. Auto-game detection:  expert profiles auto-loaded – play straight out of the box
     
  3. Amazing Value: premium unique features like deep click but at an amazing price

Hi, we're Swiftpoint, a small technology company from New Zealand. We believe in pushing the boundaries and challenging the status quo. 

Swiftpoint has a history of creating unique, CES award-winning products, four of which were made possible through crowdfunding. Now we’re back to do it again, and are very excited to introduce TRACER.

It’s time to change the game and play different!

We’ve been developing specialized software to support our unique hardware products for a decade now, and have learned a thing or two over the years. By leveraging our experience and building on our current software products we’ve come up with a powerful, yet user-friendly software suite for TRACER.

Not only has it had a ‘face-lift’ in terms of the way it looks, but it’s also now easier to set up and use. In fact, we’ve aimed to make it so easy to use, by adding auto-game detection and pre-loaded gaming profiles, that you don’t even need to touch it... unless you want to…

 

We know that setting-up and learning new software can be tedious, and take up valuable time that you’d rather spend gaming. So from installation right through to set up, we’ve made it easy. Plug TRACER in, download the software, begin playing your favorite game, and we'll do the rest - it’s that easy!

TRACER’s software will detect what games you have installed on your computer and automatically install our expert profiles for any games we support, so you don’t have to spend time messing around with keybinds.

 

If you want to make tweaks to a profile, simply use the game-specific ‘action libraries’, which allows you to select what each button does from a dropdown list that matches the game you’re playing. No more switching between the game menu and your desktop to set up the software - customization made easy!

 

When you launch a game, TRACER will switch to the correct profile, automatically and instantly. No more forgetting to activate the correct profile, no more minimizing mid-game to access the software, and no need to create a single basic profile that sort of works (but not very well...) for every game you own.
 

It’s not enough to just create a world-class gaming mouse, we wanted to make it as affordable as we could to get it into as many hands as possible.

With TRACER, we’ve opted to bring you a more streamlined feature-set to focus on the most loved features at a reduced price. We’ve then coupled this feature refinement with further savings by having our production team undertake an excruciating review of every single component of our Swiftpoint Z gaming mouse. They’ve optimized them to the nth degree, negotiated the best possible prices, and ordered bulk manufacturing in advance.

To lock-in pricing, we’ve already gone ahead and built the first production run of mice, ready for launch.

Get in quick to grab yourself TRACER at our special crowdfunding launch price!

 

Adding to the impressive lineup of 13 buttons, TRACER's two left mouse buttons have built-in pressure sensors. ‘Deep click’ gives you more buttons and more flexibility - click normally for one action, or harder for another action. Each 'Deep Click' button can have up to 3 actions assigned to it!

For example;

Fortnite - Shoot and then deep click to instantly build a wall

 

World of Warcraft - Trigger a skill and then deep click to activate it instantly.

 

Overwatch - Roadhog's Shrapnel Ball, Chain hook, and melee attack

 

 

Some other useful examples include;

  • Crouch / prone - Press normally to crouch, press hard to instantly go prone
  • Sniper button - press one button reduce your sensitivity, then press harder to fire
  • Rapid reload / weapon switch - use left click to fire, then press hard to instantly begin reloading, or to switch to your secondary weapon
  • Or, use deep click to set up your own commonly used combo
     

TRACER supports all software and games, and includes pre-made gaming profiles for leading games, including: Apex Legends, Borderlands 3, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, PlayerUnknown's BattleGrounds, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Dota 2, Final Fantasy XIV Online, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six, Fortnite, Overwatch, League of Legends, and World of Warcraft.

 

Auto profile switching is when our software automatically selects the correct profile based on what you're currently playing. Our software will detect when you launch one of our supported games and automatically enable that profile. 

 

 

Our TRACER software comes pre-loaded with a selection of game specific 'Action Libraries'. These 'Action Libraries' contain all of the default keybinds for supported games. They allow you to easily configure your mouse simply choosing the game-specific action that you want on that button. 

For example, to change the Left Trigger button from 'Drop Weapon' to 'Smoke Grenade' simply click on the drop down box and find (or type) 'grenade'. 

 

 

 

To create your own game profile, click on the 'Create Profile' button, give your profile a name and away you go. You can also choose to add an icon and link to the game so it will be switched to automatically. 

Once you've created your profile, set up your mappings by clicking on any button, pressing the 'keyboard recorder' icon and then pressing the keyboard button that you'd like to bind. It's as easy as that!

 

 

 

You will receive;

  • 1 TRACER gaming mouse
  • 1 set of tall trigger button caps
  • 1 set of short trigger button caps
  • 1 set of long fingertip button caps
  • 1 set of short fingertip button caps

 

 

Additionally, you’ll get access to;

  • TRACER advanced customization software
  • Access to at least 12 pre-made gaming profiles
  • Access to at least 12 game specific ‘action libraries’ + useful extras
  • Lifetime software and firmware updates

 

 

 

 

PHYSICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Number of buttons: 13
  • Number of ‘Deep Click’ buttons: 2
  • Length: 5.11 in / 130mm
  • Width (over main body): 2.59 in / 66mm
  • Width (over wings): 3.58 in / 91mm
  • Height: 1.69 in / 43mm
  • Weight (excluding cable): 4 ⅛ ounces / 117 grams
  • Cable length: 6.89 ft / 2.1 m
     

PERFORMANCE SPECIFICATIONS

  • Resolution: 200 - 12,000 DPI
  • Max. acceleration: 50 G acceleration
  • Max. speed: 450 inches per second (IPS) 
  • Max. USB Report Rate: 1 millisecond (1000Hz)
  • Onboard memory (store 20+ game profiles)
     

HARDWARE SPECIFICATIONS

  • Sensor type: Optical
  • Sensor model: PIXART PMW3360 advanced optical sensor
  • Switches: OMRON mechanical switches rated up to 20 million clicks
  • Gaming-grade tactile scroll wheel
  • Durable braided cable
  • Ergonomic right-handed design with adjustable button caps
  • RGB lighting with customizable color options
  • Replaceable rubber grips
  • Long-life PTFE feet

 

"Mouse makers the world over have a lot of catching up to do.” - Overclock 3D.

This is still true. If you want the most advanced gaming mouse ever then you can purchase The Z as part of this campaign at an extraordinary price. Why? We are a little overstocked with this mouse and have had our share of trouble with distribution given the changes in the world with COVID. Watch the video below!

The Z is the world’s first mouse to pivot, tilt and roll, with a brand-new way of clicking buttons - meaning you can access dozens of different button actions while barely moving your fingers.

Want to read more about the Z? Check out our campaign on Indiegogo here!

"The Z, has analog control capabilities and may have a legitimate claim to 'worlds most advanced gaming mouse' Seth Colaner, Tom's Hardware

"This mouse has an accelerometer, gyroscope, 50 buttons, and an OLED display to make you the ultimate gamer", The Verge

"This will be the go-to gaming mouse for the next half decade", Henry Lane - Executive at CerebralFix (award winning game development company).

TRACER has already been manufactured and has been moved to our fulfilment partner's warehouse in Hong Kong, awaiting shipping to you. All orders will be shipped directly by our fulfilment partner to your door. 

Please note, reward prices do not include taxes, VAT or duties. Shipments will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country and any costs will be the responsiblity of the backer.

If you are unsure of your country’s customs policy please check with your local authority.

 

 

We’ve made TRACER already and are just polishing the software now.

We’ve only made 2,400 TRACER’s and have just 2,000 Z’s available at the special price in this campaign and so we believe if ‘our secret got out to the world’ (we make the best award-winning computer mice) these mice would be snapped up immediately and we would be left needing to urgently manufacture some more!

There is NO RISK and we would ask you to spread the word and share this campaign
story_txt:
TRACER is Swiftpoint's latest premium gaming mouse, designed to help you play better and win more! With feedback from our previous 2017 CES gaming innovation of the year mouse, The Z, we were motivated to deliver on three key user requests when creating TRACER;

Awesome Driver Software: powerful, customizable, yet intuitive & easy-to-use 

Auto-game detection:  expert profiles auto-loaded – play straight out of the box 

Amazing Value: premium unique features like deep click but at an amazing price
Hi, we're Swiftpoint, a small technology company from New Zealand. We believe in pushing the boundaries and challenging the status quo. Swiftpoint has a history of creating unique, CES award-winning products, four of which were made possible through crowdfunding. Now we’re back to do it again, and are very excited to introduce TRACER.It’s time to change the game and play different!We’ve been developing specialized software to support our unique hardware products for a decade now, and have learned a thing or two over the years. By leveraging our experience and building on our current software products we’ve come up with a powerful, yet user-friendly software suite for TRACER.Not only has it had a ‘face-lift’ in terms of the way it looks, but it’s also now easier to set up and use. In fact, we’ve aimed to make it so easy to use, by adding auto-game detection and pre-loaded gaming profiles, that you don’t even need to touch it... unless you want to… We know that setting-up and learning new software can be tedious, and take up valuable time that you’d rather spend gaming. So from installation right through to set up, we’ve made it easy. Plug TRACER in, download the software, begin playing your favorite game, and we'll do the rest - it’s that easy!TRACER’s software will detect what games you have installed on your computer and automatically install our expert profiles for any games we support, so you don’t have to spend time messing around with keybinds. If you want to make tweaks to a profile, simply use the game-specific ‘action libraries’, which allows you to select what each button does from a dropdown list that matches the game you’re playing. No more switching between the game menu and your desktop to set up the software - customization made easy! When you launch a game, TRACER will switch to the correct profile, automatically and instantly. No more forgetting to activate the correct profile, no more minimizing mid-game to access the software, and no need to create a single basic profile that sort of works (but not very well...) for every game you own. It’s not enough to just create a world-class gaming mouse, we wanted to make it as affordable as we could to get it into as many hands as possible.With TRACER, we’ve opted to bring you a more streamlined feature-set to focus on the most loved features at a reduced price. We’ve then coupled this feature refinement with further savings by having our production team undertake an excruciating review of every single component of our Swiftpoint Z gaming mouse. They’ve optimized them to the nth degree, negotiated the best possible prices, and ordered bulk manufacturing in advance.To lock-in pricing, we’ve already gone ahead and built the first production run of mice, ready for launch.Get in quick to grab yourself TRACER at our special crowdfunding launch price! Adding to the impressive lineup of 13 buttons, TRACER's two left mouse buttons have built-in pressure sensors. ‘Deep click’ gives you more buttons and more flexibility - click normally for one action, or harder for another action. Each 'Deep Click' button can have up to 3 actions assigned to it!For example;Fortnite - Shoot and then deep click to instantly build a wall World of Warcraft - Trigger a skill and then deep click to activate it instantly. Overwatch - Roadhog's Shrapnel Ball, Chain hook, and melee attack  Some other useful examples include;

Crouch / prone - Press normally to crouch, press hard to instantly go prone

Sniper button - press one button reduce your sensitivity, then press harder to fire

Rapid reload / weapon switch - use left click to fire, then press hard to instantly begin reloading, or to switch to your secondary weapon
Or, use deep click to set up your own commonly used combo 
TRACER supports all software and games, and includes pre-made gaming profiles for leading games, including: Apex Legends, Borderlands 3, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, PlayerUnknown's BattleGrounds, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Dota 2, Final Fantasy XIV Online, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six, Fortnite, Overwatch, League of Legends, and World of Warcraft. Auto profile switching is when our software automatically selects the correct profile based on what you're currently playing. Our software will detect when you launch one of our supported games and automatically enable that profile.   Our TRACER software comes pre-loaded with a selection of game specific 'Action Libraries'. These 'Action Libraries' contain all of the default keybinds for supported games. They allow you to easily configure your mouse simply choosing the game-specific action that you want on that button. For example, to change the Left Trigger button from 'Drop Weapon' to 'Smoke Grenade' simply click on the drop down box and find (or type) 'grenade'.    To create your own game profile, click on the 'Create Profile' button, give your profile a name and away you go. You can also choose to add an icon and link to the game so it will be switched to automatically. Once you've created your profile, set up your mappings by clicking on any button, pressing the 'keyboard recorder' icon and then pressing the keyboard button that you'd like to bind. It's as easy as that! 

 
 You will receive;
1 TRACER gaming mouse
1 set of tall trigger button caps
1 set of short trigger button caps
1 set of long fingertip button caps
1 set of short fingertip button caps
  Additionally, you’ll get access to;
TRACER advanced customization software
Access to at least 12 pre-made gaming profiles
Access to at least 12 game specific ‘action libraries’ + useful extras
Lifetime software and firmware updates
    PHYSICAL SPECIFICATIONS
Number of buttons: 13
Number of ‘Deep Click’ buttons: 2
Length: 5.11 in / 130mm
Width (over main body): 2.59 in / 66mm
Width (over wings): 3.58 in / 91mm
Height: 1.69 in / 43mm
Weight (excluding cable): 4 ⅛ ounces / 117 grams
Cable length: 6.89 ft / 2.1 m 
PERFORMANCE SPECIFICATIONS
Resolution: 200 - 12,000 DPI
Max. acceleration: 50 G acceleration
Max. speed: 450 inches per second (IPS) 
Max. USB Report Rate: 1 millisecond (1000Hz)
Onboard memory (store 20+ game profiles) 
HARDWARE SPECIFICATIONS
Sensor type: Optical
Sensor model: PIXART PMW3360 advanced optical sensor
Switches: OMRON mechanical switches rated up to 20 million clicks
Gaming-grade tactile scroll wheel

story:
We are Radiation Touch Games, a small game developer company from Norway housing two developers with several years of experience using programs such as 3DSMax, Photoshop, Visual Studio and similar programs. As we earlier only used these programs in our sparetime to make fun doodles, silly programs or high poly 3D models, we went on a mission to bring this combined knowledge into something useful. The choice was simple, to make a game. Never a second was that decision given a second thought, long developing time do not scare us. Why? Because this have been a lifelong dream with the possibility of coming true. 
Our very first game is called Twisted Universe, and with that game, we aim to make an impact. To bring something new, something truly unique to the market. That is what we stand for. 
 
Why are we here on IndieGoGo exactly? Now that is actually a pretty good question, therefore it deserves a good answer. Because making a game does not only require effort and time, but also money and dedication. We have got a lot of time on our hands, we are ready to make the effort, and we certainly have the dedication required. Sadly we lack the funds to make the game a reality within a reasonable amount of time. We have tried to find outside funding, but it has been hard to find something without any strings or shady deals attached to it. Running the risk of going bankrupt before the game has released is not really an option. So that is why we are here, we need your help on this one!
 
The money will be strictly used to cover the expenses involved in making the game. Like paying for licenses for the 3D software and hardware, but also to advertise and put our word out. We tried to find equipment we could pay for with monopoly bills, but people seemed to like real life money better. Our landlord also insists on us paying monthly sums for our office space and electricity. So does our Internet service provider too for the connection to the world wide web.
We therefore ask politely for 50 000 US Dollars as it will cover the basic things we need. The more money we raise beyond that point, the better the equipment we can acquire. The better the equipment, the more content we can make before the initial release. Why more content you say? Because the better the computers, the shorter the rendering and compiling time. 
 
We are not asking for your money without giving you anything, bandits do, and you get to shoot a lot of bandits in Twisted Universe when it is released. We do not blame you for wanting something in return for helping us out, and we will do our best to give you something cool for your effort and hard earned money. Here are some of the perks for you to enjoy:
 
$25 or more give you (Main Pack)
*Exclusive IndieGoGo Wallpaper Pack
*Your name engraved on our supporter wall at our Website Radiationtouch.com/Walloffame
*Your name in the credits roll of the finished game
*The full digital copy of the game (Retail price for game only, is $30)
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia.
 
If you are fast, pledge $35 or more and add $20 for international shipping and we give you:
*Exclusive IndieGoGo Wallpaper Pack
*Your name engraved on our supporter wall at our Website Radiationtouch.com/walloffame
*Your name in the credits roll of the finished game
*Beta key
*The full game on a limited edition USB card (Retail price $40)
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia
Remember, there are only 250 available at this price.
 
$60 or more and add $20 for international shipping will grant you 
*Exclusive IndieGoGo Wallpaper Pack
*Your name engraved on our supporter wall at our Website Radiationtouch.com/walloffame
*Your name in the credits roll of the finished game
*Beta key
*The full game on a limited edition USB card (Retail price $40)
*Digital Artbook
*Digital copy of the soundtrack
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia
 
$150 or more and add $30 for international shipping will grant you
*Exclusive IndieGoGo Wallpaper Pack
*Your name engraved on our supporter wall at our Website Radiationtouch.com/walloffame
*Your name in the credits roll of the finished game
*Alpha Access
*Beta key
*The full game on a limited edition USB card (Retail price $40)
*Digital Artbook
*Digital copy of the soundtrack
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia
*Choose between 4 Vinyl printed special edition posters 90x50cm size.
 
$500 Super Exclusive packs give you:
*Exclusive IndieGoGo Wallpaper Pack
*Your name engraved on our supporter wall at our Website Radiationtouch.com/walloffame
*Your name in the credits roll of the finished game
*Alpha Access
*Beta key
*The full game on a limited edition USB card (Retail price $40)
*Digital Artbook
*Digital copy of the soundtrack
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia
*Choose between 4 Vinyl printed special edition posters 90x50cm size.
*1 out of 20 special edition 240x76cm 480g Vinyl print posters signed by the producers.
 
$1000 or more will give you the opportunity to have:
*Exclusive IndieGoGo Wallpaper Pack
*Your name engraved on our supporter wall at our Website Radiationtouch.com/walloffame
*Your name in the credits roll of the finished game
*Alpha Access
*Beta key
*The full game on a limited edition USB card (Retail price $40)
*Digital Artbook
*Digital copy of the soundtrack
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia
*Choose between 4 Vinyl printed special edition posters 90x50cm size.
*Choose between 4 Vinyl printed special edition posters 120x76cm size.
*Help design an enemy entity to gun to pieces, choose between a fightership or  a Crewmember on the mothership at the end of a level. 
 
 
$50 000: Our Primary Milestone, this will help us:
*Acquire new equipment
*Visit the Norwegian Gaming convention SpillExpo this November
*Advertise
*Pay monthly fees for housing, internet and electricity.
*Acquire necessary licenses.
*Acquire Voice actors and Musicians
 
$75 000: Our secondary milestone, this will help us:
*The same as $50 000 Milestone +
*Make a modkit shortly after release.
*Port the game to Android and iOS
 
$100 000: Our third Milestone, this will help us:
*The same as previous milestones + 
*Acquire development kits for the PS3, Xbox 360 and eventually Wii U
 and eventually port the game to those consoles.
If we do not reach our goal, which would be unfortunate, but of course understandable. We will still do the best we can with the money we are in fact able to raise. However, if we are not able to raise the $50 000 we ask for, chances are we may not be able to make all the content we want to before the time of release. In worst cases, we may have to delay the release.
Twisted Universe is our very first project here at Radiation Touch Games. Featuring a Sidescroller shooter gameplay / FPS gameplay style set in various parts throughout the Universe. Upon starting the game, you take the role as Aeleen Riigel, the newest addition to the United Space Federations elite squad. As a rookie you finally get to play with the big guys with fancy ranks and fat paychecks. It is a dream come true, until your first mission goes horribly wrong, and you are forced to abandon your past life and start over from the very beginning.
 The main gameplay will be covered by a Sidescroller Shooter style experience. You traverse from point A to the left side to point B on the right side much like the same way that Super Mario works. Just put mario and the whole mushroom kingdom aside and replace him with a ship midair, and the mushroom kingdom with a part of the universe you will be visiting for a brief period.
The map will autoscroll and so you will be able to move back and forth, up and down to cover all parts of the visible space. On your way you will encounter resitance more than happy to sacrifice themselves for the greater good of their master or treasure. 
 
Seing as you can modify the ship with a variety of weapon setups you are likely to have the firepower to gun the unfortunate souls to pieces. But if the ship is a agile as a cow, you may not stand much of a chance. Changing your ship may help you navigate through the hail of bullets, a lighter ship however will have less space for lovely guns, so choose wisely between your options. 
If you are skilled enough to make it to Point B you are very likely to encounter a boss, and this guy is not playing around. 
 
The boss is not just your average fightervessel, it is the mothership of the opposite fleet you are gunning for. Judging by the difference in size between the two of you, your puny little ship should not be a match for such a battlecruiser. Lucky for you, size is not all. When you tap the motherships hull to a certain degree, you will be able to ram your little fightership straight into the mothership.
 
The battle is not over yet. As you ram the mothership and break through its hull, you change from Sidescroller gameplay to a FPS style gameplay. You are now in the belly of the beast, and it is all up to you and your personalized firearms to run for the captain. You will have to put your moral to the test as you plow through armed workers and security guards on your run for the big guy. When the big guy is done for, and/or you have aquired what you came for, the mission is over and you can collect your reward as soon as you have gotten out of the raging inferno you left the mothership and its crew in.  ¨
We make this type of game possible vith the Unreal Engine 3. As a bonus we can offer you beautiful 3D graphics in the main 2D environment, and an engaging FPS style gameplay for the close quarter shootouts. 
We do not expect the world to change with Twisted Universe. But we aim to make an impact on the world of gaming. The world of gaming is falling into a repetitive cycle were one tries to copy the next because it "sells". We want to make something different, something that no one has seen before, to make something new and entertaining to fellow gamers. Twisted Universe will be a cocktail with FPS and Sidescroller shooter action where you will have more freedom to fight the way you want to fight, and now we are not just talking about buying new equipment, but also customizing it. We do not plan on making it a casual game with a super easy difficulty level on ultra hard, so how you customize your loadout will have a lot to say for the game. Expect to die a lot, and expect a lot of trial and error. We want it to be a challenge, not a cakewalk, as you are supposed to eat the cake, not walk on it. 
Do not worry if you cannot back us, if you just do not have the money, we understand. If you still want to help us, then there still is a way. Simply share this Campaign with as many people as you possibly can, use the built-in tools IndieGoGo offer for sharing and spread the word as loud as you can! The louder the better! If you are able to back us, it would mean a lot if you could spread the word as well! However you help us, remember you will have a special place among the galaxies.
 
Discalaimer: Twisted Universe is still a work in progress and is subject to change. What you see is not representing the final product, but it is however visualizing what the final product may look like. Twisted Universe' launch date is 23rd of August 2013, but can be subject to delay.

*Beta key
*The full game on a limited edition USB card (Retail price $40)
*Digital Artbook
*Digital copy of the soundtrack
*Our devoted love, and a sincere hello from Radia
*Choose between 4 Vinyl printed special edition posters 90x50cm size.
*Choose between 4 Vinyl printed special edition posters 120x76cm size.

*Help design an enemy entity to gun to pieces, choose between a fightership or  a Crewmember on the mothership at the end of a level. 
 

 
$50 000: Our Primary Milestone, this will help us:

*Acquire new equipment
*Visit the Norwegian Gaming convention SpillExpo this November
*Advertise
*Pay monthly fees for housing, internet and electricity.
*Acquire necessary licenses.
*Acquire Voice actors and Musicians
 

$75 000: Our secondary milestone, this will help us:
*The same as $50 000 Milestone +
*Make a modkit shortly after release.
*Port the game to Android and iOS
 

$100 000: Our third Milestone, this will help us:
*The same as previous milestones + 
*Acquire development kits for the PS3, Xbox 360 and eventually Wii U
 and eventually port the game to those consoles.

If we do not reach our goal, which would be unfortunate, but of course understandable. We will still do the best we can with the money we are in fact able to raise. However, if we are not able to raise the $50 000 we ask for, chances are we may not be able to make all the content we want to before the time of release. In worst cases, we may have to delay the release.

Twisted Universe is our very first project here at Radiation Touch Games. Featuring a Sidescroller shooter gameplay / FPS gameplay style set in various parts throughout the Universe. Upon starting the game, you take the role as Aeleen Riigel, the newest addition to the United Space Federations elite squad. As a rookie you finally get to play with the big guys with fancy ranks and fat paychecks. It is a dream come true, until your first mission goes horribly wrong, and you are forced to abandon your past life and start over from the very beginning.


 The main gameplay will be covered by a Sidescroller Shooter style experience. You traverse from point A to the left side to point B on the right side much like the same way that Super Mario works. Just put mario and the whole mushroom kingdom aside and replace him with a ship midair, and the mushroom kingdom with a part of the universe you will be visiting for a brief period.

The map will autoscroll and so you will be able to move back and forth, up and down to cover all parts of the visible space. On your way you will encounter resitance more than happy to sacrifice themselves for the greater good of their master or treasure. 

 
Seing as you can modify the ship with a variety of weapon setups you are likely to have the firepower to gun the unfortunate souls to pieces. But if the ship is a agile as a cow, you may not stand much of a chance. Changing your ship may help you navigate through the hail of bullets, a lighter ship however will have less space for lovely guns, so choose wisely between your options. 
If you are skilled enough to make it to Point B you are very likely to encounter a boss, and this guy is not playing around. 
 
The boss is not just your average fightervessel, it is the mothership of the opposite fleet you are gunning for. Judging by the difference in size between the two of you, your puny little ship should not be a match for such a battlecruiser. Lucky for you, size is not all. When you tap the motherships hull to a certain degree, you will be able to ram your little fightership straight into the mothership.
 
The battle is not over yet. As you ram the mothership and break through its hull, you change from Sidescroller gameplay to a FPS style gameplay. You are now in the belly of the beast, and it is all up to you and your personalized firearms to run for the captain. You will have to put your moral to the test as you plow through armed workers and security guards on your run for the big guy. When the big guy is done for, and/or you have aquired what you came for, the mission is over and you can collect your reward as soon as you have gotten out of the raging inferno you left the mothership and its crew in.  ¨


We make this type of game possible vith the Unreal Engine 3. As a bonus we can offer you beautiful 3D graphics in the main 2D environment, and an engaging FPS style gameplay for the close quarter shootouts. 

We do not expect the world to change with Twisted Universe. But we aim to make an impact on the world of gaming. The world of gaming is falling into a repetitive cycle were one tries to copy the next because it "sells". We want to make something different, something that no one has seen before, to make something new and entertaining to fellow gamers. Twisted Universe will be a cocktail with FPS and Sidescroller shooter action where you will have more freedom to fight the way you want to fight, and now we are not just talking about buying new equipment, but also customizing it. We do not plan on making it a casual game with a super easy difficulty level on ultra hard, so how you customize your loadout will have a lot to say for the game. Expect to die a lot, and expect a lot of trial and error. We want it to be a challenge, not a cakewalk, as you are supposed to eat the cake, not walk on it. 

Do not worry if you cannot back us, if you just do not have the money, we understand. If you still want to help us, then there still is a way. Simply share this Campaign with as many people as you possibly can, use the built-in tools IndieGoGo offer for sharing and spread the word as loud as you can! The louder the better! If you are able to back us, it would mean a lot if you could spread the word as well! However you help us, remember you will have a special place among the galaxies.
 

Discalaimer: Twisted Universe is still a work in progress and is subject to change. What you see is not representing the final product, but it is however visualizing what the final product may look like. Twisted Universe' launch date is 23rd of August 2013, but can be subject to delay.

story:
You are stranded on an island, The plane you came with have crashed, and you are alive. To survive on the island you'll have to find food, water and shelter. It's up to you.

-Do you have the knowledge to know what you can eat or not?
-Are you faster alone but maybe stronger as a team?

Decide how you want to play the game. Level your character to increase the skill level. Use your skills on the talent tree to make the character survive the best.



Your character is a normal human being. You need food and water to survive. If you don't have enough, you'll eventually get tired and slow. This will affect your gameplay. Use your mind and get supplies. Explore the world and see what you can eat and drink, but be careful!


As you level your character you'll increase your skill level and reach your goal. The more you explore the game, the faster you'll level up your character.


Choose your way to survive. Are you a runner or an explorer? You decide how you want to skill your character and play the game. Choose the way of the Explorer, Survivor or Hunter.


Gather different resources. Scavenge around the world and see if you can find anything useful. Use your tools for gathering different materials.


Use collected resources to craft different items in the game. Learn new  prestige items to craft. Construct your housing and weapons to hunt animal and fight others to reach your goal.



Multiplayer - This game mode is about survival after a plane crash and finding pieces to repair the plane. You'll survive alone against other players in this feature. Find the airplane part/-s as soon as possible to win. Use your survival abilities to slow other players down. Get your name as high as possible on the scoreboard, and see who the fastest players are.

Multiplayer - This game mode is all about teamwork. Join a game lobby with your friends or sign up alone. Choose 2v2 , 3v3, or 5v5. You'll play in a world with alot of resources. Build a strategy with your team and collect wood, stone, food. Build households, weapons and much more! Construct your base in a smart way to fight of the other team. Fight against the other team and win.

Singleplayer - This game mode is about survival. You'll play alone and survive against harsh weather conditions, predators and diseases.

Choose how the easiest way of surviving is for you. You have to find food, water, make shelter and be warm during bad weather conditions.

As every day passes, the harder the game gets.

Mulitplayer - This game mode is a last man standing-mode. You start of in the woods alone and you'll have to find different weapons and gear to survive the best against other players.


The singleplayer is a story based gameplay where your main goal is to leave the island. The story starts way back home where you come from until you get on a plane which crashes and leaves you in the middle of nowhere. Search the island and do the missions. Craft and gather resources, build your home and plan your escape from the island.



Our goal is to aim for at least $8000 (USD), so that we can continue our development of the game mode: The Crash.

We have a lot of great ideas to continue the development of the game. As you see on the map, we have a lot of more gameplay for you guys. Even if we don´t reach the stretch goals, we will continue our development.

But as everyone know, to make a game is expensive. Therefore, the more money we raise the faster the game will be completed.

You have our deepest gratitude for all your support.






Everybody can't help to contribute to the  game.

But there are many ways for you guys to support us! Share our website on your Facebook and Twitter!

Vote on us on Steam Greenlight!

Tell your friends!

All the support we get from you guys means the world to us!


Facebook
Website
Steam Greenlight

Click here to vote



Limevision Studios was established in Sweden 2012 by Lennie Svensson and Morgan Andersson.

We are both hardcore gamers and programmers. Our vision is to continue with our passion in game developing.



                                                                         Lennie Svensson


                                                                     Morgan Andersson


                                                        Guilherme Nunes Barbosa




All music in Aware is produced and composed by Mr. Morgan Andersson


                                      


                                    IMAGES

story:
Hello!


My Name is Johnny, but i usually go by BansheeTK online. I've been a heavy gamer my entire life, playing Video games like Halo, Super Mario, Legend of Zelda, Call of Duty, Etc. I've always had an interest in computers, developing content games and other types of entertainment. I enjoy first person shooters, platformers, puzzles, RPG's , really all sorts of games. 


I was recently approved by Nintendo to develop games on the Wii U, and i fully intend to start, howeverbthe funding i need to really make it happen well is something i well can't afford at the moment. 

Due to my Job and getting my life started, i cannot exactly shell out that as much as i would like to to make the dream happen.  I've wanted to develop games on Nintendo hardware for a while and i finally got approved to do so, which is a huge deal, because i really would like to put out well designed, polished games for other people to play. Creating Content has been something I've always enjoyed and doing something like this would be a goal ad the start of something major for me. 


By obtaining this  i can learn to use it, and begin developing games on the Wii U that other people can play and enjoy, which is something i really want to do. 


This is a valuable Goal because i've loved Nintendo for a while and being able to develop for them is a goal for me, and the start of a career in gaming and computer development.


The Risks i face with this?

Not having the free time needed to get this stuff done right away and the time it takes to get everything setup and working and making sure the process runs smoothly, which i intend to do what it takes where needed. 


I've got family and friends who can help me do what it takes to get the stuff done i need to do and the support. 


Sharing this can help me out, to help an aspiring Indie Developer start out on a project. 


I do apologize if this doesn't seem well built, but please trust me i am being sincere with this. This is also my very first capaign
