Item System (You can collect items in GE to increase your stats)


Currency (Gold will be a currency in-game, this can be obtained by defeating mobs and quests)


Trading System (This is something we are currently talking about, might or might not happen)


Raids (Raids are like quests, but they are risky and do not have an energy limit. It could result in being hospitalised)


Death System (As mentioned above, if you are killed, you will end up in a hospital. Locked there for a set time)


Overall Experience System (You can gain levels in GE with obtaining EXP)


Skill Point Tree (Different Trees, points that add to skills in trees)


Specialization points (Used to unlock different keys)


Drop Tables


Guilds Bonuses

Random Events (You'll see)
Screenshots of AlphaThis screen shows a logged in user using the actions list. (Soon to expand into full quests or skills to gain EXP)Here are many of the current features in and working! (The UI is only a template, we are working to make a nice flash UI with the UI designer!)You can also check out the CHANGELOG and view the full history of GE!What We Need & What You GetHere is a break down of how your funds help to develop GE:
Funds will help me buy quality, ready made code to instantly implement into GE. This will significantly improve the development time!
By donating using the £1 perk, you will have helped the development of GE and we thank you for your generosity!
By donating using the £5 perk, you get access to both alpha and beta!
By donating using the £15 perk, you get a badge/custom title on your account when the game reaches beta! (Alpha not included)
By donating using the £50 perk, you can design your own item for GE that you will get upon release of the game! (All previous perks included)
By donating using the £100 perk, you get all previous as well as the following: Design a quest, reserve your name for beta, get your name on an NPC in-game and a founder title for your guild (soloers get founder badge)! (All previous perks included)
If we do not reach our goal, anything we have will be greatly appreciated and have a significant boost on the GE development!
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cannot donate, please feel free to join and get involved in the chat :You can always follow the development for both AoA and GE on our forum at http://age-of-aincrad.com/forum/
Thanks for reading! I hope we can tempt you to donate to our side project, Project GE!~Ashley Scott (XenoWarrior) (GE Developer)~Jordan Knights  (Xalchs) (GE Game Designer)~Jordan Shaw (Zenro45) (GE UI Designer)

story:
IndieGoGo Preview Version v0.2 Alpha

The game world of "Fight your Music!" is generated by the music you import into the game. You roam around the world, fight monsters, train your character, collect randomly generated loot, interact with different factions and heroes, watch how they rise and crumble - all based on the songs you import. The combat system works like a rhythm game. Circles that you need to click will spawn depending on the currently playing song's Beats Per Minute and overall loudness. If the playing song's BPM and loudness is high, the attack circles are more likely to spawn, but your speed stat decreases sensitivity, so if your character has high speed stat, enemy attack circles will spawn in lesser numbers. At later stages in the game, you'll also be able to join factions, do global quests and manipulate faction diplomacy - cause a global war or create global peace - all under your control.



- Unique fantasy world, procedurally generated by the music you import into the game.
The whole world is generated procedurally, based on an imported songs' beats per minute, loudness, and length of your music.

- Over 30 unique monsters, including their rare and elite counterparts.

- Political interactions between procedurally generated countries based on your songs' artists.
Empires and countries are generated based on the Artist and the Album name. For example, the Artists’ name is interpreted as kingdom by the game while the Album name is the region. The more songs from the same artist, the bigger the country is. The more albums from the same artist, the more regions there are.


- A living world that interacts with itself as you play and progress throughout the game.
The factions will make alliances and wars between each other. The world interacts with itself even when you're out on the field, battling monsters or purchasing items.

- Various different events and quests with multiple outcomes.
The world will change depending on the choices that you make throughout the game. Your choices will affect the condition of Factions and their standing or relationship with each other or with your character in a good or a bad way

- Event editor: Create your own stories, events and interactions.
The powerful event editor will allow you to create rich events and stories for the game, while also giving you the ability to mod the game to your own liking.

- Unique character customization and stats system.
The character customization in the game allows you to create your own hero based on your own liking. The old-school stat system will allow you to invest the attribute points in whichever attribute you prefer, which will affect a wide variety of statistics on your character.


- Action packed combat based on your song's beats per minute, loudness and length.

- An abundance of Achievements that yield various rewards.

- Crafting and unique Item Infusion System - Enhance your item stats with songs!
You will be able to collect materials and crate your own items. There will be many different ways of collecting the materials such as breaking down the items you don't need, looting the materials from your fallen foes or by purchasing them directly from a trader or a store. Item infusion however is the most interesting part as you will be able to permanently enchant one of your items with an infusion crystal, giving it powerful stats and decent bonuses.

- Available in English, Croatian, Russian and Japanese language at launch.



In order to finish the game, we require a total of $7,000 US dollars. You can view where the money will be going below.

4500$ - Development Costs (Programming, Art, GUI)
1500$ - Unity Pro License
1000$ - Other Fees + Taxes




Unity Pro License - With unity pro license, we will get access to some key features that are required to make this type of game work.

Development Costs - This basically includes everything we will need to finish the game, from living costs to costs required to hire the artists and extend their contract with us.

Other Fees + Taxes - Under this category goes everything else that we may need to spend money on such as additional fees and taxes.


$10,000 - Visual Character Creation - Create your own character by choosing various different hairstyles, body shapes and more!

$13,000 - Companion NPCs - Encounter various different NPCs at the inn, befriend them and they will accompany you on your journey!

$15,000 - Custom Factions - Create your own faction where you'll be able to recruit various different NPCs to fight for you.

$17,500 - ???????



At the time of this posting, the game is 30% complete, and we have a playable demo ready. Still, our biggest challenge is perfecting this new game type, as we are in unknown waters and we're not sure how people will receive this game, which brings us to our biggest risk. The biggest risk is making sure the game will preform as intended with every known genre that is out there, meaning we will have to do some rigorous testing to make sure everything works as intended. We will not release the game until we feel it is finished.



Targhen Games is a small indie developer founded by Karlo Kopun and Grigoriy Krasikov back in 2013. Our aim is to create addicting games with original ideas and concepts with the goal of releasing them on as many platforms as possible whilst maintaining quality and playability.



- Designed and Programmed by Grigoriy Krasikov "riderin"
- Additional Help, Music by Karlo Kopun "Korventh"
- Art by Kaitlyn Little "Kaitlyeen"



Q: Why can't I import my music in the IndieGoGo Demo Preview version?
A: Because Unity Free has certain limitations that prevents such a function from being implemented, hence the reason why we require Unity Pro to make this work.

Q: How can you be sure that every genre of the song will work with this game?
A: There is a complicated algorithm that calculates the song's BPM (Beats Per Minute), Loudness and Length. Since every single song in the world follows the same format, the game can read every song you import into it.

Q: Can I review the IndieGoGo Demo Preview version and post my review on the internet?
A: Yes you can but you must state that this is just an IndieGoGo preview version and we would also like you to include the link to our indiegogo campaign page along with the review.

Q: When will be the game be released?
A: In 2015.

Q: Where will the game be released?
A: We have published the game on Steam Greenlight and we hope to release it worldwide. We will also approach other publishers such as Desura and GoG.

Q: Will there be a DRM-Free version?
A: Of course.

Other Ways You Can Help Us
If you cannot contribute to our project but still want to help, please spread the word by sharing this campaign with as much people as you can!

story:
Gentleman... Ricochet! is a puzzle game in which the player must shoot a token through obstacles and use everything the level has to offer to get to the goal.

  By collecting stars and reaching the goal in the fewest shots possible, the player will be able to unlock loads of tokens which can be equipped for a customised and unique experience. Each coin will have its own personality and effects.

  We are a small starting company (only two). My colleague and I want to start making games that are not only fun, but also beautiful and immersive. We believe in hard work and passion, we will not launch a game we wouldn't play.

  You aren't funding a game, you are funding the future of Bïtse Games and are helping it become something big and awesome. Hopefully, someday we'll make a living out of it!

  Our first game is a puzzle game for iOS. If the game is received well enough, we will launch it on every possible platform that the game can fit on, we won't release it if the game doesn't fit the medium.

The game will come out no matter what happens. This campaign is mainly to help us cover the cost of the developer licenses and hardware that we can't afford by ourselves right now. By helping us, you give us the chance to concentrate most of our energy in developing the game and get the game released faster.

What we need is simple:

  • Unity 3d Pro licences (Base + iOS). 1500$ + 1500$
  • iOS Developer License, to get on the App Store. 99$ per year

This is stuff that will not only help this particular game, but our future games as well. Also, we already have access to various iOS devices to test on.

If we exceed the goal, we might also purchase the required Android licenses and get the game on the Google Play Store as well.

  You are not only funding a game,  this is not a quick money-grab. We want to build something big, something that will grow. We believe in making game by passion, not by greed. We want to build experiences that truly immerse the player.

  By helping us, you are helping two video game passionates achieve their dream of developing their own games. You are also helping yourself, in a way, because you'll get the chance to see many other awesome games from us.

 Officially there's no fixed date for the release date, but we currently aim to finish the game by the end of october. Realistically the game would be  available on the app store before the holidays.

 Keep in mind that we can't work full time on the game right now, so there's always risk of delay. We spend every bit of our free time on this little beauty, but between jobs, courses and girlfriends there's so much we can do.

story:
Fantasy Kommander Eukarion Wars Video Intro

16th October 2013: FANTASY KOMMANDER-EUKARION WARS RELEASED!

Please Check the Campaign Update to Redeem Your Copy.


Fantasy Kommander Eukarion Wars

Epic War, Hexagons, Turn-Based Strategy, Boardagame, Rpg, Miniatures, Dragons, Demons, Mystery, Heroes, Kaos and Legendary Adventures... If you like these words you can't miss Fantasy Kommander.

Introduction

Do you remember SSI (Strategic Simulation Inc.) and its great games?

If the answer is YES, you can't miss this game because everything in it reminds of the incredible gaming experience that SSI created in its titles.

Great turn-based strategy and RPG games such as Panzer General, Fantasy General or Pool of Radiance inspired and guided us in the development of our project. However, with “Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Wars” we've tried to do better than our masters, adding depth to the gameplay, to the story and the setting for this genre.

If you're not familiar with SSI, but you're looking for a strategy game with an elaborated battle system, a deep storyline, and a huge setting, you probably don't want to miss this game too.

 

Eladen

 

The Game

Basically, “Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Wars” is a turn-based strategy game with RPG elements, but it can also be defined as a “Fantasy Wargame” or an “Advanced Computer Boardgame”.

The gameplay is based on a traditional hex map, with a wide variety of terrains and units available.Most of your interactions with the game will be through the mouse. You will select, move, fight, and analyze units on the Battlefield or in the HeadQuarters (HQ) using a simple point-and-click system.

“Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Wars” is an operational-level game: units approximate squads, with most of them consisting of about a hundred soldiers, though some (e.g. heroes, dragons) represent single entities. Every unit is like a RPG character with its own characteristics and special abilities that you can increase as soon as they level up.

The Battle System is very detailed and is based on several Combat Tables, which take into account, among others:

  • the strength ratio between the Attacker and Defender
  • the state of health and morale of the units
  • the terrain and many other tactical factors

An important factor during a battle, is the orientation of the units: attacking the enemy on the flank rather than the front can make the difference between victory and defeat.

For all these reasons, and many other that you will discover in the game, maneuver your army carefully, and keep in mind that in order to become a great Kommander you must be able to take the right decision at the right time.

The game features single player campaigns following a intricate plot (see “The Story”) as well as multiplayer battles with varying objectives and several game modes. In these multiplayer challenges, the player can decide to take part in quick battles using ready-to-fight armies, or battles preceded by a management phase where they have to strategically plan their army taking into account varying financial resources.

 

Main Features

  • Turn-based strategy/RPG game
  • An elaborated and detailed Battle System that considers the strength ratio between the Attacker and Defender, the state of health and morale of the units, the terrain and many other tactical factors
  • A deep and involving Storyline set in a world inspired by the European Middle Age and enriched by the Fantasy narrative tradition
  • 4 Single Player Campaigns with 25 Epic Battles, 3 Heroes, Powerful Enemy Generals, and multiple Side Quests
  • Over 70 different Units to enroll, upgrade and unleash in Battle
  • Every Unit is like a Rpg charater with many stats and abilities that you can manage and upgrade
  • Incredible spells
  • Hordes of Enemies
  • Multiplayer Battles with different gameplay modes and objectives.
  • Hours and Hours of pure Strategy and Rpg fun!

 

The Story

 

 

 

The plot develops during the single player campaigns, on and off the battlefields. There are 4 campaigns available, three of them take place in the great Empire of Adamantia, invaded by the forces of Kaos, and one in mysterious and unknown lands.

Players play a Kommander at the beginning of their military career, thrown into a titanic battle that is devastating the entire continent of Eukarion. Successive events, dialogues, and plot twists are carried on through the messages that Emperor Karl and the Great Council of Mages send to the young general who will have to find out, fighting hard battles, the final objective of the Abyss.

Players won't be alone in facing this incredible war adventure. Three great Heroes of Humans, Elves, and Dwarves, will follow and assist them in their trials, challenges, victories and defeats.

The game has been FULLY voiced in English and it's been conceived to give emphasis to the characters, friends and foes, that players will face on their adventure.

 

The Setting

We put a lot of care in the development of the setting, creating a huge fantasy version of Medieval Europe. Empires, kingdoms, history and everything else on the map that you can see down here are the result of studies and researches aiming at a coherent fusion between reality and fantasy, following the great tradition of European epic and fantasy literature.

“Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Tales” shows how Medieval Europe could have been if Orcs, Magic, Dragons, and demons of the deep abyss were real.

If you want to know more about the way the lead designer of FK:EW designed the history of the Eukarion Continent, have a look at this entry in our Dev Diary.

 

 

The Multiplayer System

Players can engage in several types of 1-to-1 online challenges:

  • Scenario

Relive heroic battles that made the History of the Eukarion continent! Each player has a fixed role in the battle: the units can be already placed and some very specific tasks have to be completed.

  • Short campaign

Challenge your adversary in a sequence of consecutive maps.

  • Skirmish

Select the map and place the units the way you want. Each map has a fixed group of units for each faction.

  • Headquarters

Both players start in the Headquarters, with a fixed amount of money. They can then manage these resources to build and upgrade their own army to bring to battle.

 

About AOG

Age of Games is a project created by two independent game development companies,

P.M. Studios and Foofa Studios.

Both companies have a great passion for videogames and developed several RPG and strategy games together. We have a strong independent nature and we hope to be able to create great games outside of the logics of casual gaming and mass market.

 

Why support us?

We've worked for 2 years on this game, with passion and commitment.

We are independent and we self-financed the entire development.

We need some help now to cover some of the costs we have faced and make our dream come true.

If you like strategy games, RPGs, and detailed fantasy settings, you can't miss the opportunity to contribute to the success of Fantasy Kommander.

 

What about additional funds?

Any additional funds collected will be used to improve the game and its features.



THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ingame Headquarters

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Campaign Selection

 

Perks' additional info

  • (*) Digital pack:

Artworks and concep art
Soundtrack of the game
Downloadable poster
Official desktop wallpapers
Ringtone (for supported phones)

  • (**)VIP Credits:

Ingame credits.

Credits in the hall of fame page on the official website  with a photo of you and, if you want, the link to a social network profile

  • (***)AOG supporter

The Supporter account on Age of Games allows you to access exclusive contents on our games on the website. Follow the link for more information...

We put a lot of care in the development of the setting, creating a huge fantasy version of Medieval Europe. Empires, kingdoms, history and everything else on the map that you can see down here are the result of studies and researches aiming at a coherent fusion between reality and fantasy, following the great tradition of European epic and fantasy literature.
“Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Tales” shows how Medieval Europe could have been if Orcs, Magic, Dragons, and demons of the deep abyss were real.
If you want to know more about the way the lead designer of FK:EW designed the history of the Eukarion Continent, have a look at this entry in our Dev Diary.
 
 
The Multiplayer System

Players can engage in several types of 1-to-1 online challenges:

Scenario

Relive heroic battles that made the History of the Eukarion continent! Each player has a fixed role in the battle: the units can be already placed and some very specific tasks have to be completed.

Short campaign

Challenge your adversary in a sequence of consecutive maps.

Skirmish

Select the map and place the units the way you want. Each map has a fixed group of units for each faction.

Headquarters

Both players start in the Headquarters, with a fixed amount of money. They can then manage these resources to build and upgrade their own army to bring to battle.
 
About AOG
Age of Games is a project created by two independent game development companies,
P.M. Studios and Foofa Studios.
Both companies have a great passion for videogames and developed several RPG and strategy games together. We have a strong independent nature and we hope to be able to create great games outside of the logics of casual gaming and mass market.
 
Why support us?
We've worked for 2 years on this game, with passion and commitment.
We are independent and we self-financed the entire development.
We need some help now to cover some of the costs we have faced and make our dream come true.
If you like strategy games, RPGs, and detailed fantasy settings, you can't miss the opportunity to contribute to the success of Fantasy Kommander.
 
What about additional funds?
Any additional funds collected will be used to improve the game and its features.

THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Ingame Headquarters
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Campaign Selection
 
Perks' additional info

(*) Digital pack:

Artworks and concep artSoundtrack of the gameDownloadable posterOfficial desktop wallpapersRingtone (for supported phones)

(**)VIP Credits:

Ingame credits.
Credits in the hall of fame page on the official website  with a photo of you and, if you want, the link to a social network profile

(***)AOG supporter

The Supporter account on Age of Games allows you to access exclusive contents on our games on the website. Follow the link for more information...

story:
Transformative Video

Check out our newly released video on vimeo!

Demo version

There are two download options. If you don't have RPG VX Ace RTP and you don't want to install it, please use the link below:
Changing Eternity Alpha - http://speedy.sh/QQxGZ/Changing-Eternity-Alpha.exe

If you have RTP or you would like to install it please grab it here:
RTP RPG VX Ace - http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/run-time-package
Changing Eternity Alpha no-rtp - http://speedy.sh/jjHvE/Changing-Eternity-Alpha-no-rtp.exe

 

Short Summary

Changing Eternity is typical jRPG with a special transformative twist. A long time ago, a witch ascended and started creating chaos. Everything that she covered with mist has begun to diminish and become corrupted. She made an alliance with the town of Borguc turning it's inhabitants into monsters. This has started a great war called The Eternity War.

The action of the game follows Tavien, a young prince who wants somewhere in the future rule over his father's kingdom. Since old times his home town Frexil is constantly taking on the monstrous adversaries of Borguc. Tavien decided to start his own quest - to find source of all of these happenings.

Together with his father's faithful guardian Vitel he goes onto an adventure into unknown. He wants to get to the bottom of this transfomative mystery. As it doesn't seem right he wants to know why people of Borguc forged such devilish alliance.

Inevitably, he meets the master villain of all evil - witch Hohepa. He tries to fight her off but being inexperienced he fails and get an unpleasant surprise. The evil one uses the moment of his weakness to turn him into a girl! Feasting on Tavien's powerlessness she grows even more powerful and gets back to her monstrous fortress.

Will Tavien be able to restore his original form? Is it possible to unveil the mystery of people of Borguc? And will people around him turn out to be his enemies or foes? This and more you will find in Changing Eternity.

Visit our website for more information.

What We Need & What You Get

Our costs split into those groups:

  • Software - we need to get a license for RPG Maker VX ACE and some other software that is needed to create this game.
  • Content - even though we are able to do many things like drawing, programming or writing we still need some additional content. We will need some outside help with music and sound effects. In addititon to this, we also take into account things about website hosting.
For your involvment you will be able to get great rewards including:
  • the game
  • wallpapers
  • custom made avatars and drawings
  • limited edition artbook (it will be only for backers)
  • a part of you in the game

Rewards from tiers 1, 2 and 3 are stackable. Everyone sending over 25$ will get those three. For example when you get the tier 4 reward you will get the first three tier rewards as well!

All of the funders will be awarded with full version of the game.

For all content with custom images we would suggest you to use some dollmaker
(for example: eLouai, dream self, kisekae). You can also provide your photo to our mail - team.wondermuffin@gmail.com.

Please mind that things that are being named (NPC names, equipment names, location name) must fit into some guidelines. For sure - keep it clean. The game is going to be rated for teen so we don't want the hero to be fighting using a black banana (if you know what I mean).


Meet our characters

Tavien

Tavien is a young prince. All his life he wanted to go on an adventure. He always wondered what it must have been like to live as a commoner in his kingdom.

He is only now going out of his way to see for himself. He is also trained in the art of the sword, which he learned from the royal guard Vitel. He likes to help others in their time of need, and is quite open minded.

Vitel

Vitel is an experienced veteran of the battlefield who has many victories to his name. Though he may have ended the lives of many an enemy, he is soft hearted at his core. He is a master of many weapons, but he feels best with the lance.

At the moment he is the personal body guard of the prince Tavien, and is doing his best to make his wish about meeting other people come true. Devoted to his kingdom, he will protect the prince at any cost.

Renier

Renier is an enigma, not much is known about her other than the fact she is exceptional at mending wounds, and is known to be a part of the royal army. Where she came from is still an unsolved case.

Though her motives are a mystery, she wishes to help Tavien on his quest. With her knowledge of various towns and dungeons, she might just be a great asset to his quest. Though she might have a hidden secret, something deep within her, Tavien trusts her.

 

Custom made content

Our game is going to have a lot of hand drawn content. Even though we will be using RPG VX Ace engine a lot of things will be done by hand. All of the important sprites will be redone by hand

Same goes for all the monsters in the game. We will not include any of those that came together with the engine.

 

Early screenshots

The images below were taken from a very early alpha version of game. Content is subject to change depending on development progress and user feedback.

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 
Feel free to also visit our Twitter account. We will have you informed about all of the updates.
 
If you need to contact us, feel free to write to team.wondermuffin@gmail.com
 
Feel free to share our banner!

Feel free to share our banner!

story:
Who am i?

Hi! I am Rubén Arranz, I have loved video-games since I was a child and I started to be interesting in creating them a few years ago. I have designed and made some small games with friends, but a month ago I decided to created my first "full" game, "Otherworld", using Unity and my Oculus Rift.

The truth is that I invest so much time working of it so now the complete has become more a necessity than a goal.


However the trial version of Unity is going to finish, and I cam't afford the pro license. That's why I have started this campaign, cause if I get some funding, I will be able to finish the video-game.

¿Quién soy?

Hola, soy Rubén Arranz , desde pequeño me han fascinado los videojuegos y empece a tener curiosidad por crearlos.Desde hace unos años he estado creando pequeños juegos con amigos y hace un mes, con unity y mi oculus rift, empece a crear mi primer juego completo "Otherworld".

La verdad es que llevo invirtiendole tantas tiempo que el terminarle se ha convertido mas en una necesidad que en una meta.

Sin embargo la versión de prueba esta a punto de acabarse y no puedo permitirme pagar la licencia pro de unity.Por lo que he abierto esta campaña ya que si consigo financiación, podre terminar el videojuego.

The Game

"Otherworld" is a platform and puzzle game where we will have to overcome difference challenges. This challenges have being designed to make us think, and if you want to pass them, the logistics and the movement abilities will have to very beside our movements must be attuned. All wrapped in an aesthetic that conveys the feeling in a virtual environment.

NEW: no oculus version: No oculus version PC

Here you can download a little demo(needed oculus rift) : Otherworld demo

El juego

Otherworld es un videojuego de plataformas y puzzles en el que tendremos que ir superando salas con diversas pruebas para conseguir avanzar, para ello , deberemos pararnos a pensar varias veces, ademas de tener que medir muy bien nuestros movimientos. Sumando la logica y el pensar junto con la habilidad de movimiento.Todo ello envuelto en una estetica que transmite el sentirse en un entorno virtual.

NUEVO: Version sin oculus: Version sin oculus

Puedes descargar una pequeña demo aqui (necesario oculus rift) : Otherworld demo


What I need?

I need to get a minimum of 1650 USD to pay the pro license of Unity, and in case I do not get enough funds, I will use the money to pay the license in instalments.

¿Qué necesito?

Necesito alcanzar un minimo de 1650 dolares para pagar la licencia pro de unity, y en caso de no llegar a esa cantidad, usaria el dinero recaudado para pagar la licencia por plazos.

Other goals:

 1st goal:  1750 USD: Buy some software to make the soundtrack

 2nd goal:  2000 USD: Buy some assets for the developing of the video-game

Metas extra

1º meta: 1750 USD : comprar software para la produccion de la banda sonora.

2º meta: 2000 USD : posibilidad de comprar assets para el dessarrollo del videojuego.

Other things you can do to help:

I you era not able to donate any money, buy you want to help in the project, don't forget to share it with your friends and also in your social networks.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes colaborar pero quieres ayudar en el proyecto , no te olvides de compartirlo con tus amigos y compañeros , ademas de por tus redes sociales.

story:
Our Indiegogo campaign has ended but
you can still order Flimsee at:

flimsee.com

★★★★★

"This is easily one of the most fun games I have played in a while. And it is hilarious to watch people try to catch the cups when the game is on the line. What a great game!"

Jonathon Horn, Amazon Customer Reviewer

What is Flimsee?

Flimsee is the ultimate lawn game for fun and friendly competition. It consists of three simple elements: a cup, a stick, and a frisbee.

Inventor John Mally first conceived the idea back in 2008 during a frisbee match, when he saw a disc knock a cup off a snow pole. Six years and several prototypes later, the original Flimsee kit has become a cult favorite among a loyal community of lawn gamers, tailgaters, and disc enthusiasts nationwide.

Contribute Now

Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks

How to play

Remaining true to the original meaning of Flimsee, there's no right way to play, only the funnest way for that day. The official rules to the Flimsee Cups game have been critically tested for maximum fun, speed, and fairness of play. Once you receive your Flimsee Set we look forward to staying in touch with you on your family's house rules.

The Flimsee set

Flimsee is made from the highest quality components and assembled in Ohio for reliable performance year after year.

Each Flimsee set includes:

A. 1 drawstring bag

Easily carry your Flimsee cups and discs when you're on the go or store it in the off season. The drawnstrings make it perfect to throw the it over your shoulder or hang on a hook.
 

B. 6 cups

Official Flimsee Cups are fully tested for maximum performance. We searched the world over for a super durable, perfectly sized cup with optimal bounce characteristics. As handy on the picnic table as they are on the playing field, these cups can be used in multiple ways.
 

C. 2 discs

A pair of straight flying, throw and catch 10" Flimsee Discs. Weighing 117 grams each and featuring a deep rim design, they're the perfect choice for disc throwing games of all kinds. Just aim, toss and watch them fly!
 

D. 8 breakdown sticks

Solid 5/16" fiberglass sticks that will quickly poke in the ground and flex at absurd angles when struck with a disc. The all new ball top couplings atop every stick allows you to connect two sticks to create four goal posts. The coupler will also allow us to develop a whole new lineup of accessories we have planned for new games.

Add-ons

Stands

We found a way to allow players to play on any surface using Flimsee stands. We've created a wooden stands made with 2x10s and 2x4s that are perfect for tailgating and anywhere you can't puncture the ground. A heavy stand is imperative for the sticks to react independently, but you still want it light enough to transport. Made well by AJJ Cornhole of Cincinnati and the Amish in Northwest Ohio. 
 

Custom Flimsee Sets

Become the art director for 100 custom Flimsee Sets! Work directly with some incredibly talented designers at Trident Design to get you brand customized on each discs, cup, and bag for your sets. We also have a line of new color fiberglass we are working with and really look forward to some custom orders from the local business community looking for team building.
 

Premium Carrying Bag

Premium canvas Flimsee bag made by Seagull Bags of Columbus.
 

 

Contribute Now

Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks

Why we’re crowdfunding

We’re making a more compact, safe to use, and retail friendly version of the game players know and love. To accomplish this, we’ve partnered with Trident Design, an innovation incubator in Columbus, Ohio. Together, we’ve come up with improvements that add up to a better Flimsee game at a better size, strength, and price.

Your contributions today will help us with the production and promotion of this new game set. But more than that, you will be joining a community of loyal players who want to make this game everything it is meant to be, and help bring it to the world of future Flimsee fans waiting out there!

We believe in this game’s potential. If you do too, please consider contributing.

The new coupler:

Breaking down the sticks with a one-piece, tight-fitting, easy-to-assemble solution has been the goal of Flimsee for a long time. We've tried multiple solutions, but this is the one. This polypropylene injection-molded coupler, made with our specific dimensions, solves all our retail and transportation challenges while also withstanding hard disc strikes.

Coupler evolution:

Coupler technical specifications:

  • Polypropylene
  • Friction fit
  • Permanently fastened to solid core 5/16 labeled fiberglass stick
  • Safe and family friendly
  • No batteries needed!

Referral program

Earn 1 Flimsee buck for every $10 contribution you refer

You could earn up to $100 of Flimsee bucks to spend after the campaign on upgrades and/or additional perks.

Earning Flimsee bucks is easy:

  1. First contribute to any perk
  2. Next log in to Indiegogo
  3. Then select any share link at the top of this page
  4. Finally share with your social network

All referrals will be tracked by Indiegogo. Flimsee bucks earned will be distributed at the end of the campaign and used to purchase upgrades and/or additional perks through BackerKit.

Contribute Now

Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks

Testimonials

"I truly believe that these 'games' play a major role in the success of children and even adults"

Jeremy M. Culpepper
Director of Summer Programs at Fairview Lake YMCA Camps

"I prefer Flimsee because it's unique and not just a drinking game. It's a way to showcase athleticism, competitiveness, and good spirited fun"

Tim Rieser
Capital University Student

"The Frisbee is an incredible device, but what makes it great is the people that play it."

Jens Velasquez
Freestyle Frisbee World Champion

"This game is no joke, sons, daughters, nieces, nephews, cousins, a full on family affair at our house."

Joe O'Reiley
All American Dad

The history of Flimsee

Seemingly ordinary events have led to some of history’s greatest discoveries and inventions. Consider the time line: Sir Isaac Newton observing the velocity of a simple falling apple in 1687 formulated the Universal Law of Gravitation. The tossing of a used pie tin led to Walter Morrison producing the Pluto Platter in 1948. Then in 2008, John Mally saw a gliding Frisbee strike a snow pole with a cup resting on top. When this happened, both the cup and an idea that would forever change lawn games flew into action. Some call it luck. Others call it fate. We call it Flimsee.

For John, it’s an activity that began with a group of friends looking to add some friendly competition to their weekend. Once that 175gram Ultrastar missed its intended target (hands) and struck the pole, Mally and his friends discovered the remedy for their boredom. They gathered sticks, cups, and discs. They arranged them, formed teams, made rules, and fashioned a makeshift version of what has evolved into an ultimate disc-throwing showdown coined as Flimsee. The DIY game known on the Ultimate fields as "cups" and the college games known as 'frisbeer' is now bringing everyone together on a new playing field of well designed equipment.

From there forward, Mally devoted every spare moment he had to finding better cups, safer sticks, and a challenging, but family friendly disc size. After ordering and testing dozens of cups, sticks, and discs, he finally assembled the first and finest Flimsee Set available. Then? Community and fun took over. A talented group of friends and family who shared the love and vision for Flimsee have developed Flimsee into an instant classic.

FAQ

What is the warranty?

  • Guaranteed to be free of defects.

When are the perks expected to ship?

  • We hope to ship within 8-weeks of the end of the campaign; but, as we all know manufacturing can be difficult and unexpectant delays may occur.

What about international shipping?

  • If you live somewhere other than the United States, please also choose to back us at that level to accommodate the extra shipping charges.

How do I send my request for custom Flimsee Discs or Cups?

  • Send an email with your questions to info@Flimsee.com

Can the Flimsee team change or cancel my perk?

  • We literally have no ability to make any change to our backers contributions. This is both a feature and a limitation. We will work with any backer within the constraints of the Indiegogo system to do whatever we can. We cannot however change your perk selection in ANY way.

About our partner Trident Design

I'm Chris Hawker - an inventor and the founder of the design firm and innovation agency Trident Design, LLC. We have brought dozens of products to market including my own PowerSquid. We offer product development and commercialization services. We also license technologies, designs, and inventions. I've recently been asked to be a contributing editor to Entrepreneur.com and I often blog at InventorsMind.com. I have and always will be a champion of invention and inventors.

Trident is an award-winning design firm and has worked in product categories ranging from housewares and medical devices to simple games and complex industrial equipment. We have a true passion for innovation and specialize in working with inventors and startups. We love what we do and are excited to produce another one of our own designs.

We will deliver

We have brought dozens of products to market over 14 years, through licensing and acting as the manufacturer. We have deep experience with every aspect of the process. We have a track record of success and are absolutely committed to integrity, excellence, and innovation.

Shipping

Shipping costs vary by perk and location. See each perk's description for shipping cost by location. At the end of this campaign all Ohio supporters will be invited to pickup their sets at a convient and fun location to follow. All shipping costs will be added at the end of the campaign through BackerKit. Backers will be informed on how to access and add shipping through BackerKit via email. Please note that some perks offer FREE shipping if you also contribute to one or more Flimsee sets.

 

Contribute Now

Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks

story_txt:
Our Indiegogo campaign has ended but
you can still order Flimsee at:
flimsee.com


★★★★★
"This is easily one of the most fun games I have played in a while. And it is hilarious to watch people try to catch the cups when the game is on the line. What a great game!"
Jonathon Horn, Amazon Customer Reviewer



What is Flimsee?
Flimsee is the ultimate lawn game for fun and friendly competition.  It consists of three simple elements:  a cup, a stick, and a frisbee.
Inventor John Mally first conceived the idea back in 2008 during a frisbee match, when he saw a disc knock a cup off a snow pole.  Six years and several prototypes later, the original Flimsee kit has become a cult favorite among a loyal community of lawn gamers, tailgaters, and disc enthusiasts nationwide.

Contribute Now
Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks


How to play

Remaining true to the original meaning of Flimsee, there's no right way to play, only the funnest way for that day. The official rules to the Flimsee Cups game have been critically tested for maximum fun, speed, and fairness of play. Once you receive your Flimsee Set we look forward to staying in touch with you on your family's house rules. 


The Flimsee set

Flimsee is made from the highest quality  components and assembled in Ohio for reliable performance year after year.
Each Flimsee set includes:



A. 1 drawstring bag

Easily carry your Flimsee cups and discs when you're on the go or store it in the off season. The drawnstrings make it perfect to throw the it over your shoulder or hang on a hook.

 

B. 6 cups

Official Flimsee Cups are fully tested for maximum performance. We searched the world over for a super durable, perfectly sized cup with optimal bounce characteristics. As handy on the picnic table as they are on the playing field, these cups can be used in multiple ways.



 



C. 2 discs

A pair of straight flying, throw and catch 10" Flimsee Discs. Weighing 117 grams each and featuring a deep rim design, they're the perfect choice for disc throwing games of all kinds. Just aim, toss and watch them fly!

 

D. 8 breakdown sticks

Solid 5/16" fiberglass sticks that will quickly poke in the ground and flex at absurd angles when struck with a disc. The all new ball top couplings atop every stick allows you to connect two sticks to create four goal posts. The coupler will also allow us to develop a whole new lineup of  accessories we have planned for new games.



Add-ons



Stands

We found a way to allow players to play on any surface using Flimsee stands. We've created a wooden stands made with 2x10s and 2x4s that are perfect for tailgating and anywhere you can't puncture the ground. A heavy stand is imperative for the sticks to react independently, but you still want it light enough to transport. Made well by AJJ Cornhole of Cincinnati and the Amish in Northwest Ohio. 

 

Custom Flimsee Sets

Become the art director for 100 custom Flimsee Sets! Work directly with some incredibly talented designers at Trident Design to get you brand customized on each discs, cup, and bag for your sets. We also have a line of new color fiberglass we are working with and really look forward to some custom orders from the local business community looking for team building.



 



Premium Carrying Bag

Premium canvas Flimsee bag made by Seagull Bags of Columbus.

 
 


Contribute Now
Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks


Why we’re crowdfunding
We’re making a more compact, safe to use, and retail friendly version of the game players know and love.  To accomplish this, we’ve partnered with Trident Design, an innovation incubator in Columbus, Ohio.  Together, we’ve come up with improvements that add up to a better Flimsee game at a better size, strength, and price.
Your contributions today will help us with the production and promotion of this new game set.  But more than that, you will be joining a community of loyal players who want to make this game everything it is meant to be, and help bring it to the world of future Flimsee fans waiting out there!
We believe in this game’s potential.  If you do too, please consider contributing.
The new coupler:
Breaking down the sticks with a one-piece, tight-fitting, easy-to-assemble solution has been the goal of Flimsee for a long time. We've tried multiple solutions, but this is the one. This polypropylene injection-molded coupler, made with our specific dimensions, solves all our retail and transportation challenges while also withstanding hard disc strikes.
Coupler evolution:

Coupler technical specifications:


Polypropylene
Friction fit
Permanently fastened to solid core 5/16 labeled fiberglass  stick
Safe and family friendly
No batteries needed!

Referral program
Earn 1  Flimsee buck for every $10 contribution you refer
You could earn up to $100 of Flimsee bucks to spend after the campaign on upgrades and/or additional perks.

Earning Flimsee bucks is easy:

First contribute to any perk
Next log in to Indiegogo
Then select any share link at the top of this page
Finally share with your social network
All referrals will be tracked by Indiegogo. Flimsee bucks earned will be distributed at the end of the campaign and used to purchase upgrades and/or additional perks through BackerKit.

Contribute Now
Top | What is Flimsee | How to play | The Flimsee set | Add-ons | Why we're crowdfunding | Referral program | Testimonials | History | FAQ | Our partner | Shipping | Perks


Testimonials
"I truly believe that these 'games' play a major role in the success of children and even adults"

Jeremy M. CulpepperDirector of Summer Programs at Fairview Lake YMCA Camps

"I prefer Flimsee because it's unique and not just a drinking game. It's a way to showcase athleticism, competitiveness, and good spirited fun"

Tim RieserCapital University Student

"The Frisbee is an incredible device, but what makes it great is the people that play it."

Jens VelasquezFreestyle Frisbee World Champion

"This game is no joke, sons, daughters, nieces, nephews, cousins, a full on family affair at our house."

Joe O'ReileyAll American Dad


The history of Flimsee
Seemingly ordinary events have led to some of history’s greatest discoveries and inventions. Consider the time line: Sir Isaac Newton observing the velocity of a simple falling apple in 1687 formulated the Universal Law of Gravitation.  The tossing of a used pie tin led to Walter Morrison producing the Pluto Platter in 1948. Then in 2008, John Mally saw a gliding Frisbee strike a snow pole with a cup resting on top. When this happened, both the cup and an idea that would forever change lawn games flew into action. Some call it luck. Others call it fate. We call it Flimsee.
For John, it’s an activity that began with a group of friends looking to add some friendly competition to their weekend. Once that 175gram Ultrastar missed its intended target (hands) and struck the pole, Mally and his friends discovered the remedy for their boredom. They gathered sticks, cups, and discs. They arranged them, formed teams, made rules, and fashioned a makeshift version of what has evolved into an ultimate disc-throwing showdown coined as Flimsee. The DIY game known on the Ultimate fields as "cups" and the college games known as 'frisbeer' is now bringing everyone together on a new playing field of well designed equipment.
From there forward,  Mally devoted every spare moment he had to finding better cups, safer sticks, and a challenging, but family friendly disc size. After ordering and testing dozens of cups, sticks, and discs, he finally assembled the first and finest Flimsee Set available. Then? Community and fun took over. A talented group of friends and family who shared the love and vision for Flimsee have developed Flimsee into an instant classic.

FAQ
What is the warranty?

Guaranteed to be free of defects.
When are the perks expected to ship? 

We hope to ship within 8-weeks of the end of the campaign; but, as we all know manufacturing can be difficult and unexpectant delays may occur.
What about international shipping?

If you live somewhere other than the United States, please also choose to back us at that level to accommodate the extra shipping charges.
How do I send my request for custom Flimsee Discs or Cups?

Send an email with your questions to info@Flimsee.com

Can the Flimsee team change or cancel my perk?

We literally have no ability to make any change to our backers contributions. This is both a feature and a limitation. We will work with any backer within the constraints of the Indiegogo system to do whatever we can. We cannot however change your perk selection in ANY way.

About our partner Trident Design
I'm Chris Hawker - an inventor and the founder of the design firm and innovation agency Trident Design, LLC. We have brought dozens of products to market including my own PowerSquid. We offer product development and commercialization services. We also license technologies, designs, and inventions. I've recently been asked to be a contributing editor to Entrepreneur.com and I often blog at InventorsMind.com. I have and always will be a champion of invention and inventors.
Trident is an award-winning design firm and has worked in product categories ranging from housewares and medical devices to simple games and complex industrial equipment. We have a true passion for innovation and specialize in working with inventors and startups. We love what we do and are excited to produce another one of our own designs.
We will deliver
We have brought dozens of products to market over 14 years, through licensing and acting as the manufacturer. We have deep experience with every aspect of the process. We have a track record of success and are absolutely committed to integrity, excellence, and innovation.

Shipping

Shipping costs  vary by perk and location. See each perk's description for shipping cost by location. At the end of this campaign all Ohio supporters will be invited to pickup their sets at a convient and fun location to follow. All shipping costs will be added at the end of the campaign through BackerKit. Backers will be informed on how to access and add shipping through BackerKit via email. Please note that some perks offer FREE shipping if you also contribute to one or more Flimsee sets.
 

Contribute Now

story:
What's this, what's this?

This is a 2nd chance campaign of Smash Monster Rampage for folks who may have missed it the first time due to shipping and VAT being too expensive.

We've since figured out how to offer FREE International shipping, so we wanted to give folks who previously couldn't join the fun due to shipping a chance to get in on the rampaging monster action! Further, International backers from the original campaign will be getting a full refund on the amount paid for shipping.

This is a one-time only thing; future campaigns that 5th Street runs will have already had free shipping figured out and implemented, so there won't be a need for it.

This campaign will not delay delivery of the original run in any way. The game is currently at the printer being proofed for production, and this campaign will ship along side the original run.

Smash Monster Rampage is a game for 1 - 5 players where you work together to defeat a giant monster before the city is destroyed. You also need to keep survivors out of harm's way lest they get caught in the cross-fire...

Position your tanks & helicopters and open fire on the monster! Every hit brings you closer to victory, but also allows the monster to potentially attack back. 

Be careful; if the monster destroys every building or too many survivors perish, the monster wins the day! You won't let that happen though, will you?

Alternately, one player can CONTROL the monster and wreak havoc on her friends...

You can view the rules for Smash Monster Rampage in the Gallery tab.



You can view the artwork for all the monster cards in the Gallery tab.


Here's a video of how to play courtesy of Grey Elephant Gaming:






The Mega Monster Box comes with 16 additional unique monsters for you and your friends to fight! Here's a list of all 16 monsters (and you can see ALL of the monsters' card art in the Gallery tab):

Claw Monster, a giant crab fit for a king

Crush Monster, a giant octopus with WAY too many tentacles

Goo Monster, a blob ready to engulf the town

Myth Monster, the folklore duo of Paul Bunyan and Babe the Ox

Hop Monster, a rabbit of unusual size jumping about town

Space Monster, an alien invasion fleet ready to take over the town

Swarm Monster, a voracious swarm of insects the size of cars

Plant Monster, a carnivorous plant that spreads its spores around

Spider Monster, a spider that is faaaar too big. (grossgrossgross)

Mecha Monster, a malfunctioning giant robot that is wrecking the place

Magic Monster, a freed genie ready for some 'fun'

Crystal Monster, a crystalline behemoth that wants to make everything shine

Chomp Monster, a piranha tornado that is full of REALLY hungry fish

Cosmic Monster, a Lovecraft-inspired monster ready to drive you mad

Dragon Monster, a 3-headed dragon flying through town causing a ruckus

Snow Monster, a massive snowman intent on making winter last forever

story:
Short Summary

My name is Reiss Wort. I am a passionate game developer who has worked for well over a year on my first title, Global Infection. Working day and night my life has pracically been absorbed by this. 

The game is at an early stage of development with only the sole elements but you can change this. You as my funder will bring this game litterally to life and give millions a whole new experience.

I need your funding urgently because game costs are rising and I am struggling to keep up. With your all important funding I could make the game more feature full, fun and exciting to a wider audience and by reaching out to the console market I could bring zombies to everyones living room. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding desperatly because costs are rising rapidly and because we want to make a game that you will love and want to never put down. We can add many new extensive and groundbreaking features, release on consoles, create a marketing campaign the game deserves and to make sure the game sees the light of day.

Have you ever wanted to be in a video game or to design your very own level well now you can with our totally unique and exciting perks.

If we don't reach our target goal we will make small cuts where we can but honestly speaking without the money we so desperately need we won't be able to make the game we know and love.

The Impact

Global Infection will bring hours of joy and wow into the lives of those who play it. It's a new breed of gaming that with your help I can bring to the world.

I am passionate, determined and will use your money sensibly funding important necessaries only.

Global Infection will become something huge if you help and donate.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate yourself then please still try to get your friends, family or others to help out. Remember all the help we can get is going to make a real difference. Facebook and Twitter are good places to spread the word but indiegogo also have good share tools.

 

You can find out more about us and of Global Infection here at:

www.shangri-lagamestudios.com

Spread the word and get funding.

 

Sincerely,

 

Reiss Wort

Owner and Founder

Shangri-la Game Studios
