story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust.

Introducing my background and myself.

 Hi I'm Marc Antony Stewart. Since 1989, I've been quietly working away, on my board game Sangreal. My background is philosophy, psychology, theology, art, writing, and more than a passing interest in extrasensory perception (ESP), and the subconscious mind.

Briefly describing my campaign and why it's important to me.

 This campaign is important to me,  because the passion in my life is only there when I am helping others. But I cannot continue to do any more not-for-profit work without your crowdfunding help here today. 

Expressing the magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve.

The magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve cannot be underestimated as the Sangreal board game is the mainspring tool for bringing universal suffrage through crowdfunding as detailed on the homepage of http://QofS.Org.

What We Need & What You Get

Explaining how much funding I need and where it's going. Being transparent and specific; as people need to trust us to want to fund us.

The funding is required to cover the cost of printing a board game set with well over one thousand separate cards, marketing, building a great website around the Sangreal board game by partnering with Amazon to use their shopping cart with its excellent shipping options, a T.V commercial shot showing the first boxed set off the printing press being played targeting the university student market and those romantically inclined as couples, families, friends and co-workers. 

Telling people about my unique perks. Getting you excited!

The best perk we have is a Sangreal board game set which is delivered to your door hot off the presses thanks only to your kind,  generous contributions.  Please take a look at the many perks on offer.

Describing where the funds go if I don't reach my entire goal. 

If the funding target is not reached I will use the money to produce the wooden handcrafted game sets and use http://QofS.Org which already shows the game being played, using Paypal to process the sales. I will spend some of the money on marketing by direct mail and on radio talkback shows where me and the DJ will play Sangreal . . . reading out a game Great Thoughts quotation and making an original comment to get the listeners comments rolling in live on air!

The Impact

Explaining more about my campaign and letting people know the difference their contribution will make:

Explaining why my project is valuable to the contributor and to the world. 

Sangreal game brings about conversations amongst its player's on a wide range of famous thought provoking interesting quotations and other subject matter cards as detailed further down on this Indiegogo funding page. Sangreal beats the drum of life, of politics, of religion, of science, of psychology, of philosophy, of struggle, triumph, mystery, serendipity and people's differences. It generates thoughts well beyond the weather and the usual everyday banter of ho hum mundane day-to-day thoughts. 

Sangreal play on mass in every living room and televised play with its one million dollar prize for the grand winning player and for each of the best winning family of player's and couple. Creating a wonderful quantum entanglement of people's individual consciousness, affecting the mass consciousness, by way of the flow, of the games conversations, into general everyday life exposure to moments giving player's and people they meet chances to communicate in more meaningful ways on topics we all want to be discussing in the world right now. Especially the women and children doing two-thirds of the global work for only one-tenth of the world's income and no universal suffrage to promote a ground-swell of freedom of speech creating a world full of global citizens in the know! 

Pointing out my successful track record with projects like this. 

I have successfully completed my Sangreal Coffee Table Book about the end of disease and violence now being in our grasp and the reason the board game Sangreal is needed in the world right now to assist this change . . . taking me since 1995 to write. 

Also other completed projects are a science-fiction movie for Hollywood titled “Thinker toys” and 15 books some rather short as eBooks and others 200 to 300 pages long as paperbacks available from Amazon presently and soon to be available in libraries and bookstores.  

Sangreal as a project has taken me from one triumph to the next. Like the drawing up of the playing board design, making it into a wooden playing board, making it into a wooden box, making the small wooden playing goblets, same the large goblet in Apricot tree wood, same the small pawn playing pieces, same finding the tiny wooden voting spheres to allow the many trials we put the game through until the rules (further down this page) were just the way you'll like them!

Making it real for people and building trust.

Like you I am choosing how best to make a change in the world. The success of Sangreal board game and universal suffrage (global voting) is down to your contributions . . . in exchange for what I hope will be some very nice perks. 

The Sangreal project has been helped in this way many times already by people just like you who have a care about helping out the best they can. Such as the local pizza shop owner who gave me the simple yet profound recipes for the shops secret pizza base sauce and dough mixture. 

And also I was travelling through a small country town in Melbourne, Australia where I had eaten the most delightful carrot cake . . . this time round, asking the shopkeeper, about the cakes baker, told she lived next door, I found her sitting on her front steps. Telling her of my love for her carrot cake she gave me the recipe. I had mentioned it to someone, who against my integrity sold it to a major airline; now dished up as inflight dessert. 

Then there is great grandmother's Hiker’s Cake, which does not hang around for long, a family and friends favorite, lovely and soft, melting in your mouth and requiring no baking, made from plain supermarket brought biscuits, able to be made while camping. 

Nancy my cousin Gary’s wife is the baker of her family famous, to-die-for Chocolate Gateau Cake recipe. 

And there are my own recipes; such as a twist on the standard Oyster’s Kilpatrick Dish for men that burn everything and my Two Spices Buttery Steak Sauce recipe for for any kind steak to liven it up to cuisine standard for you budding chefs at home! And don't miss out on the special bonus recipes from my mother's baking and cooking scrapbook pages!

Risks & Challenges

Sharing what qualifies me to overcome any hurdles. 

As my sister Susan said, “Marc no matter how things go you always turn them around”. I am lucky I naturally gravitate towards forward-thinking visualization being my own psychology of happiness, always striving to move forward with confidence and determined intentions of the best happening.  

Describing my plan for solving any challenges. 

To solve challenges that come my way I use meditation which gives me the gift of going along with the flow. 

For hard decisions I will use my Holy Grail Method as detailed in my Sangreal Coffee Table Book. Basically it is the method whereby one can ask any question of the subconscious and get an immediate reply into the blank space formed in the mind . . . the answer is always placing one on the immediate solution path to the problem to be solved . . . in always a strange and empowering way.  

Also I have learned to concentrate on one project at a time until completion. It is in this way I get a sense of satisfaction, and I am quickly able to move on. 

Other Ways You Can Help.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

Asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.

I just cannot stress enough how valuable you are if you let others know to Google Sangreal on Indiegogo.  What I say to strangers I meet about Sangreal is: A player is asked to read out aloud a quotation and then asked to make their original comment on it and then the game is open to comments by all players, opening up tremendous conversations on topics of great interest. 

Reminding you to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

You may have the gift of knowing your way around the social websites, I do not, and I admire anyone who has such a skill, as, Facebooking or Twitter tweeting! Instead I am on a learning curve. If you think to yourself I do not mind helping Marc and his daughter's out with their Sangreal campaign on Indiegogo. Please feel free to utilize all of the tools, like the share buttons you can click on and then you can say I was genuinely one of those responsible for turning the Sangreal board game project on Indiegogo VIRAL!!! In other words feel free to share this Indiegogo project. I know as we all know that word-of-mouth is the greatest and most sought after form of advertising in the world . . . it's freedom of speech at its best!

We thank you for your contribution and you'll be able to say, "I was a really big cog in the wheel that made the Sangreal board game a reality".

Sangreal Way Of Play Rules:  

Players choose a small cup each and the 7 same color pawn playing pieces and select a starting position on one of the seven points of the playing board. Then some of the Great Thoughts, The Rest, The Quest, Science Notes and Kid's Corner cards are placed face down on the table. 

The player who throws the highest score with the two dice begins the game. Players remain on the outer pathway until they collect the full set of "Hallows" cards. Players may move in any direction on the outer pathway. When a player lands on a Hallows (H) square all players focus their attention on the moment for A Gathering has been called. The player who is on the Hallows square picks out a single card from off the top of any of the piles of cards except for The Quest category. The player on the Hallows (H) space reads this card out loudly to all the players present. 

The purpose of the game is to allow opportunities for all players to express themselves. Speaking in any way they would like to express themselves. Regardless of age (Kids Corner and Science Notes cards), life experience, or standing in eyes of anyone other than their own eyes the player on the Hallows (H) square must speak out aloud their comment first before the other players get their chance to make a comment of their own. As simple as A.B.C. And this is all there is to this game and more-so what follows is the magic the game creates. 

During play any player who laughs in an obvious mocking or who gets angry at another player's comments for any reason during the entire game play. Must leave the table completely and try to remain as silent as possible, for any length of time as decided prior to play commencing. Or using an ordinary 3-minute kitchen egg timer. Of course once the time out is over. The player concerned takes up a turn when the die comes around to them again. Of course this rule can be ignored if you as players decide you want more of a university debate where the conversations can be more of a free for all more promoting a more complete freedom of speech.

It makes conversations happen in a very good way on a wide variety of subjects. Instantly it gets people talking. It is like a truth serum. Being really cupids arrows and bow to play romance or friendship between older players and the young for fun. Either a discussion of note ensues or the voting commences as follows. 

Time for the "Reckoning" to begin players! If you decide on as little as a whim our player on the (H) Hallowed Ground is far from Dim then drop a sphere into the Sangreal Cup. However if you decide our player’s notion is shallow Small-Talk or back-pedalling Tall-talk. There’s no need to pout or shout. Simply, do not place your sphere in the cup! 

 Sangreal does not need any rhetoric to hurt its players. Forcing turtles back into shells. So relax Jack and Jill and allow King Arthur, Queen Guinevere and Company an opportunity to show their way, their Round Table Way. And those who sit around it honor the art of Chivalry, courage and courtesy. If you are standing on "Hallowed Ground" and the Sangreal (Holy Grail) Cup sounds out its Reckoning Tone by the majority vote you may select a Hallows card. 

If on the H and you do not hear Merlin's tone drop in like a cherry pip stone on its own. Be still with your throat. You can only collect a "Hallows" card when the majority of players place a sphere in the Sangreal cup or when the cup runneth over through jubilation of discussion. Being simply the Hallows card given as this player’s comment has set the game, every brain alight . . . on fire, being the hearts desire. 

Once a player has collected the four Hallows cards he or she throws the die on their next turn. Beginning their journey to claim the seven Virtues. It’s the timeless fascination of the Virtues you must now unravel as you travel the inner pathways. 

The seven Pillar of Virtue (V) spaces are joined by a maze of pathways. Each player seeking to express their true self’s ability as best they can. Proceeds to the Pillar of Virtue of their choosing and so on to each in the order they deem best. Exact number does not need to be thrown to achieve position on a Pillar of Virtue. These positions are marked with a V. 

Once a player arrives on a pillar of Virtue (V) space they may choose to pick a Quest card off the top of the pile and answer its question with a yes or a no. A player other than the player attempting to answer the Quest card question reads the card out aloud and gives the answer on the card's back. When the card is no longer required it is returned to the bottom of the cards for selection. 

When a player successfully answers a Quest card question. They collect the Virtue card of their choosing and leave their color pawn like marker playing piece on this Pillar of Virtue (V) before you go, to let you know you have been to this destination on your travels. As the playing boards magic ride drives you deeper into its magic inner spaces. Later letting you know you have been to this V space and are on Track to empower yourself with the entire seven Virtue cards. 

If unsuccessful at answering a Quest question. Try again to get your Virtue card on your next turn of the die. These Quest cards are simply small stories of things; of adventures in Mallory’s book titled King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table. And each answer is either a yes or a no. No harder then this. 

A player on the Virtue pace may choose not to use The Quest cards and can choose instead to use any of Great Thoughts, The Rest or Science Notes cards and simply make an original statement or ask a Kids Corner question as the case maybe to start a conversation and set voting or the jubilance rule for the conversation in motion in their attempt to gain their Virtue card.

More than one player may be positioned on a Pillar of Virtue at any one time. A player who has collected all seven Virtue cards immediately heads for Camelot and the Round Table. Being your original starting outer playing board corner position. Players must on their turn of arriving back home tell a story based on one of the virtues displayed on the Virtue Cards or on one of the dictionary definitions of the word Virtue. Examples given: Excellence, worth, the practice of duty, a good quality and an accomplishment. 

The characters you use may be real or imaginary. An Animal, mammal, insect or cartoon. The player may mime, dance, act out a part, impersonate a hero, and draw from legend, fable, or poem. The sky is the limit. Be creative, explore! And you can use your time outside the game to think up your Virtue story ending. You do not have to tell your story right away, you may wait until the turn of your own making best suiting you being ready. 

Improvisation can be the key. Just pick a word. Another player commenting on a quotation or something perhaps of the adventures of Sir Lancelot or of the Lady Dinrane. As your friend. Or as Morpheus put it to Neo, "you think it's air you are breathing". Say anything even absolutely outrageous and stop them in their tracks. 

At the end of some absolutely outrageous story of complete and utter unbelievableness. Add at the finish . . . oh and one last thing. You can’t believe a thing I say. How cool is Sangreal? 

Your five to fifteen minutes of fame awaits. Audience! One sphere in the cup will show our storyteller or actor your appreciation. 

You win the Sangreal prize by majority rule, example given, if there are five players then at least three spheres must enter the Sangreal Cup. 

Also players prior to starting the game. May designate the winner to be the first player to collect seven "Virtue" cards, reach Camelot their home starting corner and dramatize a Virtue with at least some degree of earnestness. 

Player's can discuss the way the game shall end and the winner found before play begins and vote on the decision with the voting spheres until a majority is reached.

Finally. Another twist is to use the board for a first player round the seven Pillars and home again wins the game. Leaving your pawn play pieces as you go, plotting the course you reason to be the shortest route home. (This version does not use the games cards. Sangreal Cup or voting spheres). 

When a player completes their story without victory there’s no time to bleat; to get back on your feet its focus you need to bring together a new act, line, mime, Rhyme, story, or chorus line. So change tack and select another virtue and before you know it you'll be back on stage, the set lit up and this time it's Ground Hog Day. By now you will have worked it out. It's communication, open minded, trusting, honest, to goodness, communication being the key to the Sangreal Round Table Harmony. 

And to the winner  take a bow  it’s customary somehow! 

Sangreal . . . some do . . . some don't have a beautiful mind! 

Introducing The Board Game Sangreal: 

In which the GREAT THOUGHTS cards together bring into one place, one space, one time, the ideas WHICH have determined the intellectual history of the world - short passages in the original words of the men and women who conceived them. The great thoughts includes: Noble prizes winners, scientists, poets, physicians, writers, dramatists, editors, painters, inventors, mystics, presidents, statesman, founders, innovators, judges, composers, world leaders, romans, greeks, nuns, monks, bishops, teachers, global issues, great thinkers, historians, generals, publishers, reformers, journalists, sculptors, quantum theorists, kings, psychologists, freethinkers, biologists, theologians, champions, radicals, emperors, 

'THE REST' cards include: Shaman, crystals, ghosts, E.S.P, dreams, fables, classical mythology, knowledge, truths, healing without medicine, N.D.E (near death experiences), wisdom, re-discoveries, Egypt, symbology. meditation, imagination, validation, runes, tarot, superstition, Nostradamus, mysteries, proverbs, occultism, parapsychology, astrology, hypnotism, brain-waves, beyond death, creativity, visualization, psychic voyages and powers, re-incarnation, phantom encounters, mind over matter, spiritual science, oracular traditions, visions and prophecies, numerology, legends (Atlantis), 'take care creation in progress', ancient wisdom and secret sects, the minds eye, I Ching, tao, prophets, human aura, mind dynamics, cosmic power, last two million years, The Bhagavad-Gita, religions. 

WHAT DO THESE PEOPLE ALL HAVE IN COMMON? 

Carl Jung, Abraham Lincoln, Friedrich Nietzsche, Aldous Huxley, Dr Wilder Penfield, Pablo Picasso, Pythagoras, Leo Tolstoy, Harry S Truman, Shakespeare, Frank Lloyd Wright, Albert Einstein, Confucius, Ralph Waldo Emerson, George S Patton, Charles Lindberg, Henry David Thoreau, Plato, Thomas Jefferson, Voltaire, Sigmund Freud, John F Kennedy, George Bernard Shaw, Walt Whitman, Michelangelo, Barbara Tuchman, Emanuel Swedenborg, Martin Luther King, Socrates, Rudyard Kipling, Napoleon Bonaparte, Victor Hugo, Louis Pasteur, Vincent Van Gogh, Emma Lazarus, William Penn, Albert Schweitzer, Virginia Woolf, Henry Ford, Lewis Carroll, Franklin D Roosevelt, William Wordsworth, Wilbur Wright, George Washington, Charles Dickens, Robert Burns, and Sir Isaac Newton  – The Sangreal board game . . . some do . . . some don't have a beautiful mind! 

OF LANCELOT, GUINEVERE AND KING   A R T H U R 

How Lancelot fell to his old love again but withdrew from Guinevere to eschew slander. And how the queen commanded him to respect the way of play! So after the quest of Sangreal was fulfilled and all knights left alive were come again unto the Table Round as the rule book of the Way of Play of Sangreal maketh mention. Then was there great joy in the court and in especial King Arthur and Queen Guinevere made great joy of the remnant home and passing glad was the king and the queen of Sir Lancelot and of Sir Bors for they had been passing long in the quest of winning the Sangreal. Then as the Great Thoughts card saith Sir Lancelot began to lament and pine for his true love but Queen Guinevere open-mouthed put her foot down and suggested it was time to allow others the opportunity to play Sangreal. How Sir Galahad, Sir Bors, Merlin, Morgan le Fay, and Sir Percival entered into the game and of The Rest card and of how king Pelles had been maimed for drawing it. 

In the meanwhile Galahad blessed him by placing a sphere in the Sangreal cup. Then next the gentlewoman Morgan Le Fay and then Sir Bors and Sir Percival threw the two dice and when they were playing it was so marvelous fair and rich they marveled at the midst of the game was fairness and Galahad went thereto and found there a crown of virtue. At the feet was a sword rich and fair and it was drawn out of the sheath half a foot and more and the sword was of divers fashions and the pommel was of stone and there was in him all manner of colors being any man might find and every charge of the color had divers virtues. How Sir Lancelot half sleeping and half walking saw a sick man healed of dullness by playing Sangreal into the wee small hours. How Merlin announced to King Arthur the `SANGREAL BOARD GAME' should be played throughout the Realm. And how King Arthur had all his knights together for to practice being not angry and never to laugh at anything before they departed. And how expressions of ability appeared in the knights and in the ladies as they sat at supper and how all the knights took upon themselves the quest to prove, to have patience where woman are concerned; should become a virtue too. 

Porthole and Periscope on The Game 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal believing in yourself and in your abilities and what you can achieve. 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal taking control for yourself and of yourself in every aspect of your life. 

Sangreal play brings about coolness without being cocky and a strong-willed, feisty, friendly and fun sensuality. 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal realization of your personality inside of you and of loving the new you. 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal leaning into synchronicity towards someone you are interested in to show you are being engaged by what they are saying. 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal sense you are a great slow and controlled talker. 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal watching to see whether others are copying your Sangreal style. If they do it’s a good sign they like you and see you as being a great player. 

Sangreal play brings about a supernormal power smiling and a body language, showing you are at ease with yourself. 

What Sangreal Play is NOT About! 

Sangreal play is not about a world of quips, and claims to false fames and tongue-tying talk. 

Sangreal play is not about being arrogant and intolerant to the personally notable comments of others. 

Sangreal play is not about being intimidating and humiliating others. 

Sangreal play is not about being pushy and shouting to get your point across. 

Sangreal play is not about demanding change in others without considering change in yourself. 

Sangreal play is not about being bossy—just the boss of your world. 

Sangreal play is not about being defensive and blocking others comments cutting them short during their delivery. 

Sangreal play is not about speaking loudly or small talk, or talk-talk. 

BENEFITS BEYOND GAME PLAY 

HONESTY 

Sangreal plays supernormal optimistic attitude enables players to see clearly what he or she wants and deals swiftly and effectively with any boundaries and limitations in life. 

CONFIDENCE 

A Sangreal player is in tune with their inner personal expression and understands ultimate power comes from the ability of play to promote genuine self-confidence. 

HUMILITY 

The Sangreal player understands he or she must be humble as well as awesome. Human in the knowledge not being superior to others has an empowering effect bringing them an air of grace and of dignity alluring to others. 

TIMING 

The Sangreal player experiences supernormal synchronicity in generous abundance. Play allows the subconscious right-brain to engineer subtly a path towards and into your desires. 

INDEPENDENCE 

A Sangreal player is defined by their supernormal sense of self and comfort in their own identity as witnessed by others in their ability to express themselves in and outside the game. 

DECISIVENESS 

The Sangreal player approaches the games quotes and situations outside the game with supernormal extrasensory decisiveness through right-brain universe guided insightful choice. 

PERSUASION 

Sangreal players ultimate power of persuasion comes from their supernormal reflex ability to express themselves in the open freeness of the game. 

RESPECT 

The Sangreal player knows the value of respect through giving and receiving it inside and outside the game.

Three Testimonials:

Sue said, “Well I’m really surprised by how much I’ve learned about you two today, and I think Sangreal’s the kind of game that gets you talking to each other”.

Bonne said, “Yeah”.

Sue said, “And not so much about yourself, although of course Sangreal’s about you, Sangreal is about what you share, but things a little more than ourselves”.

Jenah said, “I learned something about you too”.

Sue said, “Ah cool, yeah I love that about Sangreal, it’s amazing”.

Bonne said, “Sangreal’s a game that you can learn from, Sangreal sort of opens up conversations on topics about people that you may know but also things like Sangreal sort of brings in topics that are not that usually spoken about or wouldn’t usually or come up in a conversation”.

Sue said, “Yeah”.

Bonne said,  “Sangreal kind of opens up your world, and Sangreal’s kind of good though because you get to exercise different thought processes”.

Sue said, “Yeah that you wouldn’t normally “.

Bonne said, “Like the cards you bring out, like you really have to think sometimes”.

Jenah said, “Sangreal gives people a chance to say something without prejudice and they can say something honestly they think without people having to go on a huge debate against them or Sangreal’s just hearing peoples ideas which is nice”!

Sue said, “Yeah, perspective”.

Bonne said, “I quite like the fact that Sangreal is not competitive, because most games out there are and these games depends on who you play with, it can ruin the game if your playing with someone who is really competitive or is a really bad, you know a poor loser, but because Sangreal’s a game where everyone is equal at the same time and that includes everyone when it is your turn as well, Sangreal’s quite enjoyable”.

Sue said, “Yeah, Sangreal’s more ethical, it’s the level of co-operation, Sangreal’s cool”!

Sangreal board game . . . some do . . . some don’t have a beautiful mind!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about
and to people they trust.
Introducing my background and myself.
 Hi I'm Marc Antony Stewart. Since
1989, I've been quietly working away, on my board game Sangreal. My background
is philosophy, psychology, theology, art, writing, and more than a passing interest in extrasensory perception (ESP), and the subconscious mind.

Briefly describing my campaign and why it's important to me.
 This campaign is important to me,  because the
passion in my life is only there when I am helping others. But I cannot
continue to do any more not-for-profit work without
your crowdfunding help here today. 
Expressing the magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve.
The
magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve cannot be underestimated
as the Sangreal board game is the mainspring tool for bringing universal
suffrage through crowdfunding as detailed on the homepage of http://QofS.Org.
What We Need & What You Get
Explaining how much funding I need and
where it's going. Being transparent and specific; as people need to trust us to
want to fund us.
The funding is required to cover the cost of printing a board game set with well over one thousand separate cards, marketing, building a great website around the Sangreal board game by partnering with Amazon to use their shopping cart with its excellent shipping options, a T.V commercial shot showing the first boxed set off the printing press being played targeting the university student market and those romantically inclined as couples, families, friends and co-workers. 
Telling people about my unique perks. Getting you excited!
The best perk we have is a Sangreal board game set which is delivered to your door hot off the presses thanks only to your kind,  generous contributions.  Please take a look at the many perks on offer.
Describing where the funds go if I don't reach my entire goal. 
If the funding target
     is not reached I will use the money to produce the wooden handcrafted game
     sets and use http://QofS.Org which already shows the game being
     played, using Paypal to process the sales. I will
     spend some of the money on marketing by direct mail and on radio talkback
     shows where me and the DJ will play Sangreal . . . reading out a game Great Thoughts quotation
     and making an original comment to get the listeners comments rolling in live on air!The Impact

Explaining more about my campaign and letting people
know the difference their contribution will make:
Explaining why my project is valuable to the contributor and to the
world. 
Sangreal game brings about conversations amongst its player's on a wide range of famous thought provoking interesting quotations and other subject matter cards as detailed further down on this Indiegogo funding page. Sangreal beats the drum of life, of politics, of religion, of science, of psychology, of philosophy, of struggle, triumph, mystery, serendipity and people's differences. It generates thoughts well beyond the weather and the usual everyday banter of ho hum mundane day-to-day thoughts. Sangreal play on mass in every living room and televised play with its one million dollar prize for the grand winning player and for each of the best winning family of player's and couple. Creating a wonderful quantum entanglement of people's individual consciousness, affecting the mass consciousness, by way of the flow, of the games conversations, into general everyday life exposure to moments giving player's and people they meet chances to communicate in more meaningful ways on topics we all want to be discussing in the world right now. Especially the women and children doing two-thirds of the global work for only one-tenth of the world's income and no universal suffrage to promote a ground-swell of freedom of speech creating a world full of global citizens in the know! 
Pointing out my successful track record with projects like this. 
I have
     successfully completed my Sangreal Coffee Table Book about the end of disease and violence now being in our grasp and the reason the board
     game Sangreal is needed in the world right now to assist this change . . . taking me since 1995 to write. Also other completed projects are a science-fiction
     movie for Hollywood titled “Thinker toys” and 15 books some rather short as eBooks and others 200 to 300 pages long as paperbacks available from Amazon presently and soon to be available in libraries and bookstores.  Sangreal as a project has taken me from one triumph to the next. Like the drawing up of the playing board design, making it into a wooden playing board, making it into a wooden box, making the small wooden playing
     goblets, same the large goblet in Apricot tree wood, same the small pawn playing pieces, same finding the tiny wooden voting
     spheres to allow the many trials we put the game through until the rules (further down this page) were just the way you'll like them!



Making it real for people and building trust.
Like you I am choosing how best to make a change in the world. The success of Sangreal board game and universal suffrage (global voting) is down to your contributions . . . in exchange for what I hope will be some very nice perks. 
The Sangreal project has been helped in this way many times already by people just like you who have a care about helping out the best they can. Such as the local pizza
     shop owner who gave me the simple yet profound recipes for the shops secret pizza base sauce and dough mixture. 
And also I was travelling
     through a small country town in Melbourne, Australia where I had eaten the most delightful carrot cake . . . this time round, asking the
     shopkeeper, about the cakes baker, told she lived next door, I found her sitting on her front steps. Telling her of my love for her carrot cake she gave me the recipe. I had mentioned it to someone, who against my integrity sold it to a major airline; now dished up as inflight dessert. 


Then
     there is great grandmother's Hiker’s Cake, which does not hang around for long, a family and friends favorite, lovely and soft, melting in your mouth and requiring no baking, made from plain supermarket brought biscuits, able to be made while camping. 
Nancy my cousin Gary’s wife is the baker of her family famous, to-die-for Chocolate Gateau Cake recipe. 
And there are my own recipes; such as a twist on the standard Oyster’s
     Kilpatrick Dish for men that burn everything and my Two Spices Buttery Steak Sauce recipe for for any kind steak to liven it up to cuisine standard for you budding chefs at home! And don't miss out on the special bonus recipes from my mother's baking and cooking scrapbook pages!
Risks & Challenges
Sharing what qualifies me to overcome any
hurdles. 
As my sister Susan said, “Marc
     no matter how things go you always turn them around”. I am lucky I
     naturally gravitate towards forward-thinking visualization being my own psychology of happiness, always striving to move forward with confidence and determined intentions of the best happening.  
Describing my plan for solving any challenges. 
To solve challenges that come my way I use meditation which gives me the gift of going along with the flow. For hard decisions I will use my Holy Grail Method as detailed in my Sangreal Coffee Table Book. Basically it is the method whereby one can ask any question of the subconscious and get an immediate reply into the blank space formed in the mind . . . the answer is always placing one on the immediate solution path to the problem to be solved . . . in always a strange and empowering way.  Also I have learned to concentrate
     on one project at a time until completion. It is in this way I get a sense of satisfaction, and I am quickly able to move on. 
Other Ways You Can Help.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't
mean you can't help!
Asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
I just cannot stress
     enough how valuable you are if you let others know to Google Sangreal on Indiegogo.  What I say to strangers I meet about Sangreal is: A player is asked to read out aloud a quotation and
     then asked to make their original comment on it and then the game is open to comments by all players, opening up tremendous conversations on topics of great interest. 
Reminding you to use the Indiegogo share
tools! 
You may have the gift of knowing your way around
     the social websites, I do not, and I admire anyone who has such a skill, as, Facebooking or Twitter tweeting! Instead I am on a learning curve. If
     you think to yourself I do not mind helping Marc and his daughter's out with their Sangreal campaign on Indiegogo. Please feel free to utilize all of the tools, like the share buttons you
can click on and then you can say I was genuinely one of those responsible for
turning the Sangreal board game project on Indiegogo VIRAL!!! In other
words feel free to share this Indiegogo project. I know as we all know
that word-of-mouth is the greatest and most sought after form of advertising in
the world . . . it's freedom of speech at its best!
We thank you for your contribution and you'll be able to say, "I was a really
big cog in the wheel that made the Sangreal board game a reality".
Sangreal Way Of Play Rules:  Players choose a small cup each and the 7 same color pawn playing pieces and select a starting position on one of the seven points of the playing board. Then some of the Great Thoughts, The Rest, The Quest, Science Notes and Kid's Corner cards are placed face down on the table. The player who throws the highest score with the two dice begins the game. Players remain on the outer pathway until they collect the full set of "Hallows" cards. Players may move in any direction on the outer pathway. When a player lands on a Hallows (H) square all players focus their attention on the moment for A Gathering has been called. The player who is on the Hallows square picks out a single card from off the top of any of the piles of cards except for The Quest category. The player on the Hallows (H) space reads this card out loudly to all the players present. The purpose of the game is to allow opportunities for all players to express themselves. Speaking in any way they would like to express themselves. Regardless of age (Kids Corner and Science Notes cards), life experience, or standing in eyes of anyone other than their own eyes the player on the Hallows (H) square must speak out aloud their comment first before the other players get their chance to make a comment of their own. As simple as A.B.C. And this is all there is to this game and more-so what follows is the magic the game creates. 
During play any player who laughs in an obvious mocking or who gets angry at another player's comments for any reason during the entire game play. Must leave the table completely and try to remain as silent as possible, for any length of time as decided prior to play commencing. Or using an ordinary 3-minute kitchen egg timer. Of course once the time out is over. The player concerned takes up a turn when the die comes around to them again. Of course this rule can be ignored if you as players decide you want more of a university debate where the conversations can be more of a free for all more promoting a more complete freedom of speech.It makes conversations happen in a very good way on a wide variety of subjects. Instantly it gets people talking. It is like a truth serum. Being really cupids arrows and bow to play romance or friendship between older players and the young for fun. Either a discussion of note ensues or the voting commences as follows. Time for the "Reckoning" to begin players! Sangreal Cup or voting spheres). When a player completes their story without victory there’s no time to bleat; to get back on your feet its focus you need to bring together a new act, line, mime, Rhyme, story, or chorus line. So change tack and select another virtue and before you know it you'll be back on stage, the set lit up and this time it's Ground Hog Day. By now you will have worked it out. It's communication, open minded, trusting, honest, to goodness, communication being the key to the Sangreal Round Table Harmony. And to the winner  take a bow  it’s customary somehow! Sangreal . . . some do . . . some don't have a beautiful mind! Introducing The Board Game Sangreal: 
In which the GREAT THOUGHTS cards together bring into one place, one space, one time, the ideas WHICH have determined the intellectual history of the world - short passages in the original words of the men and women who conceived them. The great thoughts includes: Noble prizes winners, scientists, poets, physicians, writers, dramatists, editors, painters, inventors, mystics, presidents, statesman, founders, innovators, judges, composers, world leaders, romans, greeks, nuns, monks, bishops, teachers, global issues, great thinkers, historians, generals, publishers, reformers, journalists, sculptors, quantum theorists, kings, psychologists, freethinkers, biologists, theologians, champions, radicals, emperors, 'THE REST' cards include: Shaman, crystals, ghosts, E.S.P, dreams, fables, classical mythology, knowledge, truths, healing without medicine, N.D.E (near death experiences), wisdom, re-discoveries, Egypt, symbology. meditation, imagination, validation, runes, tarot, superstition, Nostradamus, mysteries, proverbs, occultism, parapsychology, astrology, hypnotism, brain-waves, beyond death, creativity, visualization, psychic voyages and powers, re-incarnation, phantom encounters, mind over matter, spiritual science, oracular traditions, visions and prophecies, numerology, legends (Atlantis), 'take care creation in progress', ancient wisdom and secret sects, the minds eye, I Ching, tao, prophets, human aura, mind dynamics, cosmic power, last two million years, The Bhagavad-Gita, religions. WHAT DO THESE PEOPLE ALL HAVE IN COMMON? Carl Jung, Abraham Lincoln, Friedrich Nietzsche, Aldous Huxley, Dr Wilder Penfield, Pablo Picasso, Pythagoras, Leo Tolstoy, Harry S Truman, Shakespeare, Frank Lloyd Wright, Albert Einstein, Confucius, Ralph Waldo Emerson, George S Patton, Charles Lindberg, Henry David Thoreau, Plato, Thomas Jefferson, Voltaire, Sigmund Freud, John F Kennedy, George Bernard Shaw, Walt Whitman, Michelangelo, Barbara Tuchman, Emanuel Swedenborg, Martin Luther King, Socrates, Rudyard Kipling, Napoleon Bonaparte, Victor Hugo, Louis Pasteur, Vincent Van Gogh, Emma Lazarus, William Penn, Albert Schweitzer, Virginia Woolf, Henry Ford, Lewis Carroll, Franklin D Roosevelt, William Wordsworth, Wilbur Wright, George Washington, Charles Dickens, Robert Burns, and Sir Isaac Newton  – The Sangreal board game . . . some do . . . some don't have a beautiful mind! 
OF LANCELOT, GUINEVERE AND KING   A R T H U R How Lancelot fell to his old love again but withdrew from Guinevere to eschew slander. And how the queen commanded him to respect the way of play! So after the quest of Sangreal was fulfilled and all knights left alive were come again unto the Table Round as the rule book of the Way of Play of Sangreal maketh mention. Then was there great joy in the court and in especial King Arthur and Queen Guinevere made great joy of the remnant home and passing glad was the king and the queen of Sir Lancelot and of Sir Bors for they had been passing long in the quest of winning the Sangreal. Then as the Great Thoughts card saith Sir Lancelot began to lament and pine for his true love but Queen Guinevere open-mouthed put her foot down and suggested it was time to allow others the opportunity to play Sangreal. How Sir Galahad, Sir Bors, Merlin, Morgan le Fay, and Sir Percival entered into the game and of The Rest card and of how king Pelles had been maimed for drawing it. 
In the meanwhile Galahad blessed him by placing a sphere in the Sangreal cup. Then next the gentlewoman Morgan Le Fay and then Sir Bors and Sir Percival threw the two dice and when they were playing it was so marvelous fair and rich they marveled at the midst of the game was fairness and Galahad went thereto and found there a crown of virtue. At the feet was a sword rich and fair and it was drawn out of the sheath half a foot and more and the sword was of divers fashions and the pommel was of stone and there was in him all manner of colors being any man might find and every charge of the color had divers virtues. How Sir Lancelot half sleeping and half walking saw a sick man healed of dullness by playing Sangreal into the wee small hours. How Merlin announced to King Arthur the `SANGREAL BOARD GAME' should be played throughout the Realm. And how King Arthur had all his knights together for to practice being not angry and never to laugh at anything before they departed. And how expressions of ability appeared in the knights and in the ladies as they sat at supper and how all the knights took upon themselves the quest to prove, to have patience where woman are concerned; should become a virtue too. Porthole and Periscope on The Game Sangreal play brings about a supernormal believing in yourself and in your abilities and what you can achieve. Sangreal play brings about a supernormal taking control for yourself and of yourself in every aspect of your life. Sangreal play brings about coolness without being cocky and a strong-willed, feisty, friendly and fun sensuality. Sangreal play brings about a supernormal realization of your personality inside of you and of loving the new you. Sangreal play brings about a supernormal leaning into synchronicity towards someone you are interested in to show you are being engaged by what they are saying. Sangreal play brings about a supernormal sense you are a great slow and controlled talker. Sangreal play brings about a supernormal watching to see whether others are copying your Sangreal style. If they do it’s a good sign they like you and see you as being a great player. Sangreal play brings about a supernormal power smiling and a body language, showing you are at ease with yourself. What Sangreal Play is NOT About! Sangreal play is not about a world of quips, and claims to false fames and tongue-tying talk. Sangreal play is not about being arrogant and intolerant to the personally notable comments of others. Sangreal play is not about being intimidating and humiliating others. Sangreal play is not about being pushy and shouting to get your point across. Sangreal play is not about demanding change in others without considering change in yourself. Sangreal play is not about being bossy—just the boss of your world. Sangreal play is not about being defensive and blocking others comments cutting them short during their delivery. Sangreal play is not about speaking loudly or small talk, or talk-talk. BENEFITS BEYOND GAME PLAY HONESTY Sangreal plays supernormal optimistic attitude enables players to see clearly what he or she wants and deals swiftly and effectively with any boundaries and limitations in life. CONFIDENCE A Sangreal player is in tune with their inner personal expression and understands ultimate power comes from the ability of play to promote genuine self-confidence. HUMILITY The Sangreal player understands he or she must be humble as well as awesome. Human in the knowledge not being superior to others has an empowering effect bringing them an air of grace and of dignity alluring to others. TIMING The Sangreal player experiences supernormal synchronicity in generous abundance. Play allows the subconscious right-brain to engineer subtly a path towards and into your desires. INDEPENDENCE A Sangreal player is defined by their supernormal sense of self and comfort in their own identity as witnessed by others in their ability to express themselves in and outside the game. DECISIVENESS The Sangreal player approaches the games quotes and situations outside the game with supernormal extrasensory decisiveness through right-brain universe guided insightful choice. PERSUASION Sangreal players ultimate power of persuasion comes from their supernormal reflex ability to express themselves in the open freeness of the game. RESPECT The Sangreal player knows the value of respect through giving and receiving it inside and outside the game.Three Testimonials:
Sue said, “Well I’m really surprised by how much I’ve learned
about you two today, and I think Sangreal’s the kind of game that gets you
talking to each other”.
Bonne said, “Yeah”.
Sue said, “And not so much about yourself, although of course
Sangreal’s about you, Sangreal is about what you share, but things a little
more than ourselves”.
Jenah said, “I learned something about you too”.
Sue said, “Ah cool, yeah I love that about Sangreal, it’s
amazing”.
Bonne said, “Sangreal’s a game that you can learn from,
Sangreal sort of opens up conversations on topics about people that you may
know but also things like Sangreal sort of brings in topics that are not that
usually spoken about or wouldn’t usually or come up in a conversation”.
Sue said, “Yeah”.
Bonne said,  “Sangreal
kind of opens up your world, and Sangreal’s kind of good though because you get
to exercise different thought processes”.
Sue said, “Yeah that you wouldn’t normally “.
Bonne said, “Like the cards you bring out, like you really have
to think sometimes”.
Jenah said, “Sangreal gives people a chance to say something
without prejudice and they can say something honestly they think without people
having to go on a huge debate against them or Sangreal’s just hearing peoples
ideas which is nice”!
Sue said, “Yeah, perspective”.
Bonne said, “I quite like the fact that Sangreal is not
competitive, because most games out there are and these games depends on who
you play with, it can ruin the game if your playing with someone who is really
competitive or is a really bad, you know a poor loser, but because Sangreal’s a
game where everyone is equal at the same time and that includes everyone when
it is your turn as well, Sangreal’s quite enjoyable”.
Sue said, “Yeah, Sangreal’s more ethical, it’s the level of
co-operation, Sangreal’s cool”!
Sangreal board game . . . some do . . . some don’t
have a beautiful mind!

story:
Here you can vote the game on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=423573440

Here you can try a little DEMO: http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/seep-universe-demo/60444/


SEEP Universe is an action-platform game for the PC inspired by the 8-16 bit era created by SEEP.

Originally we released SEEP World, a free indie fan game inspired by 8 bit games.
After achieving a good response with that, we decided to make a really professional game with a similiar concept to create a new brand.

So SEEP Universe is a 100% original game with a new script (total rewrite with many features), a new collision system, two characters in one, 6 buttons (jump, run, punch attack, power up and change character), puzzle element and
exclusive enemies, story and power up.

VIDEO GAMEPLAY:



A strange frequency from the videogame world has taken control of the universe. Four planets have been threatened by five obscure videogame bosses.
Each planet has its own army but this has been broken and now all the negative effects are woven together to create chaos.

SEEP, an indie developer team, has intercepted the code in the timeline that is causing the disaster. The problem seems to be the corruption of the source code of some old arcade systems, these can also teleport people from one place to another where the code is corrupted.

So the brothers Sergio and Enrico, members of SEEP, decide to go into action. Only they can save the universe by crossing through various arcade systems that have been hacked by a mysterious AI.


SEEP Universe allows the exploration of four bizzarre planets, inspired by retro games.
Run, Jump and battle enemies through more than 20 stages for a 100% retro feeling. This is the game you have always dreamed of from the 16 bit era!

The battles against the bosses change the rules of the game. For example, in the first world you'll need to run away with a SEEP car from a huge boss.
This makes the game experience varied and intriguing!

You can also collect the SEEP Coins to unlock many secrets in the SEEPedia, a huge gallery where you can discover many secrets.

The goal of SEEP Universe is to bring back all of the retro feeling in a new indie game!

We're also thinking of adding 2-player mode for more fun!


FEATURES:

  • 100% pixel art for a 100% retro feeling.
  • Original soundtrack product by Pedro Calquinha and André Marques, two professional musicians, with the collaboration of Amadis Monteiro (drums).
  • Funny 8 bit sound effects.
  • Two characters in one with different skills.
  • Various game level design.
  • SEEPedia, a room where you can unlock pictures, info and cheat with the SEEP money.
  • Many enemies to defeat.
  • Power Ups.
  • 4 worlds and boss battle.
  • Various gameplay: platform, action, puzzle, racing and much more!
  • Secret stages to discover.
  • XInput controller support.


SCREENSHOTS:



SEEP Universe run on our custom arcade cabinet:



Soundtrack by Pedro Calquinha, here a sample theme:


1500 Dollars

  • Approximately 700 to buy the license to sell the game, and entry in Steam Greenlight.
  • 400 to promote the game.
  • 200 for the material.
  • 200 for the website

ORDINARY PERKS:

$1 our thanks on our blog/website.

$5 Your name in the game's credits.

$10 You'll have a Digital Copy of SEEP World with a digital booklet, and your name in the credits, of course.


YOUR AVATAR IN SEEP UNIVERSE:

For each person who supports the game with at least $20 will we will create their avatar in the style of SEEP Universe.
We'll also use the avatar in the game (in the credits) and you'll receive the sprite to use as you prefer.

To create the avatar we will need a description or photo of you (email: safgames@virgilio.it or -seep-@libero.it) after you've supported the game, of course.

PHYSICAL FORMAT:

For $60 you will receive a physical format of the game. This includes a classic DVD box with a cover, 3 postcards of SEEP Universe and the dvd with the Soundtrack in MP3 format and the game.



UNIVERSE LIMITED EDITION:

For 5 people only. With the limited edition ($200) you'll have all the materials from the $60 perk plus a new box, 3 exclusive postcards (one with your avatar) and a t-shirt.
In the new box we'll stamp your SEEP Universe avatar with your name for the most exclusive copy in the entire universe!

We are two brothers from Italy. We love the 'old school' of videogames and our favourite consoles are NES, SNES, NEO GEO, SATURN and SEGA MEGA-DRIVE.
In the past we created a lot of fan games like beat em up, platform and RPG games created with many different tools and engines (like MMF, RPG Maker and OpenBOR).
We also write for SEEP Bar, our second blog dedicated to Retrogaming and Indie Games.

  • SEEP blog: http://seeproduction.blogspot.it/
  • SEEP Bar: http://seepbar.blogspot.it/
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/SEEP/215153788515615?ref=bookmarks
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeepProduction
  • GameJolt Profile: http://gamejolt.com/profile/seep/108545/
  • SEEP World: http://seeproduction.blogspot.it/2013/11/seep-world.html

story:
Short Summary

This game will be a 7-12 level 3d Virtual Reality horror maze game taking place in an abandoned hospice. After complications on the road. Fate leads you to a  mysterious building... 

What We Need & What You Get

Basically what we need from you wonderful people is the funds to get an Oculus Rift DK2 and purchase Unity Pro and the Team licence. You guys will get a wonderful game at a cheap price

    The Impact

    The main reason for making this game is Our team wants to get our name out there as a game studio.

      Risks & Challenges

      Since we are all involved in school there will be the issue of enough time in the day to complete this project in a timely manner, but rest assured we will have weekly meetings to keep on track and we are all prepared to sacrifice our time to completing this project.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        If you dont have any money to support this i understand. but it would be great if you could still spread the word about our little project here and help us gain a following and get our name out there.

                                                                                      Thank you Personally,

                                                                                                       Coby Kuhns-Lead Developer

story:
>>> PLEASE SUPPORT US BY JOINING OUR FACEBOOK FANPAGE! <<<

More about Alien Hamster Ball!!

Hopefully, the trailer gave you a good overview of who we are and what we are trying to do. However, I know how boring it can be to listen to me talking the whole time, since I unfortunately don't possess the Hollywood actor skill set, so I figured I would share some extra, more detailed information about the game for those who are interested!

 

The Hamster Story

Our cute, naughty and sometimes even rude little alien hamster friends come from the planet Squeek in a far far away galaxy called Furratron. Due to the invention of a new type of spaceship, they could travel through the universe quickly and easily. Many hamsters started on an adventure, to find resources and explore other planets. The problem is, when their spaceships entered the earth's atmosphere, a lot of parts were burned and spread throughout the world! Will you help them find the parts & resources so they can continue their adventure?



 

Hamster Personalities

We are really trying to give our players the option to make their hamsters the way they want them to be! That's why we implemented different personality types to suit your taste of hamsters. You can own more than 1 hamster, so you don't have to stick to only the 1 personality! Below you can see a list of the different personality types.

- Tough & Angry

- Relaxed Surfer

- Cute & Cuddly

- Sexy & Naughty

- Nerdy

- No personality

Each personality is matched with its own unique phrases and texts (with the exception of the last one of course). Sometimes, when you ignore the hamsters for too long, they will let you know that they need some attention! Other times, they might make some remarks during the game.



 

Customization Features

With these features, we really went crazy! Not only do we give our players the option to completely adapt the look and feel of their hamsters, but we even took the liberty of allowing everybody to create and decorate the hamsters space stations!

You can completely change your hamster in every single way. Keep it simple, if this is not your thing then don't spend too much time on it. If it is however, you can go as far as fur colours, different eyes, glasses, ear rings, shoes, gloves, hats, tattoos, piercings, necklaces, even accesoires like iPods & much much more!!

For the Space Stations, you have a choice between different types of rooms (space stations) and heaps of furniture, gadgets and futuristic gimmicks. Of course, all styled and designed for the comfort of your hamster!



 

The Main Game & Gameplay

Okay, now we can get to the real stuff. Like we explained a little bit in our trailer, there will be different types of game modes & themes. For the main game, the hamsters will go on their adventure across earth. In a sort of Super Mario, Donkey Kong & Sonic type of gameplay, you have to manouvre through different obstacles, collect as many points as possible and defeat some monsters that cross your path. In total, we want to launch the game with  different themes, each having a day and night version. Each day and night version will feature roughly 6 different levels, depending on the support we get! This also means, it could turn out to be much more! We will update our Facebook page regularly, to let you know what the themes are and to give a sneak peak of what they will look like!

You can play the game alone, on your phone when you're travelling, when you have a spare minute while cooking or basically at any other given moment when you find the time. However, we also implemented a multiplayer feature to all the levels. This is where you can compete both with and against your friends. Practice first on your own, then compete against your friends or random players, or of course, just skip the practicing altogether!



 

Multiplayer Minigames

To really add some excitement into the mix, we want to implement some minigames! All these minigames will be playable against other people and against your friends. These games are meant to add something new to the mix and to enhance the player to player interaction! We have many minigames already conceptualized but we really need your support to get them made! Again, we will release the minigame sneak peaks at a later stage, but i will list 2 games below to give you an idea of what we have in store for you!

- Capture the Flag (play 3 vs 3, or 5 vs 5)

I'm sure we all know capture the flag, now we want to deliver this fun game in an alien hamster varient. How will it work?: The level will be one giant arena and completely symmetrical so that there are no unfair advantages to either team. The object of the game is to collect the opponents flag at their base and safely bring it back to your own base. You need to make sure though, that your own flag is still at your base! During the game, you can knock your opponents off the map by rolling into them. The harder you roll, the harder you will knock into the opposing players! When a player gets knocked off the map, he or she will have to wait 15 seconds, before respawning. Also, as a nice addition we have death pits and special boosts spread across the map to enhance the fun! After a team has collected the opponents flag 3 times, the game is over. We also put a time limit of 5 minutes on it to make sure you're not stuck in the game forever if the teams are too evenly matched!

- Dodge it! (play 1 vs 1)

Set up a game with another player or by yourself and dodge the falling objects! It really is that simple. However, we added some extra's to it of course! There will be point multiplyers, lasting up to 10 seconds and every time you get hit, you get minus points and lose a life. You can set up a game with a time-cap or until you lost all your lives.

 

There is much more to tell but i have to leave some spoilers for the future, which I can do with some nice graphics. Hopefully, this sparked some interest though!



 

How can we use your Help?

We are going to need some specialised people to help us 'fine tune' the game to it's full potential. This means that we need to get the right kind of sound designers, animation specialists, programmers, level designers and much more. Luckily, some of the resources we already have internally on a voluntary basis, so we just need a good push in the back to get it done!

Apart from this, our ambition is to make this game playable for all people, regardless of the hardware they own. This requires some licencing fees for the software and game engines we need to use.

Even more so, we will also encounter costs for the set-up of servers and to uphold traffic. This is as much a start up cost as it is an ongoing cost.

The main aim for the campaign is to reach at least $15.000 to pay off the licensing fees, hardware requirements and basic graphics and sound support in the form of freelancers. However, if we get a bigger push, we will use all that money for the game to make it even bigger and higher quality!

So the bigger the push, the more we can do, the better the game!

All perks that we offer for your contributions are 100% exclusive for our Indiegogo campaign. We will not post these perks anywhere else, nor offer them to anybody else in the future. This way, you can really get something in return for your contribution. We realise of course what we are asking for and don't get satisfaction out of freebies, so we will make it worth your while!

All perks will be handed out at the end of the campaign. Beta keys & in-game items will be delivered when the game is finished!

On a side note, money is not the only way you can help us. It would already be a great help if you're just generally interested in the game and hit 'Like' on our Facebook page. You will automatically see all the updates for the games when you do so. Better still, you could do both! To go to our facebook fanpage directly, click on the picture below:
story_txt:
>>> PLEASE SUPPORT US BY JOINING OUR FACEBOOK FANPAGE! <<<More about Alien Hamster Ball!!
Hopefully, the trailer gave you a good overview of who we are and what we
are trying to do. However, I know how boring it can be to listen to me talking
the whole time, since I unfortunately don't possess the Hollywood actor skill set,
so I figured I would share some extra, more detailed information about the game
for those who are interested! 
 
The Hamster Story
Our cute, naughty and sometimes even rude little alien hamster friends come
from the planet Squeek in a far far away galaxy called Furratron. Due to the
invention of a new type of spaceship, they could travel through the universe
quickly and easily. Many hamsters started on an adventure, to find resources
and explore other planets. The problem is, when their spaceships entered the
earth's atmosphere, a lot of parts were burned and spread throughout the world!
Will you help them find the parts & resources so they can continue their
adventure?
 
Hamster Personalities
We are really trying to give our players the option to make their hamsters
the way they want them to be! That's why we implemented different personality
types to suit your taste of hamsters. You can own more than 1 hamster, so you
don't have to stick to only the 1 personality! Below you can see a list of the
different personality types.
- Tough & Angry
- Relaxed Surfer
- Cute & Cuddly
- Sexy & Naughty
- Nerdy
- No personality
Each personality is matched with its own unique phrases and texts (with the
exception of the last one of course). Sometimes, when you ignore the hamsters
for too long, they will let you know that they need some attention! Other
times, they might make some remarks during the game.
 
Customization Features
With these features, we really went crazy! Not only do we give our players
the option to completely adapt the look and feel of their hamsters, but we even
took the liberty of allowing everybody to create and decorate the hamsters
space stations! 
You can completely change your hamster in every single way. Keep it simple,
if this is not your thing then don't spend too much time on it. If it is
however, you can go as far as fur colours, different eyes, glasses, ear rings,
shoes, gloves, hats, tattoos, piercings, necklaces, even accesoires like iPods
& much much more!!
For the Space Stations, you have a choice between different types of rooms
(space stations) and heaps of furniture, gadgets and futuristic gimmicks. Of
course, all styled and designed for the comfort of your hamster!
