story:
UPDATE 1 - 12/03/2012: We've decided we want to do more than just, "encourage" the freedom of games. Check the "What we need and What you get" section for more details! Also: We've added Beta-Access to the perks list!

 

UPDATE 2 - 18/03/2012: We've received $1424 worth in physical contributions over the weekend! bringing us two thirds of the way to our first goal of $3000! We can't update our target since the campaign is already underway, but know that we're now we're shooting for $4500 total instead of $6000. See the update tab for more info!

 

UPDATE 3 - 24/03/2012: We've hit $2000! Thanks guys!

 

UPDATE 4 - 04/03/2012: We've hit $3000! We can publish! Reaching our first publishing milestone means the game will feature a single linear campaign and a reduced class pool, but will still feel like a complete experience. Help us reach our $6000 target so we can really push the intense themes we've talked about! Thank you all for your support so far, we couldn't do this without you, and we are truely greatful!

 

UPDATE 5 - 06/04/2012: Seculus will be available for High-End Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) Smartphones too! More information on the Dev blog

 

UPDATE 6 - 08/04/2012: Added a little Mock-Map to the Game section to give everyone a better idea of our style.

 

UPDATE 7 - So, the campaign has ended, and we've raised more than enough money to continue with production. I want to thank everyone for contributing. We're eternally greatful. Be sure to keep up with the Development blog, Gyozabot.com, and like the facebook page to get more info on the game from here on out.


We Want to Bring Back Serious Handheld Gaming

We are trying to bring serious gaming back to the handheld world, in its current form, the android market is filled to the brim with mini-games and coffee-break-fillers. A major part of what we're trying to achieve, is to show the mobile device world that real substantial mobile gaming still has a place.

But not just that.

We're developing a Strategy game for the Android tablet (and now smartphone!) platform, but with a twist. Our game has a compelling and relevant theme, one of the major issues of our time, Secularism. In a world where religious extremism has visibly scarred people everywhere, we believe it's important for us to, if only just for a second, consider the ramifications of holding onto an extremist view on religion, whether it be militant atheism, true agnostic indifference or condoning religious violence. It's a serious topic, and we want to create a game with the potential to "accidentally educate" people while they're enjoying themselves. 

If you can help us make this happen, you'll not only be taking a first step towards a more gamer-friendly mobile world but also, you'll be helping us to plant a seed in the back of peoples minds, and we believe that that is where gamings true power lies. The power to influence people.

We know what we need to do, we just need the power to do it, and that is why we've started this campaign.

 

Seculus: A Story of Science and Religion

Long have we discussed and debated "Science vs Religion", but can such a thing even exist? When discussing classic religion, inevitably, the popularized conflict with scientific knowledge is apparent. In our world, discussion pertaining to Creationism vs Evolution, the age of the earth and even the existence of life on other planets is constantly disputed by religious communities, and it is commonly believed that those with faith cannot be recognised scientifically. Science and Religion are two concepts which are often considered opposite, this misconception needs to be broken.

While extremism is commonly attributed to conflict in the middle east and terrorism, extreme belief, leading to violence, exists in every part of the world. This theme is reflected in our game, through the people and characters within.

The story involves three vastly contrasting nations, that attempt to reflect religion, atheism and agnosticism in their most extreme forms. The player takes on the role of a key group from each perspective during the breakout of a religious war, their decisions shape the story, and in each possible outcome, the player is exposed to the possible consequences of their decisions.

The largest nation, Vattinus, is an entirely anti-secular society. It is militantly religious to the point of extremism. Reminiscent of some of the current middle eastern societies, their laws correlate with sin, and subsequently they believe all others are damned. Our first character, a hot-headed squire, hails from here. By beginning the game here, the player will follow the squire in his solo crusade to stop the heathens from other societies, and eventually be forced to question his beliefs.

 

The second largest group can only loosely be called a "nation". The Nomads of the Oddlands, opportunists in nature, don't concern themselves with the existence of a god or gods. They are only interested in what is now, and what will be soon. Sometimes referred to as "the floating country", the Odd drift in position over time, finding new places to spread to. They are known for their live-off-the-land style, and their culture is famous for their hunting and survival prowess. Our second character hails from here, a loyal but quiet soul. She leaves the nomadic herd in search of her brother, and an explanation for the recent destruction of nearby forestland.

 

The last, and smallest, group are known as Cord. Their noocratic government is based entirely on logic, reason and scientific knowledge. Even the least intelligent Cordians have intelligence far greater than anything we know. To them, physics and what we would call "magic" are one and the same. Sporting mana-powered "electronics" and an almost futuristic culture, Cord is advanced enough to have their own space program, while the other nations still toy with steam power. Their society is totally secular, and dominantly anti-religious, leading to internal conflict between theists and atheist subcultures, and religious persecution, much like our world. Because of the anti-theist majority, tension between them and Vattinus is not insignificant, the erection of their mana-barrier is evident of this. Our last character hails from here, a stubborn, arrogant, know-it-all teenager, who believes he can solve the nations issues on his own, and desperate to prove himself to his peers.

 

Our story begins when Cord launches its first satellite into space. The government of Vattinus see this as an insult to their beliefs, some believe it to be an assault on the heavens themselves. While they plan their crusade, the nomads of the Oddlands are forced to abandon their usual indifference when areas of their homeland begin disappearing. While the high mages of Cord stay quiet to the world, and discuss their own agenda.


The Game

A 2D, Pixel-Graphics, Pro-Nostalgia, Retro styled strategy game. It uses an awesome combination of real-time and turn-based mechanics, and is infused heavily with RPG elements. A class-based system of character progression and a huge class tree to go with it. Player choice is also a key feature of the game, with many different ways of building the same classes and characters, equipment customization, 3 intertwined non-linear campaigns and player driven party system.

The player controls an RPG style party. As the campaign progresses, the player moved from country to country, city to city, conquering strategic locations and objectives by deploying their party to a location and accomplishing the given objective (e.g. capturing an objective or defeating an army). A player does this by moving their units on a grid, and attacking other units using spells or weaponry. From a gameplay perspective, a unique feature of our game is the use of Action gauges for turn-based play. Instead of classical turn-by-turn movement, each unit moves at their own interval, some will take more turns than others (like the fast paced archers of the Oddlands) and some will be slower but more powerful (like the gargantuan knights of Ager Vattinus). In addition, each member of the players party grows and develops individually, gaining experience and stats like traditional RPG games. They can be promoted through ranks and will develop new skills and abilities. The player can create new units to add to their party to suit their needs and preferred strategies. The over-world map also features many bonus levels and side missions, designed to give the player a broad view of the game world as well as the finer more detailed aspects of war, and how individuals are affected.


What We Need & What You Get

In order to completely flesh out the game with everything we've designed, we'd need $10,435, but we understand that this is a HUGE request, so we've edited and trimmed the designs to the point where we could ship the game, maintaining its ambitious goals, for $8500. At least to us, its still a huge amount of money to ask for. Because the minimum shippable game we've designed can ship for $5500, we've decided to set our campaign goal to $6000 so we can afford to send out gifts and thanks.

The money would go towards commissioning the rest of the animations and sprites for the game. We've invested a great deal of time searching for low-cost solutions and we have found many (Like the fantastic NoSoapRadio and their free video game music), but animation is the one thing that we cannot work around if we want our game to be taken seriously.

If you can help us see this through, you'll have access to heaps of concept art and lore before the game is released, and the more generous will have the chance to add their own personal touch to the game. The reason we haven't listed per-ordering as a perk, is because the android market doesn't support promotional codes. To account for this, we've decided that if we make it to our $6000 goal, we'll give the game away for free for the first 2 weeks of release. Even after that, we intend to sell the game in its entirety for $2 or less.


We may even give it away for Free.

 

We're not in this for the money, we're in this for the message. We believe in the freedom of games, especially those with important themes.

 

Update 1: We've decided that every penny earned from the fruition of this project will go to other IndieGoGo/Kickstarter Game-Dev projects or Indie Developers in need. In this effort, we hope to not just encourage the freedom of games, but to actually enforce it.

 

If we can get within a few hundred dollars of our $8500 goal, we'll ship the game with everything we can. We'll create the best experience we can muster and launch it with the hope of making an impact.

If we make it past the $5500 mark, we'll persist. We'll try to ship a condensed version of the game with fewer characters, and it'll let us know that there are people out there who are interested in seeing this game through, we'll keep trying to find the money, even if we have to release the game piece by piece. 

If we end up with less than $3000, we won't try and strip the game down any further. It's important to us that this game has impact, so we'll give the money to charity that can make an impact in its place. It'll be a charity of your choosing.

 

Update 1: As part of our decision, we've decided that if we don't make it to our goal we'll give the remaining funds to other game dev projects. We'll ask the community of contributors where they believe the money should go too.


Update 2: Since we've recieved massive physical donations, our total target has been reduced to $4500, see the Updates tab for more info!


Update 4: We've hit $3000: WE CAN PUBLISH! With this milestone under our belts, we can ship a version of the game with a linear campaign and a 13-Class character tree. This version of the game has been designed to be the smallest publishable game that can still feel like a complete experience. Thank you all so much for your support!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't spare the cash, we completely and totally understand. But just by coming here and reading this you're already helping us to reach people. If you believe in what we're trying to do, tell your friends! Publicity is, in some ways, the most important contribution possible to this campaign. Sharing a link on Facebook, Liking the Facebook Fan Page, Tweeting about it or following the Seculus Twitter, blogging or just word of mouth - these are some of the most powerful things you can do for us.

We thank you for your time, and hope we've moved you in some way, gamer or not.

 

A Final Message To Everyone

If there is anything else we can do to help convince you of our cause, please let us know in the comments! We're honestly happy to answer any and all questions. You can post your comments here, or on the development blog.

You can also email us with your questions at: SeculusCampaign@gmail.com

Instead of classical turn-by-turn movement, each unit moves at their own interval, some will take more turns than others (like the fast paced archers of the Oddlands) and some will be slower but more powerful (like the gargantuan knights of Ager Vattinus). In addition, each member of the players party grows and develops individually, gaining experience and stats like traditional RPG games. They can be promoted through ranks and will develop new skills and abilities. The player can create new units to add to their party to suit their needs and preferred strategies. The over-world map also features many bonus levels and side missions, designed to give the player a broad view of the game world as well as the finer more detailed aspects of war, and how individuals are affected.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to completely flesh out the game with everything we've designed, we'd need $10,435, but we understand that this is a HUGE request, so we've edited and trimmed the designs to the point where we could ship the game, maintaining its ambitious goals, for $8500. At least to us, its still a huge amount of money to ask for. Because the minimum shippable game we've designed can ship for $5500, we've decided to set our campaign goal to $6000 so we can afford to send out gifts and thanks.The money would go towards commissioning the rest of the animations and sprites for the game. We've invested a great deal of time searching for low-cost solutions and we have found many (Like the fantastic NoSoapRadio and their free video game music), but animation is the one thing that we cannot work around if we want our game to be taken seriously.
If you can help us see this through, you'll have access to heaps of concept art and lore before the game is released, and the more generous will have the chance to add their own personal touch to the game. The reason we haven't listed per-ordering as a perk, is because the android market doesn't support promotional codes. To account for this, we've decided that if we make it to our $6000 goal, we'll give the game away for free for the first 2 weeks of release. Even after that, we intend to sell the game in its entirety for $2 or less.

We may even give it away for Free.
 
We're not in this for the money, we're in this for the message. We believe in the freedom of games, especially those with important themes.
 
Update 1: We've decided that every penny earned from the fruition of this project will go to other IndieGoGo/Kickstarter Game-Dev projects or Indie Developers in need. In this effort, we hope to not just encourage the freedom of games, but to actually enforce it.
 
If we can get within a few hundred dollars of our $8500 goal, we'll ship the game with everything we can. We'll create the best experience we can muster and launch it with the hope of making an impact.
If we make it past the $5500 mark, we'll persist. We'll try to ship a condensed version of the game with fewer characters, and it'll let us know that there are people out there who are interested in seeing this game through, we'll keep trying to find the money, even if we have to release the game piece by piece. 
If we end up with less than $3000, we won't try and strip the game down any further. It's important to us that this game has impact, so we'll give the money to charity that can make an impact in its place. It'll be a charity of your choosing.
 
Update 1: As part of our decision, we've decided that if we don't make it to our goal we'll give the remaining funds to other game dev projects. We'll ask the community of contributors where they believe the money should go too.

Update 2: Since we've recieved massive physical donations, our total target has been reduced to $4500, see the Updates tab for more info!

Update 4: We've hit $3000: WE CAN PUBLISH! With this milestone under our belts, we can ship a version of the game with a linear campaign and a 13-Class character tree. This version of the game has been designed to be the smallest publishable game that can still feel like a complete experience. Thank you all so much for your support!
 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't spare the cash, we completely and totally understand. But just by coming here and reading this you're already helping us to reach people. If you believe in what we're trying to do, tell your friends! Publicity is, in some ways, the most important contribution possible to this campaign. Sharing a link on Facebook, Liking the Facebook Fan Page, Tweeting about it or following the Seculus Twitter, blogging or just word of mouth - these are some of the most powerful things you can do for us.
We thank you for your time, and hope we've moved you in some way, gamer or not.
 
A Final Message To Everyone
If there is anything else we can do to help convince you of our cause, please let us know in the comments! We're honestly happy to answer any and all questions. You can post your comments here, or on the development blog.
You can also email us with your questions at: SeculusCampaign@gmail.com

story:
Build up your island with unique buildings. Defend it at all cost. Use your Mech Marines to protect yourself and to destroy the enemy. Equip them with various weapons. Get experience and level up. Play against your friends online in a public and gamer league. 

Mech Marines was inspired by the old SNES game Metal Marines (1993) by Namco Bandai Games.



The Mapeditor (v 0.81):



The first preview of the new design:




Key Features

  • Fast and action-packed gameplay
  • Modern 3D look 
  • 12 unique buildings provide a simple and fast gameplay with many strategic possibilities 
  • Singleplayer with an interactive league system
  • Now with the long awaited multiplayer mode

Status

  • Most parts of the base mechanics are implemented 
  • Building models are overhauled (new) 
  • Terrain and vegetation overhauled 
  • InGame UI changed (new) 
  • Attack menu changed (new) 
  • Attack menu Design changed (new)

Coming soon

  • A.I. for the mechs while the player is not controlling or commanding them 
  • New missile attack and defend system 
  • New Particle System 
  • New Terrain / Maps for multiplayer demo 

  • New Mech Marines Demo with multiplayer mode


Demo / Test

(old version v 0.81), the newest should come out mid / end december 2013.

Info: You should probably use medium graphic settings, because it is not optimized yet.

NEW: We worked out a tutorial for you. This is part 1 of 7. You will find the other parts on our YouTube channel. Thank you for trying out the demo :)!!!



System requirements

  • Windows XP or later, (Mac and Linux not available at the moment)
  • Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Any card made since 2004 should work



Hello and welcome to your mission briefing! :)


It's in your hands. Support the mechs and let us build a fantastic strategy game inspired by the classic SNES game Metal Marines. We have already started and need your help to finish this.

My name is Tommy Pototzki (30, from Wuppertal, Germany). I am the founder of "Byte Trail Software" and the creative head in our team. I had the vision for our first "indie" projects "Pixelsoccer" and "Mech Marines". My job is the creative part like 2D- and 3D design,  modelling and animations and also the coordination of Byte Trail.

Soon, Michael Zehr (29, from Thun, Switzerland), a well experienced game programmer who is also responsible for the interaction between graphics and logical game play has joined the team.  A work horse that only let's go of a problem when it's solved.

Completing the group with Steven “Pierreformance” (27, from Dortmund, Germany), who is looking after sound design and music composing, especially for the game “Mech Marines”.

As we're designing the game from scratch, the project is getting pretty time intense. We're working daily on the game and have now reached a level where it's hardly possible to go any further without external, financial input.

That's why we've decided to place a campaign on Indiegogo and ask for your help to finish the project.





Please have a look at the perks to see what you can get in return, if you decide to support the project.



Any donation that lands in our pot, will bring us a step closer to bring back a classic strategy game, that  deserves to return in a modern networked version within the gamers scene.

Let us realize that dream of putting new life into a real classic. New graphics, innovative game play and a well developed multi player system. Let us build a new community based on a very unique strategy game. Thanks a lot.



Even if you can't donate anything, you can still help.

Are you a Steam user? Follow our project and help us to get the Greenlight on Steam!

Tell your friends about us, like our Facebook page or subscribe to our YouTube channel.

If you have any ideas or feedback, don't hesitate to contact us and help us to steer the wheel into the right direction.

story:
No-Dice.Net is an ambitious project to modernize tabletop gaming.  It will be a central hub for dungeon masters and players to store character sheets, create battle maps, develop new game rules, plan campaigns, and find groups.

Because of No Dice's rule set creation engine, any rule set can be supported with a little work, but there will also be pre-built sets available for purchase. These rule sets won't cover every aspect of a given game, but they will cover character generation and leveling.

All of our tools will be accessible through an open API to allow easy integration within other sites and applications.

No Dice, LLC will also be developing a standard XML data format for characters, rulesets, and maps so that other applications can be made compatible.

A Note about the rewards:

The profile/badges will be delivered as soon as you set up an account on our site and e-mail us. It's bare-bones, but you can collect the badges. That's all that matters, right?

Also, if you earned a 3D portrait, our in-house 3D Artist/User Interaction Specialist will also contact you as soon as the payment goes through for details about your custom portrait.

The rest of the rewards won't be fully deliverable until after the campaign when the site is fully functional and all that.  All "Epic Level" memberships will be valid as soon as you sign up for an account, but the time countdown for them (if applicable) won't start until after the beta is over.

Rules Customization Sandbox

At the heart of our application is our rules customization feature. You can take any existing ruleset and build your own “layer” on top of it and share it with all the players in your campaign. You can also choose which rulesets you want to include in a given campaign, or even use a custom ruleset of your own design.

  • Start From Scratch
  • Add Your Own “House Rules” to an Existing Game
  • Share With Your Group for Easy Play-Testing

Character Creation Tools

Character Creation will be available for most popular rulesets, along with the ability to redesign and theme the templates so that you can have all the information you need where you want. Your possibilities are endless!

Map Making Tools

We’re going to feature powerful on-line map-creation tools, and we’re hoping to make official content available for all the major game rulesets as well as our favorite weird independent stuff.

  • Library of Free Basic Tile Sets
  • Support for Uploading Your Own Tiles
  • Store for Buying Additional Tile Sets

Campaign Tracking Tools

Our Campaign tools will let you keep your players updated with a blog and/or newsletter.

  • Tools for Keeping Campaign Notes
  • Campaign Blogs/Newsletters

Social Network for Traditional Gamers

No-dice.net will feature many social aspects to connect players. You’ll be able to share your campaign, character sheet, etc with the world, and keep track of your gaming group.

  • Video Chat/Collaboration Plug-Ins for On-line Play
  • Badges/Achievement System
  • Campaigns can be marked “LFG” and Searchable
  • Integration With All Major Social Platforms

Open Standards

No Dice, LLC believes strongly in the innovation that open standards allow. We want you to use our site because you love it, not because your data is held hostage there. Custom rule sets, character sheets, and dungeon designs will all be exportable as XML. We will also be submitting our format as an open standard, so other companies and individuals can build software that supports it. We will also feature an open API, so that software developers can build plug-ins and mash-ups using No-Dice.Net. We’re hoping to change the way you play, whether you even directly use our site or not.

  • Open XML Standards for Dungeon Maps
  • Open XML Standards for Character Sheets
  • Open XML Standards for Rule Sets
  • Open API for Developers to Expand With

Support for Mobile Devices

By launch, No-Dice.Net will be optimized for mobile devices (we’re hoping that your players will even be able to update their character sheet on a cheap-as-crap mobile phone or a 2nd generation Kindle). And, we are already planning to release Android and iOS apps soon after.

  • Android/iOS/Mobile Apps for Campaign Play/Management
  • Optimized Interfaces for Mobile Devices

Support for Popular Rulesets

Actually, we’re hoping to support *every* ruleset, even if they are unpopular. You can design and/or import any rule set you want, and we are hoping to keep refining our XML standards so that *any* game system can fit into the format.

  • Support for All Open Game Rule Sets
  • Support for Proprietary Rule Sets
  • Support for Custom Rule Sets
  • Character Conversions Between Different Rule Sets

Based on our recent survey, we've decided to fully support PFRPG (and D20 SRD because that's what it will inherit from) from the start.  Then we will try and see what we can properly license of D&D 3.5.  Eventually, we have our sights set on: Vampire, Werewolf, etc, Warhammer 40k Dark Heresy, GURPS, D&D Next, D&D 4th Edition, Call of Cthulhu, FATE, Eclipse Phase, Shadowrun, AD&D 1st + 2nd Edition, D20 Modern, and Mutants and Masterminds. 

 

Funding

What are we going to use the money for?

If we get the full amount, we will be able to work on this project full time for long enough to complete this in half the time.  If we don't get the full amount, we will still be able to complete the project, and will be able to devote more time to it, so your funds will not be wasted.  Plus, we will make you nice things in exchange.

story:
Short Summary

For my birthday this year I want your help upgrading my PC.  I built my computer myself 4 years ago and it's time for some new parts. Instead of getting me a gift, buying me a drink, or sending me a card, help me raise money towards a gift that'll last for years.

I assume most who see this know me, but if you don't, hi there! My name is Kyle Stover and I'm a dog walker in NYC and aspiring Voice Actor.  I use my computer to edit videos, record voice over, and play video games.  I also enjoy Improv Comedy and am taking classes at the Magnet Theater here in New  York.

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign has flex-funding which means any money raised will go to me and put toward improving my computer regardless of whether or not we reach the goal.

Even at $300 I will be able to purchase a vastly superior Graphics Card. From there we can look at higher end Cards or other necessary hardware upgrades.

The Impact

Several months ago I tried my hand at streaming and found my computer unable to handle anything but the simplest games. With a new graphics card Eric and I will be able to produce fun streams through my computer and you'll know that when I'm having fun and cracking jokes it'll be because of your generosity.

Risks & Challenges

I know after most people reach adulthood you don't often ask your friends to get you presents, but this is the 21st century and I'm bad at cashing in favors.

So at the risk of using all my favors, I want your help now.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, I truly appreciate you taking the time to look at this campaign. If you can share this online, put in a good word for me, or just keep me in mind on this anniversary of my birth I would greatly appreciate it.


-Kyle Stover

story:
Game Overview

Casey Powell Lacrosse 16 is a console sports simulation where authentic lacrosse gameplay, high quality graphics, multi-year dynasty mode, competitive online multiplayer, real-time RPG leveling, and in-depth character customization are seamlessly integrated and delivered over Xbox, PlayStation, and the PC.


Gameplay:

Lacrosse 16 combines the player movement and passing of basketball with the stick control, shooting, and hitting of hockey to create a high scoring, action-packed lacrosse video game.

• High Scoring: Say goodbye to that “I can’t score” feeling of standard sports video games. Lacrosse averages 20+ goals per game. Get ready to sting corners!

• Big Hits: Line up the ball carrier for huge hits by perfectly timing up your attack. Imagine a football linebacker with a titanium shaft. Lay him down!

• Combination Stick Checks: Strip the ball away from the offense with various sword-like stick checks. Slice and dice!

• Evasive Dodging: Execute combination dodge moves to work your way past the defense. Lacrosse players are pure athletes. First you break their ankles, and then you break their heart.

• Quick Stick Passing: Perform amazingly accurate and fast passing to exploit your opponents. Tic-tac-toe anyone?

• Face-offs: Control every movement of your players stick in first person face-offs. Clamp, pinch and pop, laser? Its in your hands!

• Groundballs: Decide if you are going to pick up the ball with two hands, one hand, or go for the quick Indian pickup. The team who wins the GB battles, wins the war!

• Transition Offense: The team who knows how to create numbers is the team who knows how to score goals! Find the 2v1s!

• Transition Defense: Its on you to decide when to stop ball, when to scrape, and when to rotate. Transition defense will make or break you!

• Settled Offense: There are times to push transition and there are times to settle the ball down. Do you know the difference? Championship teams do...

• Settled Defense: How far do you want to close out to play the ball? Are you going to pack it in and play zone? Slide from the crease or adjacent? Want to lock off their two best players? If you can't play defense, you are going to be in a world of hurt...


Developed by:

  

Crosse Website

Crosse Studios is a Pittsburgh-based company that is dedicated to creating entertaining lacrosse video games across a multitude of platforms, allowing players to access fast-paced, competitive and engaging lacrosse simulations. Founded in 2009, Crosse Studios developed the industry’s first field lacrosse video game. Crosse Studios has since developed five lacrosse video games for Xbox 360, including two professional indoor games fully licensed and endorsed by the National Lacrosse League.

Crosse Studios released its first mobile lacrosse game, Lacrosse Dodge, for iOS and Android in 2013. The highly anticipated release garnered a 4.5 out of 5 stars user rating and spent several days inside the Top 25 Paid Apps in the United States, ranking ahead of mega hits Temple Run and Words With Friends at the time. Most recently, Crosse Studios released five more mobile games, including Flick Lacrosse Lite, Laxy Bro, Lacrosse Arcade 2014, Lacrosse Shot, and College Lacrosse 2014.




Big Ant Website

Big Ant Studios is an Australian video game development studio founded by CEO Ross Symons in 2001. Some of the developer's most popular titles are Australian sporting titles such as the AFL Live series, Rugby League Live as well as Don Bradman Cricket 2014 which was released in late 2014. Located on the Southbank of Melbourne's Yarra river, it is one of Australia's largest and most experienced studios.

What We Need & What You Get

  • To develop a high-end Lacrosse Video Game it takes a lot of time, resources, and money. All contributions made will go directly into building Lacrosse 16 for Xbox, PlayStation, and the PC.

  1. Authentic Lacrosse Gameplay and Artificial Intelligence

  2. High-Quality Graphics

  3. Motion Capture Animations

  4. Multi-year Dynasty Mode

  5. Online Multiplayer

  6. Real-Time Skill Leveling

  7. In-Depth Character Customization

• Quick Game - Short on time? Pick up the controller and play the fastest game on two feet from the comfort of your living room! Lacrosse 16 will feature hundreds of custom teams and thousands of unique players!

• Massive Dynasty Mode - Negotiate player scholarships, sign sponsors, hire top-flight coaching staff, and set intense training programs to build the ultimate team.

• Online Multiplayer - Nothing is more rewarding than playing online versus friends and competitors. Our engine is built from the ground up with online gaming in the forefront. Quickly pick up the game for competitive ranked play or run a top-tier franchise with your friends through Dynasty Connect. Play competitively in ranked or unranked matches or mini-games. Earn badges and experience the rise to the top of the leaderboards.

• Character Creation - Create teams and players in the fully featured Lax Academy and share them online. Laxers are gear heads who love to rock the newest and coolest equipment. The Lax Academy opens up endless customization options from the player’s height, weight, skin and physique to facial features and hairstyle. Equipment selection allows for customizations of helmets, jerseys, shoulder pads, elbow pads, gloves, stick shafts, stick heads, war paint, socks and shoes.



The Impact

The impact a high-quality Lacrosse Video Game can have on the sport of lacrosse is HUGE:

  • For the first time ever, people who have never played lacrosse can pick up a controller and play a full game of lacrosse. This will open the sport up to millions of people around the world who have never even heard about the game, who are too old to play, or are intimidated that "they don't know the rules."

  • Through the release of Lacrosse 16 we can expose millions of people to lacrosse like no other medium can.

  • The next step in Lacrosse Video Games is within reach. With your help, we can build an awesome lacrosse video game and help grow lacrosse.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tell people about the Lacrosse 16 and the Test Team

  • Remember, people are busy and don't hear every piece of news. A lot of great things fall through the cracks.

Risks and Challenges

As with developing any video game there are a lot of risks and costs involved.


1. Quality: Matching the quality of current sports video games is a challenge, but our experience proves that we will deliver a high-quality experience.

2. As requested by PayPal: "The delivery of rewards or perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." (We are required to include this.)
story_txt:
Game Overview
Casey Powell Lacrosse 16 is a console sports simulation where authentic lacrosse gameplay, high quality graphics, multi-year dynasty mode, competitive online multiplayer, real-time RPG leveling, and in-depth character customization are seamlessly integrated and delivered over Xbox, PlayStation, and the PC.Gameplay:
Lacrosse 16 combines the player movement and passing of basketball with the stick control, shooting, and hitting of hockey to create a high scoring, action-packed lacrosse video game.
• High Scoring: Say goodbye to that “I can’t score” feeling of standard sports video games. Lacrosse averages 20+ goals per game. Get ready to sting corners!
• Big Hits: Line up the ball carrier for huge hits by perfectly timing up your attack. Imagine a football linebacker with a titanium shaft. Lay him down!
• Combination Stick Checks: Strip the ball away from the offense with various sword-like stick checks. Slice and dice!
• Evasive Dodging: Execute combination dodge moves to work your way past the defense. Lacrosse players are pure athletes. First you break their ankles, and then you break their heart.
• Quick Stick Passing: Perform amazingly accurate and fast passing to exploit your opponents. Tic-tac-toe anyone?
• Face-offs: Control every movement of your players stick in first person face-offs. Clamp, pinch and pop, laser? Its in your hands!
• Groundballs: Decide if you are going to pick up the ball with two hands, one hand, or go for the quick Indian pickup. The team who wins the GB battles, wins the war!
• Transition Offense: The team who knows how to create numbers is the team who knows how to score goals! Find the 2v1s!
• Transition Defense: Its on you to decide when to stop ball, when to scrape, and when to rotate. Transition defense will make or break you!
• Settled Offense: There are times to push transition and there are times to settle the ball down. Do you know the difference? Championship teams do...
• Settled Defense: How far do you want to close out to play the ball? Are you going to pack it in and play zone? Slide from the crease or adjacent? Want to lock off their two best players? If you can't play defense, you are going to be in a world of hurt...
Developed by:
  

Crosse Website

Crosse Studios is a Pittsburgh-based company that is dedicated to creating entertaining lacrosse video games across a multitude of platforms, allowing players to access fast-paced, competitive and engaging lacrosse simulations. Founded in 2009, Crosse Studios developed the industry’s first field lacrosse video game. Crosse Studios has since developed five lacrosse video games for Xbox 360, including two professional indoor games fully licensed and endorsed by the National Lacrosse League.
Crosse Studios released its first mobile lacrosse game, Lacrosse Dodge, for iOS and Android in 2013. The highly anticipated release garnered a 4.5 out of 5 stars user rating and spent several days inside the Top 25 Paid Apps in the United States, ranking ahead of mega hits Temple Run and Words With Friends at the time. Most recently, Crosse Studios released five more mobile games, including Flick Lacrosse Lite, Laxy Bro, Lacrosse Arcade 2014, Lacrosse Shot, and College Lacrosse 2014.




Big Ant Website
Big Ant Studios is an Australian video game development studio founded by CEO Ross Symons in 2001. Some of the developer's most popular titles are Australian sporting titles such as the AFL Live series, Rugby League Live as well as Don Bradman Cricket 2014 which was released in late 2014. Located on the Southbank of Melbourne's Yarra river, it is one of Australia's largest and most experienced studios.What We Need & What You Get
To develop a high-end Lacrosse Video Game it takes a lot of time, resources, and money. All contributions made will go directly into building Lacrosse 16 for Xbox, PlayStation, and the PC. 

Authentic Lacrosse Gameplay and Artificial Intelligence
High-Quality Graphics 
Motion Capture Animations
Multi-year Dynasty Mode
Online Multiplayer
Real-Time Skill Leveling
In-Depth Character Customization

• Quick Game - Short on time? Pick up the controller and play the fastest game on two feet from the comfort of your living room! Lacrosse 16 will feature hundreds of custom teams and thousands of unique players!
• Massive Dynasty Mode - Negotiate player scholarships, sign sponsors, hire top-flight coaching staff, and set intense training programs to build the ultimate team. 
• Online Multiplayer - Nothing is more rewarding than playing online versus friends and competitors. Our engine is built from the ground up with online gaming in the forefront. Quickly pick up the game for competitive ranked play or run a top-tier franchise with your friends through Dynasty Connect. Play competitively in ranked or unranked matches or mini-games. Earn badges and experience the rise to the top of the leaderboards.
• Character Creation - Create teams and players in the fully featured Lax Academy and share them online. Laxers are gear heads who love to rock the newest and coolest equipment. The Lax Academy opens up endless customization options from the player’s height, weight, skin and physique to facial features and hairstyle. Equipment selection allows for customizations of helmets, jerseys, shoulder pads, elbow pads, gloves, stick shafts, stick heads, war paint, socks and shoes.
The Impact
The impact a high-quality Lacrosse Video Game can have on the sport of lacrosse is HUGE:

For the first time ever, people who have never played lacrosse can pick up a controller and play a full game of lacrosse. This will open the sport up to millions of people around the world who have never even heard about the game, who are too old to play, or are intimidated that "they don't know the rules."
Through the release of Lacrosse 16 we can expose millions of people to lacrosse like no other medium can.
The next step in Lacrosse Video Games is within reach. With your help, we can build an awesome lacrosse video game and help grow lacrosse.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell people about the Lacrosse 16 and the Test Team
Remember, people are busy and don't hear every piece of news. A lot of great things fall through the cracks.

Risks and Challenges
As with developing any video game there are a lot of risks and costs involved.
1. Quality: Matching the quality of current sports video games is a challenge, but our experience proves that we will deliver a high-quality experience.2. As requested by PayPal: "The delivery of rewards or perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." (We are required to include this.)

story:
IMAGINATION & CREATIVITY ‘THINKING OUTSIDE THE BOX’


The Lock Sphere is a living Sphere Mind Game/Brain Teaser - which literally forces you to think outside the box to find the solution!




What is Lock Sphere ? 

The Lock Sphere is a round shape wooden Brain Teaser - that is packed with the latest Sensors and Electronics!

Measuring just three inches in diameter, the Lock Sphere is a wooden Brain Teaser that contains multiple high sensitivity sensors and electronics that can feel the slightest vibrations up to knowing the color of the sky. 

Your goal is to unlock the Sphere and force it to split. Every movement and step will be logged and remembered by the Sphere- leading you towards the end solution!



"The Lock Sphere empowers you to see things in a new and unique way while you have fun! It will give you the impulse to explore creative and imaginative everyday and abstract problems" Gengames reviews



Brain Teasers/ Mechanical puzzles ?

Our journey started when we were looking for a smarter game, a game that would force us to think outside the box both mentally and physically. We were looking for mind games and puzzles that incorporated today's advanced technology and will be extremely difficult to solve.. That’s what Lock Sphere is, A Game with no obvious solution !

The goal is very simple. the process ... 

You will get your EX1 Sphere locked & ready for action. Using symbols marked on the sphere - you will need to preform various actions in order to find the correct conditions that will lead to the end solution.. only then the Sphere will split open to reveal a special show.

The Solution ?!



Solving the Sphere could take you miles away...  this is not easy.

The process in reaching the goal could include everything you can imagine...  The Sphere will walk you outside to the open fields, day or night. You may need to move it to a specific place, specific conditions, move it in certain angles... wait a certain amount of time or any other variety of factors you can only imagine. You only have the symbols marked on the Sphere and your imagination & creativity. 

You will have to think outside of the box for this one.



Anything else ? We can't say much otherwise it will be easy. You have to remember,  The Sphere will sense everything around you and every step counts.




Are you up for the Challenge?

The Lock Sphere is the result of precision wood tooling on two precise hemispheres combined with a 4mm center disc that holds the core of the Sphere, a variety of delicate sensors and pulsating LED’s. The LED's are designed to provide beautiful ambient lightning & feedback to user about Game Progress, Stages Completed and Charging status. 

Paired with Soft Optic Fiber Lighting Rods that Stretches from the Center of the Sphere's to the Outer Shell - The Sphere looks like a work of art on any desk. It starts conversations, and completes a room all by itself.



The Lock Sphere Futures:

Open Source Hardware

The EX1 Sphere is designed to have Arduino based OS. You will be able to reprogram the system, meaning once you succeed in opening the Sphere - You can create endless new challenging games for friends & family, the only limit is your imagination..

360° Sensing Abilities 

The Sphere contains multiple high sensitivity sensors that provides full 360 Degrees Sensing Abilities. The Sphere’s top breather holes are precisely angled and aimed to the core of the sphere in order for the sensors to collect info in real time. with the sensors on board, you can reprogram them to sense any parameters and create your own brain teaser.


Wireless Charging

Powered by a 3.7 Lipo battery, providing 12 Continuous Hours of Play Time and has Wireless Charging Capability with the Supplied Charging Base. Charging the Sphere is done simply by placing the Sphere in its base



We Need Your Help

Although Lock Sphere is designed and ready for distribution, we still need funds to put into promotion and marketing so we can build an audience. We’d like to offer as many incentives as possible for those who are able to donate the money we will need to make this happen. The funds gathered from this campaign will produce our first batch of Spheres in our US factory and go towards letting the world know that this solution exists. The more we can produce in a single run, the cheaper the price per unit will be! Take advantage of the special low prices we are offering during this campaign, because you won’t always be able to get Lock Sphere this cheap.




Tell Your Friends

You should already see the enormous value of Lock Sphere. We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.

Indiegogo backers will be the world's first to have Lock Sphere. You will be a big part of bringing a fresh new product to the market. You can help us evolve the Sphere! We are open to fresh ideas & looking forward to work with our backers in the future! The sphere’s possibilities are endless.


Prototyping 

We have been Working on the Sphere for the Past Year and have Come a Long Way. We Invested a lot of Time in Building the Lock Sphere to Perfection and Performing Extensive Testing of the Spheres with Various Combinations of Sensors.  We can Honestly say that we're Truly Amazed by the Final Result! 


Timeline

We are marking July 2015 as our deadline for our delivery date and we intend to keep it at that deadline for our backers. 



Other Ways You Can Help ?

Just spread the word! 

By Sharing the Link to Our Campaign on your favorite Social Network

~ Facebook ~

~ Twitter ~



Thank you ! 

The Sphere Team

story:
How Our Product Idea Was Born 

Hello everyone, my name is David,i am 26 years old  and i am a designer.

Few months ago i went to a trek in Bolivia with two friends.

During the trek we got lost in a blizzard, and after the wind took our map, we decided that we will go to sleep and in the morning we will start again our way back to city.

We opened our tent for the night and started to gather all our emergency survival gear, but due to the weather, it was very hard for us to find our tools that were spread in all of our bags. Because of that, it was a horrible life threatening night.

After this experience,  i knew i have to design a storage box that will enable you to gather up all of your survival gear and storage them in one box, and that you can easily take it with you for all kind of outdoor activities. I also knew, that this storage box can't be just an ordinary boring box, but it needs to be really unique and special.  Therefor, i created the ultimate design: "Zombie Survival Kit" , cause what is more awesome then Zombies ??


What We Need & What You Get

So first i need to create a line of this product, that can serve you in many different ways, for example: storage your outdoor gear and easily carry it with you,  storage any item in your house as cloth,books and etc. 
Also this storage box can help you easily carry multiple items at once.

So i checked the price of the machine that can create this box, and the price is 1000$, so this is the amount i need to raise in order to get start with our project. 
My dream= your comfort and fun!so just choose a Perks and help us with our project.

The Zombie Survival Hat:




The Zombie Survival T-Shirt:



How The Storage Box Will Look Like:

Measurements:    26 x 27 x 16 cm (H x W x D )
                                   10.23 x 10.63 x 6.3 in (H x W x D )

Materials:          The Box:  Made of strong carton
                              The Carry Handle: High-Quality Plastic

The Storage Box Uses:


Let's go!!!!

So after 3 month of designing and searching for the perfect machine, i'm ready to go!
Feel free to buy and donate this project, and if you like this project and want to help us, i will be more then happy if you will share this campaign !
Thank you so mach, i'm promise you will love our product !

story:
Our Story

Everybody should be part of the fight against Climate Change, therefore, we're proposing the Game that will involve everyone, specially the young generation. We have started the development of our platform, which you can visit at www.MySollars.com - through this platform we will allow individuals to understand and compensate their CO2 impact through a social game that will work on and off Facebook. 


The objective of the game is to have the highest possible e-cloud score, as you will be competing against your friends, city and country, (i.e. you'll be unlocking badges and getting special discounts and promotions from participating companies). 


The funds we're raising will help us complete the social game, with this money we are confident we can have the game developed over the next Quarter. We need your help to make it happen. 

The Impact

Education and awareness for starters. Fun and engagement and of course, climate change fight and poverty mitigation through the projects sponsored. Our objective is to bring big companies to sponsor the Sollars, so they will make them available to their consumers. 


What We Need & What You Get

We're currently partially outsourcing the development of the game, the funds raised will pay the development of the final e-cloud module and its integration into Facebook.  We're trying to raise 20K dollars, which would allow us to complete our proof of concept and start getting final customers through online marketing. 


Depending on the contribution received we will start giving you Sollars to compensate your impact as well as your friend's impact. For the biggest contributors we will have them as honorary sponsors of specific projects, in other words they will be the face of the Sollars, like the eagle in the american coins.


Other Ways You Can Help

Unleash your inner voice and share with your friends this campaign. Use the share tools. We depend on you sharing this to reach people we never could have reached. 


Additional info and recognition:

  • 1st place Startup Weekend Competition Geneva
  • 6th place Global Startup Battle
  • Represented Switzerland at the Global Cleantech Open, San Jose CA
  • Tribune de Geneve: http://www.tdg.ch/jeu-ecologique-remporte-startup-weekend-2011-11-20
  • Wood of Startup Blog: http://blog.woodofstartup.com/2011/12/mysollars-com-winner-of-the-sw-switzerland/


* In order to win the iPad the following conditions must be met:

1) Goal of $20K raised must be met.

2) Winner will be chosen using the last 3 numbers of the first lottery taking place in March in the State of Florida. Your number will be given in accordance with the number of claims for that perk.

We reserve the right to modify the Terms and Conditions of Use at any time without notice. Without limiting the foregoing, we will usually post a notice of such modifications on this page. Any modification is effective immediately upon posting the modification unless otherwise stated. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of any modification signifies your acceptance of such modification.

story:
LOT OF THANKS !!!!!!

WE  MANAGED OUR FIRST REWARD A 4500€ SIR KOBAYISHI

Hemos conseguido alcanzar la primera recompensa a 4500€ Sir Kobayishi

CAMPAIGN IS FINISHED, THANKS A LOT TO EVERYBODY WHO HAS SUPPORT US. 

LA CAMPAÑA HA TERMINADO, MUCHAS GRACIAS A TODOS LOS QUE HAN CONTRIBUIDO.

IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION CAN ASK US BY OUR MAIL

Si tenéis alguna duda podéis preguntarnos por mail

INFO@EUPHORIAMINIATURES.COM

OR OUR FACEBOOK
o por facebook

https://www.facebook.com/Euphoriaminiatures?ref=hl

Now its our turn, we have started to do all the work , we will put pictures of the progress in our facebook. Thanks again

Ahora es nuestro turno, hemos empezado ha hacer todo el trabajo, iremos poniendo imágenes de los avances en nuestro facebook. De nuevo, muchas gracias


THANKS TO EVERYBODY  !!!!!!

¡¡¡¡GRACIAS A TODOS!!!!

LETS GO FOR THE FIRST REWARD AT 4500€, SIR KOBAYISHI

VAMOS A POR LA PRIMERA RECOMPENSA A LOS 4500€, SIR KOBAYISHI

1. ABOUT US.

SOBRE NOSOTROS 

For five years Resina Planet (http://resinaplanet.com) has been making metal 30mm miniatures and the highest quality
6, 15 and 30mm scale resin scenery.

After a lot of effort we are ready to carry forward the miniature game based on Euphoria Miniatures (http://euphoriaminiatures.com), our futuristic miniature range.

A simple game to play but difficult to master, and finally the moment has come.

Desde Resina Planet (http://resinaplanet.com) llevamos más de 5 años en el sector del modelimo produciendo miniaturas en 30 mm de metal y escenografía en 6,15 y 30 mm de resina de la más alta calidad.

Después de mucho esfuerzo estamos preparados para sacar adelante el juego de miniaturas basado en nuestra gama futurista, EUPHORIA MINIATURES (http://euphoriaminiatures.com)

Un juego sencillo de jugar pero dificil de dominar, y por fin ha llegado el momento.

 

Our main goal with this campaign is to produce the starter game plus 4 miniatures that will increase the list of 8
characters that have already been produced reaching a total of 12 miniatures to choose from in order to create your teams.

If we get enough support this project will be made into reality and begin a whole new era.

Your help is essential. Thanks to your contributions we will not only acheive the necessary capital for producing the game 
but also the strength that gives us that support for what one intends to do.

Nuestro principal objetivo con esta campaña es sacar adelante el starter del juego además de 4 miniaturas que pasarán a engrosar la lista de los 8 personajes que ya tenemos producidos pasando a tener así un total de 12 miniaturas entre las que poder elegir para poder crear vuestros equipos. 

Si conseguimos el apoyo necesario este proyecto se convertirá en una realidad y comenzaremos lo que será una nueva era. 

Vuestra ayuda es imprescindible. Gracias a vuestras aportaciones conseguiremos no solo el capital necesario para poder producir el juego sino también la fuerza que da ese apoyo para conseguir lo que uno se propone.

  

 

2. WHAT DO WE NEED?

¿QUÉ NECESITAMOS?

Ne need the necessary amount to be able to manufacture the game's starter box.

Necesitamos el importe necesario para poder fabricar los componentes de la caja de inicio de juego.

   - Book layout and making                      -Action Point Markers

   - Maquetación y fabricación del libro                 - Marcadores de puntos de acción

    - Objective markers                             -10 sided dice

    - Marcadores de objetivos                                  - Dados de 10 caras


- Identify cards players

- Tarjetas de jugador de Euphoria

- Product Boxes

- Cajas del producto

We also want to expand the model range in order to have a greater character type diversification.
The first in having to pass the casting are four new characters:

También tenemos como objetivo ampliar  la gama de miniaturas para que haya una mayor diversificación de tipos de personajes. Los primeros en tener que pasar el casting son 4 personajes nuevos:

 - J. SCAUTER

 

- ARENDAL

 

 

- DOC CHASTAS

 

- MYCKY

 

 


And finally to expand our game's urban scenery and weapon range.

Y por último ampliar nuestra gama de escenografía urbana y armas del juego.

 

In order to develop these products we need to obtain 4000€ and this is why we need your support.

Para poder desarrollar estos productos necesitamos obtener una financiación de 4.000 €, y por eso necesitamos vuestro apoyo.

 

STRETCH GOAL:

AMPLIACIÓN DE OBJETIVOS:

4500 €: LEVEL 1 REWARD

IF WE MANAGE 4500 € ALL PERKS WITH LEVEL 1 REWARDS WILL OBTAIN AN ADITIONAL MINIATURE

SIR KOBAYISHI

Si conseguimos llegar a los 4500€  todas las aportaciones con las recompensas de nivel 1 recibirán una miniatura adicional.

SIR KOBAYISHI

4500 € RECOMPENSA DE NIVEL 1

5000 € : LEVEL 1A REWARD

5000 € : RECOMPENSA NIVEL 1A 

 

6000 € :  ??????????????

 

7000 €:   ??????????????

 

AND MORE

Y MÁS

  

3. WHAT OBTAIN THOSE WHO SUPPORTS THIS PROJECT?

¿QUÉ OBTIENEN LOS QUE COLABOREN CON EL PROYECTO?

What do the project suppporters obtain?
We have designed product packs that you can get by making contributions supporting the project.

In the same way we want to give you our thanks offering the "Susan" miniature, that will only be available in this
campaign and at official game tournaments.

Moreover, if we reach our goal, new characters will be unlocked ready to pass the casting that in turn will unlock rewards 
included in the different possible contributions.

A whole world is taking shape around an idea... help us make this idea into a reality.


Hemos diseñado packs de los productos que podréis conseguir realizando aportaciones para apoyar el proyecto. 

Del mismo modo queremos daros muestras de nuestro agradecimiento ofreciendo una miniatura "Susan" que tan solo se podrá conseguir mediante esta campaña y en torneos oficiales del juego.

Además, en caso de llegar a nuestro objetivo se irán desbloqueando nuevos personajes dispuestos a pasar el casting que a su vez desbloquearán recompensas incluidas en las diferentes aportaciones posibles.

Todo un mundo se está formando en torno a una idea.... ayudanos a hacer esa idea realidad.

VAMOS A POR LA PRIMERA RECOMPENSA A LOS 4500€, SIR KOBAYISHI

1. ABOUT US.


SOBRE NOSOTROS 
For five years Resina Planet (http://resinaplanet.com) has been making metal 30mm miniatures and the highest quality 6, 15 and 30mm scale resin scenery.
After a lot of effort we are ready to carry forward the miniature game based on Euphoria Miniatures (http://euphoriaminiatures.com), our futuristic miniature range.
A simple game to play but difficult to master, and finally the moment has come.
Desde Resina Planet (http://resinaplanet.com) llevamos más de 5 años en el sector del modelimo produciendo miniaturas en 30 mm de metal y escenografía en 6,15 y 30 mm de resina de la más alta calidad.
Después de mucho esfuerzo estamos preparados para sacar adelante el juego de miniaturas basado en nuestra gama futurista, EUPHORIA MINIATURES (http://euphoriaminiatures.com)
Un juego sencillo de jugar pero dificil de dominar, y por fin ha llegado el momento.
 
Our main goal with this campaign is to produce the starter game plus 4 miniatures that will increase the list of 8 characters that have already been produced reaching a total of 12 miniatures to choose from in order to create your teams.
If we get enough support this project will be made into reality and begin a whole new era.
Your help is essential. Thanks to your contributions we will not only acheive the necessary capital for producing the game but also the strength that gives us that support for what one intends to do.
Nuestro principal objetivo con esta campaña es sacar adelante el starter del juego además de 4 miniaturas que pasarán a engrosar la lista de los 8 personajes que ya tenemos producidos pasando a tener así un total de 12 miniaturas entre las que poder elegir para poder crear vuestros equipos. 
Si conseguimos el apoyo necesario este proyecto se convertirá en una realidad y comenzaremos lo que será una nueva era. 
Vuestra ayuda es imprescindible. Gracias a vuestras aportaciones conseguiremos no solo el capital necesario para poder producir el juego sino también la fuerza que da ese apoyo para conseguir lo que uno se propone.
  
 

2. WHAT DO WE NEED?
¿QUÉ NECESITAMOS?
Ne need the necessary amount to be able to manufacture the game's starter box.

Necesitamos el importe necesario para poder fabricar los componentes de la caja de inicio de juego.

   - Book layout and making                      -Action Point Markers
   - Maquetación y fabricación del libro                 - Marcadores de puntos de acción

    - Objective markers                             -10 sided dice

    - Marcadores de objetivos                                  - Dados de 10 caras

- Identify cards players
- Tarjetas de jugador de Euphoria
- Product Boxes
- Cajas del producto
We also want to expand the model range in order to have a greater character type diversification. The first in having to pass the casting are four new characters:
También tenemos como objetivo ampliar  la gama de miniaturas para que haya una mayor diversificación de tipos de personajes. Los primeros en tener que pasar el casting son 4 personajes nuevos:
 - J. SCAUTER

 
- ARENDAL

 

 
- DOC CHASTAS



 
- MYCKY



 
 

And finally to expand our game's urban scenery and weapon range.
Y por último ampliar nuestra gama de escenografía urbana y armas del juego.


 
In order to develop these products we need to obtain 4000€ and this is why we need your support.
Para poder desarrollar estos productos necesitamos obtener una financiación de 4.000 €, y por eso necesitamos vuestro apoyo.

SIR KOBAYISHI

story:
Intro

Thanks to your support we are ready to test our prototype lunar rover on the slopes and valleys of the Manua Kea on Hawai'i Big Island. This will be another big step in our mission to land a robotic vehicle on the Moon!

The terrain at Mauna Kea shows similar properties and challenges as the surface of the Moon: that's why NASA also conducts field tests at PISCES - the Pacific International Space Center for Exploration Systems. Teams from around the world come here to test their equipment.

Your support will boost not only the Puli further on its way to the Moon, but also  science and scientific thinking all around the world!

Thank you again, and follow Team Puli Space's Mission in Hawaii!

Mission Plan

After "landing on the Moon" - Mauna Kea for now -, our rover will send near real-time and HD videos, photos, a 360° panoramic view of its surroundings back to the Mission Control in Budapest - an Arrival Maunacast, mimicking the Arrival Mooncast of the Google Lunar XPRIZE. Then we journey at least 500 meters, before taking another set of videos and imagery of the surroundings - a Mission Complete Maunacast.

Completing the same moves and processes we plan to do on the Moon over the hills of Mauna Kea will be a big step in verifying the rover and mission control design.

Where the funds will go?

In short: to testing and development. 3,000 bucks will cover the technical costs of our Mission MaunaCast at PISCES. Supporting this mission is in no way a waste of your money: in return you will get not only great perks, but more importantly, your support will make a valuable contribution to space exploration too!

By supporting us, you support a mission that is part of an industry just getting born.

The more people do so, the sooner we will be able to find other comfortable places in the Universe. Space exploration shall be everyone's right.

About Us

Team Puli is an official Google Lunar XPRIZE Team, one of the current 22 teams from all around the world. We are planning our mission as well as raising funds to build and send robots to the Moon in a new kind of race.

We are a dedicated team of young professionals and space enthusiasts, named after the Puli, a dog-breed long used by shepherds for the protection and guidance of livestock in Hungary. Pulis are revered for their extraordinary intelligence, obedience and playful temperament. The Puli's unique appearance and capabilities easily distinguish them from other dogs, just as Team Puli aims to be different from any other GLXP Team.

Founded and led by Dr Tibor Pacher, Team Puli currently has round 30 active members, mostly young professionals from every segment of the economic and scientific life. We have already put over 35,000 volunteer working hours into the project.

Achievements prior to this mission

MARS2013: February this year, our prototype rover named Puli I2.0 succesfully participated in the MARS2013 analog field simulation, organized by Austrian Space Forum (ÖWF) in North-Sahara, Morocco. Watch the whole story of this great advanture!


The competition we're in: the Google Lunar XPRIZE

The Google Lunar XPRIZE, the largest international incentive based prize of all time, aims to do something we haven't done as humanity since 1973: safely land on the Moon. More than half of the world's population has never had the opportunity to view a live transmission from the lunar surface.

The Google Lunar XPRIZE aims to create a new "Apollo" moment for this generation and to spur continuous lunar exploration with a total of $40 million in incentive based prizes. In order to win this money, a private company must land a spacecraft safely on the surface of the Moon, travel 500 meters above, below, or on the lunar surface, and send back two "Mooncasts" to Earth. Teams may also compete for Bonus Prizes such as exploring lunar artifacts or surviving the lunar night, and can be awarded prize money earlier by completing terrestrial or in space milstones. All of this must be completed by December 31, 2015. The race is on!

Your Support

... and Your return: our great perks for You!

Small Step Club: For as little as 5 bucks, we'll take your name to the Moon. Simple as that. You also get a Puli' Supporter Certificate as well as a numbered photo from Hawaii, taken by our rover, sure.

Send a tweet from Hawaii: For all Twitter fans: Surprise Your followers with a uniqe retweet! Our rover will tweet Your message from Hawaii during its tour like "@Bob says: your text" on our Twitter channel: twitter.com/PuliSpace

Puli fan T-Shirt: We send You a great T-Shirt - design were choosen by Our Facebook fans - additionally to Your Small Step Club membership and numbered photo from Hawai'i.

3D laser etched rover inside: You already know: Your Small Step Club membership and a numbered photo is yours for this perk. And, of course, there is something very special in addition to this here: the 3D image of the Puli I2 Moon Rover Prototype, laser etched in a 4 cm x 4 cm x 6 cm glass piece.

Your 3D printed Puli I2 rover: A perfect eye-catcher for Your desk: a mini Puli rover as 3D print. Round 12 cm long, it looks like the original one with Hawaii experience! And, of course, also You will become a Small Step Club member, and get a unique Hawai'i image, shot by our rover.

Mauna Kea hiking boot: Manufactured in Hungary, a nubuk leather hiking boot, with waterproof and breathable lining and Vibram sole. Our Field Crew will bear this boot as well. From Mauna Outdoor Footwear, Hungary.

Help us to build a better future - spread the word!

You can support us in many other ways, too; for example by simply telling Your friends about team Puli, or by linking to this campaign here on Indiegogo.

You can also follow us on Google+, Facebook  or Twitter to be up-to-date and find out more.

We would also be happy, if you shared this link.

Thank you!

Team Puli Space

story:
Ok, ladies and gentlemen, this is our final week. And while we believe in miracles, a tiny bit of skepticism crawls through our minds when we think about the possibility of reaching any of our goals. Still, helping us spread the word about Outer Space Exiles is something you can do if you can't afford to back us up right now. Thank you for for bearing with us. You are stars!

Outer Space Exiles is one of a kind hybrid game. It’s inspired by titles like Total Annihilation, Dungeon Keeper and various tycoon and business simulations, the best pieces of which we decided to put together for a brand new experience. Generally one can say it’s RTS with RPG and tycoon elements, but in fact it goes way deeper than that and there are fundamental differences between it and typical RTS, RPG and tycoon games.

The game will take you in outer space where anything can happen and you need to keep your eyes peeled. Player takes the role of a colony manager who needs to make sure their colony functions well and provides good standard to colonists. Basically they can hire workers, convicts, military personnel and scouts to work and live there. However here comes the big difference between Outer Space Exiles and other games. Player needs to treasure their colonists as they are all unique. Each colonists has their own IDENTITY and PERSONALITY that determine their behavior, actions and decisions. That’s why, in this game NPC’s are no longer cannon fodder, they can choose their own path and destiny. You cannot influence them directly (i.e. selecting them all and clicking on a random spot of the map to move them there), but instead you will need to be very creative how to MOTIVATE them to perform specific tasks and jobs. Having different identities, different motivation models will work for different colonists. Some will choose money, other will do it for the community, some will do it out of heroism. And as they develop over time, player needs to take good care of them, keeping their LOYALTY high and supplying them with new gear because of two reasons: they won’t want their well developed colonists to be killed because of poor equipment and they won’t want them to take the next transport out of that lousy colony and move to a new one. So the task of the colony manager is not going to be an easy one. They will need to build various factories, shops and research labs where colonists can research new blueprints for improved weaponry, defense systems, vehicles and whatnot.

We started working on Outer Space Exiles in January and we have almost finished our work on the game prototype and will be able to release it this fall. Our goal is to build up a community and release our first alpha by the end of the year. And now we need your help to make this dream come alive!

Outer Space Exiles features a unique plot, written by an award-winning author. Player immerses into a future world in which Earth and Human race are at the edge of collapse. Planetary resources are almost depleted, humans need to find a new home pronto. While preparations for the great conquering of space take place for few decades, it's decided to scrap Earth's most unwelcome residents - criminals, convicts, chronically sick, unemployed, uneducated, poorly skilled...

All the marginals were no longer treated as equally right and were soon sent to outer space looking for their luck or in most cases, death. Meanwhile massive inbreeding took place on Earth for 50 years. And there it is, the shiny new generation of new hopes that is believed to save humanity.

And the day came for them to reach for the stars, looking for a new place to reform the Human race.

But what was everyone's surprise when they found long ago exiled marginals not only survived, but grew stronger and are now about to unleash a long awaited payback. To you, the players, this is certainly good news. Because unlike other games in Outer Space Exiles you will join the "BAD GUYS" and deal some justice for what your people had to suffer and go through during these 50 years.

Be sure to read the complete back story on our blog.

Outer Space Exiles combines elements from different genres and fuses them in an unique way.

One can look at it as a Real-Time Strategy, but it's far from the truth. Our major concern with these games is vast majority of them involves mindless production of cannon fodder and it's the quantity, not the strategy that determines mission outcome.

Well, we never liked that and decided to turn it upside down.

So instead of mass producing and not caring about mass losses, we would like the player to treasure their units. And the units on the other hand respond accordingly. The more you take care of them, the more they tend to develop and become of higher value to your game.

Add the idea that, each and every NPC has their own personality and mindset it will act according to and you end up with the equation that no two NPC's ever share the same personality that makes for a completely different game every time with endless replay possibilities.

The colony itself has a limited capacity and infrastructure and although transport ships regularly come and go bringing new goods and eventually colonists, there will never be abundance of resources and workforce. This is outer space and player needs to make do with what they have at hand. Knowing that colonists can also decide to leave the colony, you can easily understand that this experience will be nothing like walk in the park.

And here we come to the enemy. Of course there are enemies. Your major enemy is the inbred generation and Global Government. And you are going to give them mama's boys hell for the 50 years you spent in exile. But don't get comfortable after pushing them back to where they came from. You might soon end up fighting on two or more fronts with enemies you never thought existed.

Player assumes the role of a colony manager. They come to a freshly inhabited colony where they place their shops. Generally there are 4 types of shops that produce medical supplies, weapons, vehicles and protective equipment.

Medical supplies feature field medikits, boosters and drugs to enhance colonists durability. Weapons shop produce a vast array of weapons. Vehicle shop brings the next combat level to your colony by adding quads, tanks and other heavy machinery. Protective equipment deals with armors, suits and barriers to make your colonists less vulnerable.

The player starts with a choice of two shops.

One of the main differences with other RTS games is in Outer Space Exiles you CAN'T control the colonists directly. They do things as they please and see fit at the moment. However you can INFLUENCE their decisions by adding bounties and increase their loyalty offering them better equipment.

The RPG element comes from them developing with each and every new challenge and enemy they encounter. And the tycoon element comes from you not only dealing with the shops, but also trying to anticipate and satisfy demands for technologies and equipment by constantly researching blueprints and producing new items.

Of course there are also resources involved with that and that's how it all ties up together - if your colonists don't mine resources for you because they don't feel the urge to do it, you will end up buying resources off remote black markets. That means there will be delays in production while resources arrive and production costs will skyrocket. So it's all about finding the perfect balance.

The Multiplayer mode on the other hand provides a whole new dimension for your gameplay as it lets you interact with other players within your solo campaign. Once you join a Colonial Trade Chamber you end up among buddies you can rely on.

But be aware that CTC membership also requires you to give. It's a two-way relation. Colonial Trade Chambers have contracts with Global Government.

They need to provide specific amounts of ores and technologies each month. In exchange, Global Government will provide them with books and blueprints CTC members can freely grab and use. Failing to fulfill your quota however will have consequences and Global Government will send some forces to put some sense in you and get you back on track.

There is a fearsome competition between CTC's as the more successful ones have access to much better items.

Our goal is to create a working prototype by the end of the year, including things like professional made music, sound effects and a game server, where we can test the multiplayer part on.

Here is a breakdown of what we will use the campaign money on:

  • hire a sound engineer for the sound effects
  • and a band for the soundtrack
  • work on the Mac and Linux versions of the game
  • rent game servers for our multiplayer part
  • buy licenses for professional game developer software
  • spend more time on awesome game features which we would like to develop

We hope to raise enough money with our campaign, so we can launch a alpha / beta in spring 2014, that has all the features, including graphics and music, ready.

Please mind the following table in order to easily understand our tiers and what rewards are included in each of them.

Crooked Rocket Studios is a two-man venture. One is taking care of coding and all that backend jazz, while the other is after the visuals and writing. Both of us have many years of experience both as gamers and professionals in our own areas which we decided to finally put together and make a dream come true.

Thank you for your support and for making Outer Space Exiles possible! <3
